hri ti ka pa ye/ che ge mo/ pra ma ya rbad ya/ ra Ni pa tsa ya/ hriHstiHka pa ye/ che ge mo rak+ta tsa ta ya rbad/ ya ra ni yo na/ hriHstiHka pa ye/ che ge mo mur tsa ya rbad ya/ ru to sa tsa/ hriHstiHka pa ye/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad ya/ 'di dag gzhi snying dril ba gsang ba yang gsang de kho na nyid do// ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ hristi a mu ka/ pra ma ya rbad ya/ rag ta tsa ta ya rbad ya/ mur tsa ya rbad/ mA ra ya rbad/ 'di dag ni bsdu zhing mtshan mo bzlas pa ste/ yang snying ngo// ya ma me ta k+She hU~M dza dza/ g.yon gyi dril sngags 'bru lnga pa'o// ya ma k+She ta me/ mA ra ya phaT phaT/ g.yas kyi dril sngags 'bru lnga pa'o// ya ma me ta k+She/ ya me ta k+She ma/ la ta k+She ma me/ ye she ma me ta/ 'bru sngags g.yon gyi nyi ma bzhi pa'o// ya ma k+She ta me ya k+She ta me ma/ ya ta me ma k+She/ ya me ma k+She ta/ 'bru lnga g.yas kyi nyi ma bzhi pa'o// gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag khro bo'i rgyal pos gsung ma thag tu rdo rje rnon po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma khro bo'i rgyal po mchog/ ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs 'byung ba mi zad gter// yid

bzhin nor bu khyod la 'dud// gdug pa 'dul byed gsung sgra can// sngags mchog mnga' bdag khyod la 'dud// mi rtog rdo rje thugs la 'dud// ma lus sgrol 'dud khyod phyag 'tshal// ces bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud las/ khro bo'i rgyal po zhal gsum pa'i rtog pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// rdzogs so//// gshin rje 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud phyi ma yang snying zhes bya'o// 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud bcu gnyis bzhugs pa la 'dir khro bo zhal gsum pa 'khor lo thun bsdebs kyi rtog pa bsgyur ba'o//// ! bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan gshin rje gshed// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje 'chang// sangs rgyas 'phrin las brnag pa'i bcud// 'jam dbyangs khro bo chen po yis// ya ma lag na rdo rje dang// ye shes khro tshogs 'khor gzhan la// gshed chen 'khor lo bka' stsal to// lnga brgya pa'i snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// dkon mchog bstan pa'i sku dgra la// gsed bdag 'khor lo nag po bskor// 'chi bdag nyid dang gshed po bzhi// sgrub dang gcod pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsad pa drag po bdud kyi tshig/ nag po dus dang gza' skar la// rdzas dang dmigs pa rten bcas te// dang po chos nyid dmigs med las// snying rje'i ngang las yi ge hU~M// tsakra bruM zhes rab grags pas// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang// gru gsum kri sna zla kham dbang// thod mkhar bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas// yi dwags ma he khri stengs su// gcig pu dpa' bo nyid kyi sku// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa be con gshin rje gzir// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhabs pas gzir// me dpung klong nas 'od zer 'khrug/ kun dang mi bzad bran du 'khol// dza ti yab dang gnyis med 'khril// sbyor ba'i 'od zer sa bon las// srog gi gshed chen ma rungs bzhi// mi bzad rngam pa'i bdag po bzhi// smug nag ser nag dmar nag dang// ljang nag be con 'khor lo 'dzin// 'od dang 'od zer rab tu 'khrug/ dri za gshin rje gnod sbyin klu// gdan la dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed// chos sku rgyan cig dkyil 'khor de// sprin med mkha' la gzhan tshon bzhin// ma 'dres gcig gi ngang du rdzogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// gsang sngags yi ge'i rim pa yang// sku yis rten la gsung gi sgrub// 'phrin las snying po las la sbyar// pho thod mo thod steng dang 'og/ me rlung las kyi 'khor lo ni// dug khrag bris la gshin rje bstim// yon tan

rdzogs pa dbu ru bzhag/ dpa' bo rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga la// srog dang 'gugs pa'i yi ge sbyar// srog dang mtshon cha bsnol bar bya// bsnyen sgrub las kyi rim pa la// 'od zer brgyad dang brnan pa yi// rkyen dgus phul la rdzas dgus 'phang// gnad dgu 'joms pa gzer dgu brdab// las kyi gshin rje srin po bdud// rgyu skar gral na gnas pas na// sta skor gcig dang rta skor gnyis// sta skor gsum la gdon mi za// sku gsung thugs kyi thun rnams ni// sku dang yig 'bru mtshon char bstim// 'chi bdag nyid dang gshed po bzhi// gdug pa'i dbal dang dmigs pa'i rten// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// gsang ba'i yi ge 'bru bdun pa// dug lnga skye ba'i sems can la// lus la rang bzhin gnas pas bskor// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// bdag dga' 'chi bdag gsal byas nas// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i 'od zer dag/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha rang gshed byed// spyi gtsugs mgrin pa lte ba dang// snying kha la sogs gnas bzhi ru// rgyud mi 'chad par 'khor bas na// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// mgo 'khor yid 'khrug khrag skyug cing// srog gi dwangs snyigs 'byed pas na// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// ye grol lhun grub lta ba'i gnad// ngang gnas shugs 'byung spyod pa'i gnad// rtogs pa ma yengs sgom pa'i gnad// spangs thob med par 'bras bu gnad// rten 'brel rgyu dag rdzas kyi gnad// bsnyen bsgrub mtha' 'byung 'phrin las gnad// rang bdud mtshon chas 'joms pas gnad// to log srid pa rang 'joms gnad// sgom dgu gsang lam srog gi gnad// 'joms pa'i gsang sngags 'di lta ste// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rno dbal yin// hU~M/ spu gri brag dang ral gri dang// byang mar rmu rgyal tri shU la// shod d+he pad+ma 'khor lor sbyar// gnad 'joms sbyor ba dang po yin// byang mar rmu rgyal tri shu la// shod d+he zhags pa phur pa dang// bum pa rgya khram 'khor lor sbyar// gnad 'joms sbyor ba gnyis pa yin// shod d+he zhags pa phur pa dang// bum pa be con khram shing dang// spu gri rdo rje 'khor lor sbyar// gnad 'joms sbyor ba gsum pa yin// bum pa be con khram shing dang// spu gri brag dang ral gri dang// byang mar rin chen 'khor lor sbyar// gnan 'joms 'gug pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de dag yas su 'bru bsdebs ba// rnam pa yi ge ngo bo lha// rang bzhin stong pa nus pa med// dmar po bdud 'joms chos rgyal dang// phya sangs stag mgo dmigs pa dang// ya ba ti dang Ar+ya dmar// 'chi bdag gdug pa nyid la gtad// nyi ma dang por shes par bya// mgo dgu mig dmar brag kyon dang// dmar po bdud 'joms chos kyi rgyal// phya sangs ral pa tshar dgu

dang// 'chi bdag sbyar ba gnyis pa yin// ya ba ti dang glang mgo dang// dud kha mgo dgu mig dmar dang// kong rtse dmar po ya ma ra// 'chi bdag mthar sbyar gsum pa yin// phya sangs stag mgo dmigs pa dang// ya ba ti dang glang mgo dang// dud kha mgo dgu nyos byed 'bar// 'chi bdag la rtad bzhi pa ste// gnad dgu 'joms pa de kho na// gzhan yang sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya ya me to ru Na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ ru sprad 'khrul 'khor nyi ma bzhi// spyi yi 'khor lor yang dag spyad// phyi bo 'dros zhes dpa' bo bshad// de dag bzhi snying gril ba ste// las kyi bsnyen par bshad pa ste// nang gi 'khrul 'khor yin par 'dod// ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ ya ta yo na ru to me ya/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ de dag gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor te// g.yas nas skor ba thams cad la// ta lam nag po'i 'dros zhes par// 'jigs byed rgyal po ya mas bshad// ya ma me ta k+Sha/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ye dza ni/ ya me k+She ma/ to ru na yo ni ra ya ts+tsha ni ra tsa sa/ ya ta k+She ma me/ yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to ru na/ ya k+She ma me te/ ya tsa ni ra dza sa to ru na yo ni ra/ ya tsa ni ra dza sa to ru na yo nir/ 'khyil ba sbrul gyi 'gros stangs ni// mchog tu gugs zhing mig tu 'jug/ de las ta lam 'dros thabs ni// srung ba'i tsa krar dpa' bos bshad// re re dag la bzhi bzhi ru// lcags spyang 'phar ba glag mo dang// lce sbyang ro la rngam ltar bzlas// drag po rus sbal tseg ni 'gros// rdol pa nag po thugs phrad gsad// ra tsa sa to ru na yo ta ya/ ra tsa ya ra ni yo te ya/ to ru ni yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ to sa dza ra ni tsa ya she ya/ yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ yo na ru to sa tsa ra ma ya/ ya tsa ni ra dza sa to me ya// ya ra ni yo na ru to me ye/ gnad dgu 'joms pa drag po'i 'bru// gzer dgu 'debs pa chu srin 'gros// 'dzin dang gsod pa brnag pa'i lung// mgo mang 'bur 'gro'i 'bru sdebs pa// ma ya ra ma dza ra sa tsa to sa me to ra ma ya/ me ya ta/ me ta ya/ me to ru na ru yo ni ta yo/ ta ya k+She ta ya yo/ ta ni yo ni ya rak+She ya/ k+She ya ma k+She ya ya/ k+She tsa ya ni tsa ra ni mar/ 'phreng sngags bcu tsho drug yin te// gshed rgyal 'gugs dang las la sbyor// spu gri'i rjes sbyor la phyed de// u mi ta dang 'dra ba yis// grong khyer zad pa drug pa yin// ya ma rA dza sa to me/ ma ra tsa sa to me/ ma ra sa to me ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya ma/ dza sa to me yam rA dza/ to me ya ma ra tsa sa/ me ma ma ra tsa sa to/ ya me to ru na yo ta/ me to ru na yo ta ya/ to ru na yo ta ya me/ ru na yo ta ya me to/ na yo ta ya me to ru/ yo ta ya me to ru na/ ta ya me to ru na yo/ ya ta yo ni

ra ya k+She/ ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yo ni ra ya k+she ya ta/ ni ra ya k+She ya ta yo/ ra ya k+She ya ta yo ni/ ya k+She ya ra yo ni ra/ k+She ya ta yo ni ra ya/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma/ k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya k+She/ tsa ni ra ma ya k+She ya/ ni ra ma ya k+She ya tsa/ ra ma ya k+She ya tsa ni/ ma ya k+She ya tsa ni ra/ de bzhin rim par sbyar ba ni// shaM tsa pany+dza 'dros// drag sngags bcu gnyis brgyad yin te// ru khugs chen po'i las zhes bya// rdo rje yak+Sha ngar blud pa'i// stag mo mchongs pa'i tshul stabs ni// ya ma ta k+She me/ ya to yo ra/ ni dza ra sa tsa ru ni Na/ ye me k+She ma ta/ ra yo ya to tsa ru ni Na dza na sa ra/ ya ta ma me k+She/ to ya ra yo dza ni sa ra tsa Na ni/ ya k+She me ta ma yo ra to ya ru tsa na ni ni dza ras/ g.yas su bsgrod pa mgo yis bsgyur// gnod sbyin srin pos ngar blud pa'i// drag po 'bru thus bdud kyi tshig/ drag po gshed kyi mtshon cha ste// thar pa'i thar pas ma lus 'joms// ya ma me ta k+She/ ya me ta k+She ma/ ya ta k+She ma me/ ye k+She ma me ta/ k+She te me ma ya/ ta me ma k+She ya/ me ma k+She ta ya/ ma k+She ta me ya/ 'bru 'gro mgo lnga sngags kyi 'dros// rdo rje ngar blud ur mo'i thod// thabs dang shes rab nyin dang mtshan// dbus kyi stag chen 'dzu hU~M kyi// gshed bzhis bsad pa'i sbyor ba yin// thog mar 'bru gnyis ngor byas la// rten drug gnas las gdon bya ba// ra tsa sa to me ya/ to ru na yo ta ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya ts+tsha ni ra ma ya/ 'dod pa ming sbyar tshogs drug 'joms// tsa sa to me ya/ ru na yo ta ya/ ni ra ya k+She ya/ tsa ni ra ma ya/ phung po lnga yi rten bcom nas// bde ba ye shes lnga ru sbyor// ya ma me ya ma/ ya me ta ya me/ ya ta k+She ya ta/ ya k+She ma ya k+She/ mtha' ru spu gri 'dod par gzhug/ chags sdang 'joms pa'i 'khrul 'khor yin// ya ma me ta ya/ ya me ta k+She ya/ ya ta k+She ma ya/ ya k+She ma ma ya/ ya k+She ma me ma/ 'byung ba gnad 'dzoms tsakra yin// ya ma ra ya/ ya me to ya/ ya ta yo ya/ ya k+She ya ya/ rgyu bzhi nad du brlang ba yin// ra ma ya/ to me ya/ yo ta ya/ ya k+She ya/ 'phen byed rtsa ba'i 'bru la sdud/ dug gsum 'joms pa'i 'khrul 'khor yin// ya ma ya/ ya me k+She/ ya ta ma/ ya k+She me/ 'gros stangs sgo bzhi'i tsakra yin// shes pa dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'o// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo de dag ni// bcu gnyis tshul gyis las byed do// brgyad dang bcu gsum la sogs te// phyi nang la sogs drag sngags dang// steng 'og kha gnon 'khor lo la// drug cu rtsa brgyad nyi ma'i grangs// lha nyid gnad la dbab pa ste// brgya sbyin dbang po nyid kyang brlag/ sku gsung thugs dang rang gshed kyi// thun gyi kha gso rgyun du 'bad// rigs can rdo rje rnon po nyon// 'gros stangs brgyad dang bcu gnyis tshul// 'od zer brgyad dang phyi nang

gsang// gnad dgu zer dgu rkyen dgu rta// rtsa ba yan lag spu gri so// gsang sngags rgyal po rmad du byung// rnam bzhi'i 'khor rnams srung ba'i phyir// rigs can rdo rje rnon pos zung// zhes gsungs pa las/ 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang ste bstod pa/ snang stong gnyis med rol pa yi// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// sngags mchog mnga' bdag gsung sgra can// gdug pa 'dul byed khyod la 'dud// gsal la rtog med mi 'gyur ba// mi rtog rdo rje thugs la 'dud// sna tshogs 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// yid bzhin nor bu khyod la 'dud// thogs med ye shes las grub pa'i// ma lus sgrol ba khyod la 'dud// ces bstod nas/ kun dgongs pa chos nyid kyi ngang du rnal ba bzhin gnas so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed 'khrul 'khor nag po'i sngags rgyud khro bo zhal gcig pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o//// dka' ba gcod pa yang snying gi rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ shrI yak+Sha tsan+t+ra gu h+ya tan+t+ra ma ru tse ra ga so ri mA ra ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal gnod sbyin zla gsang dmar po'i rgyud/ sgrol ging ma ru tse shan pa spu gri reg chod/ gnam lcags thog gi sta re/ bse mdung dmar po/ drag sngags dug mda' nag po/ rmod pa'i mtshon cha/ 'phrin las kyi mdo rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chos kyi sku chen po las gzugs sku stong gsal yongs la khyab pa'i thugs rje bstan te/ de yang gdul bya'i skabs kyis 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin don mdzad pa las// de'i tshe de'i dus na chos kyi sku snying po byang chub la snyoms par zhugs pa las/ snying po byang chub las stong pa nyid du rnam par bshig ste/ 'gro ba rigs drug thugs rjes ji ltar mos par 'dul ba'i 'od zer khyab pa gzugs kyi sku dang sprul skur bzhengs nas gnas so// 'gro ba rnams la theg pa che chung gang ltar 'tsham pas don mdzad pa las/ phyin ci log tu kha bltas pa las kyi srin po gdong dmar dang/ dam las log pa'i dam nyams dam sri de ni 'dul bar ma gyur te/ slar bstan pa'i dgra gyur pa las/ yang de yi tshe de yi dus na gzugs kyi sku las gnod sbyin zla gsang dmar po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ gang gsang sngags mos pa spyod pa'i sems can rgyud ma dag pa thams cad ji ltar mos pa ltar 'dul bar dam bcas te drag po'i dgongs pa la bzhugs pa las/ de'i tshe de'i dus de na bdud sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rab tu zhe sdang che ba dkar po'i bstan pa mi dad pa/ 'khor mang po dang dbang ldan pa gcig gnas pa 'khams 'khrugs te/ bdud kyi dmag dpung 'khor bye ba sa ya dang bcas te bar du gcod pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las byed par gyur to// de yi tshe dus kyi rgyal po des ting nge 'dzin gyi sprul pa zhig bkye ste/ bdud sa 'dzin gyi sprul pa rab tu zhe sdang 'khrug cing gdug pa/ rdo rje'i thegs la smod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bar du gcod pa/ gang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ dkar po'i las la dad pa dang/ gsang ba'i thag pa la zhugs pa thams cad kyi bdud gnyen po bar chod kyi bdud du 'jig rten khams khebs par ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul bkye'o// de nas yang bdud kyi dmag dpung chan po bstibs te/ gang na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa chos gtan la 'bebs pa de ma thogs par 'dul bar gzas pa las/ de nas yang de ma thag tu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thar pa'i lam bkag cing 'gegs par gzigs/ de zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir snying po byang chub las thugs rje chen por bzhengs te/ thugs rdo rje yi ge hU~M gcig tu bsdus te gnas so// de las oM hri Sh+tiHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ bdud rje dregs pa can thams cad 'dul ba'i gshed po khro bo ya man ta kar sku bstan te/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma thA ban dza hU~M phaT/ ces bsgrogs shing gzugs kyi sku mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gyur pa las/ de nas oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ zhes bsgrags pas yum dang sras mchog bcas par lhun gyis grub bo// de dag gis bdud de la dmigs te sprul pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkye ba las/ de dag gis dkar po'i phyogs la dang pa'i lha srin dregs pa can ma rungs pa kun dbang du bsdus te/ de kun dang thabs gcig tu gnas nas/ de yi tshe bdud kyi rgyal po'i sprul pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ oM many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka ma ru tse te pa ta ye hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas sras mchog ya ma rA dza de srin po dang/ gshin rje dang/ bdud po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo ma ru tse bzhis dregs pa can thams cad kha lo rang dbang med par bsgyur bar byas so// oM a kro te ga shrI many+dzu ya man ta ka hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad kyi bso sgra dang cho lang

zil gyis gnon pa'i sgra 'brug stong lding ba lta bu bsgrags so// oM be ba sa ta e a mu khaM hU~M mA ra ya phaT/ ces pas/ thugs las sprul pa'i khro bo bdud sa 'dzin gyi sprul pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa thams cad la 'chi bdag gshin rje gshed dmar gnyen por sprul te btang ba de dag la/ mtshon cha be con byin dang ldan pa de nyid byin te btang ngo// de tshe dkar po'i phyogs la gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa/ gzhan yang lha ma srin sde brgyad thams cad kyang bdud kyi cho 'phrul 'khrug pas 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par mthong zhing/ nyid ston pa yang de nyid kyis ma rungs par byed par mthong nas/ la la ni sems dpa' zhing nga rgyal gyi dregs pas gzhom du chas so// la la ni dpung mang po bsdus te gzhom du chas so// la la ni mthus 'dul ba'i 'dul thabs kyis rmod pa la zhugs so// la la ni yid sdug bsngal bar gyur to// la la rab tu bred do// la la ni 'khor du skyabs rje la 'dus so// la la ni rang dbang med par dran pa dang bag med par zhabs 'og tu phyin par gyur pa las/ de nas de ma thag par yang bdud kyi rgyal po de gdul ba'i ched du gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa nas bzhengs nas gnas der yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs te/ drung na gnas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi yon tan kun 'dus pa/ dpal ldan dbang phyug chen po/ bdud kyi tshogs 'di rnams gdug cing zhe sdang che ba/ dad pa med cing log pa'i dad pa can rdo rje theg pa la smod pa 'ba' zhig ste/ yongs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas nas kyang ma rungs pas blo bsgyur la/ rgyud kha lo phyin cig log tu bsgyur te/ rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pas/ rdo rje theg pa yun ring du spyod pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i ched du bdud kyi dpung tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ rigs lnga'i dngos grub yal cing/ phur bu dang/ ma mo dang/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang yal cing ring bar gyur ba'i tshe/ de dag gi mthu byin mi yal cing mi ring myur ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gshin rje dmar po'i mthu dang 'phrin las bshad du gsol/ ces gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo ya man+ta ka sras 'jam dpal ma ru tse la spyan seng ge ltar gzigs te cang mi gsung bar ting nge 'dzin rol pa'i ngang du bzhugs so// de'i byin brlabs las bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ru tse thugs kyi 'khor lo bskor cing bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rab tu legs so// gsang ba'i theg pa la

gnod pa bdud kyi sde thams cad gdul ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so// da ngas bshad kyis nyon cig ces gsungs te/ shin tu dbang drag rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen por de ma thag tu snang bar byas so// de nas phyogs kun tu 'khor kun la rab tu seng ge'i lta stangs kyi bltas te/ sku'i sprul pa dang/ gsung gi grags pa dang/ thugs kyi mtshon cha dang/ yon tan gyi dbang phyug dang/ 'phrin las kyi rol pa zhes pa'i gsang ba dam pa lnga rab tu bsgrags pas/ slar bdud kyi sde dkar po'i phyogs la mi dad pa thams cad rab tu myos te gnas so// la la ni dkar po'i las la gus pas 'khor rnams dang stabs gcig tu gnas so// la la ni dbang med par dad pas 'dun cing res 'ga' ni las la nyan/ res 'ga' ni mi nyan par bsam zhing gnas so// la la ni dbang med par lhan ne gnas so// de yi tshe rang byung gi ye shes rig pa byang chub sems las ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs dpag tu med par sprul te/ 'khor dang bcas pas rngam pa'i gsung sgra bsgrags par/ yul chen po gshin yul rme nag ces bya bar/ gshin gyi bla mtsho mer bar de rab tu yang mer mer 'jigs par gyur/ gshin gyi ro blo dmar po'i thang ni rab tu yang slo bar gyur/ gshin ri phyin ci log ni rab tu yang phyin ci log tu snang bar gyur/ zam kha ro lam khung bu ni sub cing med la khad par gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gul ba dang/ ldeg pa dang/ ya ma yo ma dang/ mer mer dang/ shig shig pa dang/ tor tor dang/ mtho ba dang/ dma' ba la sogs pa bltas chen po bco brgyad bstan pa las// de nas yang de ma thag tu gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gshin rje dang/ bdud dang/ ma mo dang/ bal mo dang/ ging dang/ bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas/ de ma thag tu rang gi ston pa la 'dun to// ston pa chen po gshin rje'i rgyal po la gsol pa/ e ma ho/ dregs pa chen po rnams 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni ngo mtshar che ba'o// 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni 'byung bar dka' ba ste/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i theg pa chen po'i cho 'phrul lags so// bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i dus la bab par 'byung ba ste/ re zhig na bdud kyi rtsod pa yod pa 'dul bar nges so// bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la thugs rdo rje'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan nas/ 'dren pa'i thabs kyi sgo mang po mdzad de bde ba la bkod pa bzhin/ gzhan yang phyis kyang bde ba la 'god par nges pas/ gshin rje'i rgyal po'i 'khor na g.yog dang/ bran dang/ yang bran dang bcas pa dkar po'i phyogs la dam tshig dam bcas pa rnams myur

du 'dus shig/ ces brjod pas/ de ma thag tu gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ bdud dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma mo la sogs pa 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'dus te bka' stsal nyan par gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po yis/ gsang ba'i bdag po la gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po lag na rdo rje gsor ba/ kye gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni bskal ba dpag tu med pa las kyang lan 'ga' las mi 'byung ste/ bskal pa de dag thams cad la bar bar du mun pa'i bskal pa 'ong zhing/ bar bar du sgron ma'i bskal pa 'ong bar bdag cag gis thos so// mun pa'i bskal pa'i chen bdud kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa smin pa ste/ sgron ma'i tshe bdud rab tu 'pham pas bdud kyi bsam pa rab tu ma smin pa'o// de lta bas na bdag 'khor dang bcas pa sngon bskal pa sgron ma'i tshe/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba rdo rje'i sgrub thabs la zhugs pas/ de'i rgyu dang 'bras bus 'jig rten na dbang dang mthu che bar skyes pa lags te/ res 'ga' ni bdud kyi tshogs dang chas mthun du spyod par gyur te/ sngar ma shes par spyad pas rgyu de las 'bras bu de ltar gyur pa'o// de lta bas na sngon sten pa'i stobs kyis rdo rje theg pa la dga' zhing skyong ba dang srung bar gyur te/ 'dzin cing bde ba'i sa la gnas par gyur bas/ gang na thugs rje'i cho 'phrul g.yos pa de rab tu 'du ba lags pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ gsang ba'i rdo rje theg pa'i ltas dang cho 'phrul 'di rgyu gang las byung/ rkyen cis byas/ 'dul ba'i zhing gang nas nges par byung/ bdag cag gis sngar khye'u sngon po nam mkha' lding la dam tshig nos ba'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag pos las kyi slob dpon dang grogs kyi dam pa mdzad pa lags pas/ da yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nges pa 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ston pa 'di'i don cig la ston pa la/ gsang ba'i bdag po khyod ni sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su snang ba dbang bskur bas gsang sngags dang gzung sngags rig sngags thams cad la dbang bsgyur te/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la yang dbang bskur cig/ ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ gshin rje'i rgyal po dri ba rab tu legs so// dad pa dang ldan par nges so// sgrib pa dag par nges so// lung bstan thob par nges so// las 'phro sad par nges so// de lta 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdud kyi rgyal pos 'dzin gyis bsam pa ngan pa cig btang bas/ bdud kyi tshogs dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa rdul phra rab tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab nas gnas pa las/ de rnams kyis 'gro ba kun kyang kha lo log par bsgyur te/ gang na byang chub

sems dpa' gnas pa rnams la bar du gcod pa'i bdud du gyur pas/ de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs par gyur pa las/ snying po byang chub las bzhengs te/ stong pa nyid du bshig nas thugs rje chen po'i ye shes chen po bskyed nas cho 'phrul sprul pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rol pas/ bdud sde thams cad bzlog cing tshar gcad pa'i phyir cho 'phrul bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ kyai gsang ba'i bdag po bdud de rnams ji ltar bar du gcod pa la 'du/ ji ltar byung ba lags/ de lta bu'i bdud de rnams bdag 'khor dang bcas pas gdul bar dbang skur cig/ ces gsol pa las// gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos bka' stsal pa/ gshin rje'i rgyal po ma ru rtse nyon cig/ dper na ston ka'i lo thog rgyas par byed pa la/ sems can srog chags dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ 'byung po la sogs pa ma snyom pas gnod pa'i dgra mang du 'du ba lta bur/ gang na byang chub dang phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bdud kyi tshogs kyis bar du gcod du 'byung ngo// gang na snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang/ gsang ba rdo rje theg pa la spyod pa la bar du gcod pa'i bdud mang du 'byung ba ni/ gshin rje'i rgyal po 'di ltar 'byung ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas na bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug ces bya ba'i 'khor na bdud kyi blon po bzhi yod do// btsun mo pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba la/ yid kyi me tog gi mda' yod de/ me tog de ni dug gi me tog yin te/ gang la phog pa dam tshig dang 'bral bar byed pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ 'dre srin thams cad sdongs te bdud kyi rgyal po dang blon po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsams pas dbang bsgyur te bar du gcod du 'ong ngo// gang na gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa la zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams/ don dam par sgrub pa la zhugs pa'i dus su blon po 'du shes bzlog pas log lta skyed par byed do// yang blon po g.yeng byed kyis g.yeng ba gtong bar byed do// yang blon po chags byed kyis chags kyi sems kyi tshogs mang po skyed par byed do// yang blon po 'thab byed kyis rtsod pas 'khrug par byed do// bdud de dag gis gang don dam pa'i sgrub pa 'dor 'jug ste/ phung po'i bdud dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud dang/ lha'i bu'i bdud du gyur te/ de ltar shes pas na bdud bzhi bzlog par 'dod pas lha'i bdud kyi cho 'phrul bzlog na kun bzlogs so// de bzlog pa'i phyir khyed 'khor dang bcas pas gsang ba'i theg pa la sdang ba'i dgra dang bgegs thams cad 'dul bar

dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang dregs pa chen po de dag la gsol pa/ kye kye dregs pa'i rgyal po rnams/ gang na bstan par dar ba'i bstan pa'i sdang byed thams cad phung bar bya ba'i phyir/ so so rang rang gi srog gi snying po las kyi 'dul skal dpa' bo chen po la smos shig/ ces gsungs pas/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas gsol pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po bdag 'khor dang bcas pa phyi nang gsang ba'i lha ma srin sde brgyad du gyur pas ni/ sngar dpa' bo chen po dang gsang ba'i bdag po la/ rang rang gi srog rgyud dang 'phrin las phul zin pa de bzhin te/ da de las brjod du yod na na ra skan 'gyur re skan no// dpa' bo chen pos byin gyis brlabs nas/ dregs pa can thams cad la rtog pa'i rang rgyud brjod kyis mi lang bar gnas so// bdag gis dpung dang bcas pa ma ru rtse la yang rtog pa 'bum sde dpa' bos byin rlabs de yod pa de ltar bsgrub pas na/ 'di lta ste/ las sgrub pa'i phyir gnam lcag thog gi sta re/ sgrol ba'i mtshon cha ngar dang ldan pa'i thabs kyi las yod pas/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pas dpa' bo chen po gtso bo khyod la smra bar bya'o// zhes gsol te zhus pa/ kye ma ho bcom ldan dges chen po// 'jam dbyangs zhi ba chen po dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor lngas// rang bzhin med pa'i chos gsungs pas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rtsa ba'i drung// dbyung zhing phyin pa rab dga' bas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa nub ka'i tshe// dus kyi tha ma tha ma'i tshe// mtshams med las ngan dar bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan la mi nyan pa// bdud kyi cho 'phrul rab smin te// gnod sbyin gdong dmar dbang chen 'gyur// bdud kyi dmag dpung sprin gtibs nas// cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa la// sangs rgyas thugs rje 'dul ba yi// rab 'jigs chen po ma bstan na// sems can kha lo log pa yis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'phel ba'i phyir// bdud kyi gnyen po bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas// de nas 'jam dpal ya man ta ka thugs su gsol de mnyam pa las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje lag na 'dzin pa la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye nga'i rigs dang sder gyur pa thams cad 'dus shig/ ces lan gsum bsgrags pas/ 'khor ye shes dang las la grub pa bye ba dung phyur 'dus so// de'i tshe bdud lha sbyin dang dga' rab dbang phyug 'khor bcas kyang rab tu dregs pa che bas/ 'gran gyi do med pa srid pa gsum 'dul bar byed pa kun bka' nyan par gnas te/ de bdud kyi yul mkhar dang dpung la gsang sngags kyi thabs dang lta spyod ldan pa'i mthus khrag gi zor rgyogs 'phang ba'i phyir/ zor btang ba'i las

bcol lo zhes lang ka'i bdag po dge slong char kha nag po zhes bya ba/ bdud thams cad kyi rje bo slar log pa daM la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bdud ru dra chen po grub pa lang ka'i bdag po/ bdud kun gyi gnyen po khyod yin pas/ bdud 'di rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas pa ma rungs par byed pa dang byas pa 'di rnams kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa'i sprul pa dang rbod gtong bzlog tu gsol/ zhes 'khor de dag gis smras pas/ bdud kyi rgyal bos tshig gsan te/ slar ma ru rtse bzhi la sogs pa lan smras pa/ 'jig rten khams 'di dag tu bdud kyi cho 'phrul dang mthu bzlog pa'i thabs yod de/ gang gis thabs 'di shes par gyur na sngags kyi las thams cad 'grub ste/ gshin rje 'bum gyi chad pa dang/ ma mo 'bum gyi dal kha dang/ bdud nag 'bum gyi khram kha dang/ btsan po 'bum gyi shod sde dang/ nag po klu 'bum chad ka dang/ ki kang gza' yi gdug rtsub dang/ sngags mkhan bdag po 'bum gyi smod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur te/ gang na bdud sa 'dzin gyi sprul ba bsam pa ngan pa thams cad lta ci smos zhes te/ las 'di dge slong char kha nag pos nyi ma phyed na bdud kyi rgyogs khrag gi zor shan pa dmar nag gi las stabs bcas te/ nam phyed na dregs pa can thams cad dmag dpung du bsdus nas bdud kyi dpung tshogs la 'phangs pa/ sha ri b+h+yo/ shar phyogs nas mon pa dang pra ma rA dza ma rA dzi srin po'i 'khor tshogs dang bcas dug zor 'phangs so// ma ri b+h+yo/ lho phyogs nas ma mo 'bum gshin rje ya ma rA dza dang bcas pas 'phangs so// khrag la ma ma b+h+yo/ ma mo srid pa'i rgyal po'i ngad las nad kyi 'ja' tshon lnga nyi ltar 'khyil ba las/ ma tshogs bdud pho mo sde lnga dang bcas pas khrag zor 'phangs so// tsa ra'i snying la b+h+yo/ shan pa'i ging bdud gnod sbyin snying 'phro gis mtshon zor du 'phangs so// snying la b+h+yo/ ma tri thod khrag dza/ ging mo ma bdud e ka dza ti ming sring mon mo dang ging gi tshogs kyis snying zor 'phangs so// khrag ti snying la ya/ ma bdud re ma ti spun bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas rdo zor 'phangs so// ni sri chod do// phung gsum khrag gdong dug gi mchi ris can tshogs kyis 'phang zor shag stong me zor du 'phangs so// nA ga chod/ klu bdud kyi rgyal po klu gnyan sa bdag btsan dmar 'bum dang bcas pas dug tog sna tshogs zor du 'phangs so// mu lo chod/ bdud yam yul lha'i 'khor dang bcas pas mi kha'i sbyor ba sna gu zor du 'phangs so// sha lo chod/ gza' bdud chen po gza' dang skar ma'i 'khor dang bcas te dud pa dang bal phur du 'phangs so// sha la kying kying b+h+yo b+h+yo/ gdong mo bzhi mo khrag gi ser ba gtong ba dang/ tha ba mo bzhi nad kyi

kha rlangs khrag phor 'thor ba dang ging pho mo ma rungs pa dang bcas te spang skams khrag dang bcas pa'i zor 'phangs so// sa ma yA sho na mu ka dang/ bdag nyid chen mo dang/ bse mo la sogs pa dam can kun gyi phur bu dar gyi cod pan dang rtsang zor 'phangs so// a ti kra ma ni/ lha'i rgyal po tri shu la sogs pa lha dmag 'bum phrag gis nyungs zor dang mtshe zor 'phangs so// pa ra pa tri mA ra ya bzlog/ srid pa gsum gyi bdag po srog bdag chen po srog bdag chen pos srid pa gsum gyi dbang chen pos srid pa gsum gyi dbang can dang bcas pas bsdus te/ dpa' bo khro bo ya man ta ka dang/ khro mo e ka dzA ti ma sras mchog sprul pa'i pho nya shan pa ra khrid dang kyi khrid la sogs pas de rnams thams cad kyi las dril te khrag gi kong bu gru gsum gtor dang 'phangs so// de ltar lan bcu gsum du dregs pa sde tshan bcu gsum gyis dge slong sngags bdag char kha nag pos las mkhan byas te rgyogs 'phangs pas/ thams cad kyis kun nas dpung dril te 'phangs pas/ sa 'dzin kun khyab bdud lha sbyin gyi sprul ba mang po 'bros pa'i sa gang du bros pas kyang 'bros sa ma rnyed par khrag zor me dpung gi rgyogs bab ste phung bar byas so// ging rje chen po bzhis 'phangs pa/ ti bur shag b+h+yo/ ti pur shag b+h+yo/ ti pur tsan+t+ra tsakra b+h+yo/ ti pur me shul rtsur ni b+h+yo/ ti pur ma ra na b+h+yo/ zhes shar dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi ging tshogs kyis mda' zor 'phangs so// par phi dan tsin de tsin da la b+h+yo/ ma ma rag rak+Sha mu tra snying kha rag thun b+h+yo b+h+yo bzlog bzlog/ sngags bsrungs kyi bdag mos phyogs thams cad du khrag zor 'phangs te/ snying sha ku ru thun/ b+h+yo b+h+yo mA ra ya bzlog bzlog/ ces pas bdud kyi dpung bya nag la rdo rgyab pa bzhin gyur to// de nas dge slong sngags kyi bdag po char kha nag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po bdud bzhi bcom mo// yon tan dang ldan no// mtha' gnyis rtog pa las grol bas bdud kyi skyon las 'das so// bdag ni gzhan gyi dpal mgon du gyur to// log par ltas pa'i lus sems chom non no zhes pas/ de nas dpa' bo chen po sku zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi par bstan te/ sku dang zhal gsum mthing la rngam pa/ rdo rje zhing gi dbyug pa dang dgra sta ral gri g.yas na bsnams pa/ sdig zhags dang mdung thung thod rlon g.yon na bsnams pa/ gshin rje pho mo ma hes brdzis pa'i steng na bzhugs te/ me dpung gi klong dur khrod kyi rgyan chas dang zhal gsum dang sku mthing la rngam pa/ spyan dang tshems bgrad cing gtsigs pa/ ye shes kyi me 'bar ba/ sha khrag rus pa zhal du rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thabs cig mdzad pa tsam las/

gshin rje pho mo thams cad dbang du 'dus pa ni/ dper nam mkha' la sprin 'dus pa lta bur gyur te/ bdud mi snying la zhugs nas bar chod byed pa de rnams thams cad kyi lus dang ngag sems kyi gdug rtsub tul gyis tshig par gyur to// zhabs ri rab kyi steng du mnan te brkyang bskum du bas bdud ma rungs pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad mnan par gyur to// de nas kun khyab sa 'dzin bdud kyi rgyal po'i snying la gzer te/ sprul pa 'phrom nus par gyur te/ bdud mthud dpung dang bkrag nyams te lhan ne gnas par gyur to// de nas dge slong sngags kyi bdag po char kha nag po dang/ gshin rje'i rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa stabs gcig tu gnas te/ gsang ba'i bdag po la gsol ba/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po ma 'ongs pa'i don bstan pa bsrungs pa phyi rabs kyi ched du/ bdud kyis log par 'drid ba/ rdo rje theg pa la snang ba rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ las kyi sbyor kha gshin rje dmar po dregs pa can rnams kyis dregs pa can rnams kyi 'phrin las dpal ya man+ta ka gtso bo chen pos gang bshad pa de kho bzhin 'grub bas zhu ru gsol/ zhes gsol te/ dpal khro bo ya man ta ka'i thad ka drung du phungs phungs der 'dus te/ yang gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po bdag cag gis las thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ sngar gsungs pa'i rtog pa la rnol ngar gyis gdags pa shes par bya ba las kyi thug mtha' 'di dag bdud sa 'dzin gyi 'khor dang sde tshan gcad pa bzhin phyis kyang gcad pa dang/ rdo rje theg pa'i las la spyod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i las byin gyis rlobs shig/ ces smras so// de nas dpa' bo khro bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ gshin rje'i rgyal po ma ru rtse tshogs legs so// rab tu legs so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdud/ sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos sprul pa bkye nas/ kun tu khyab nas gnas pa las/ da lta da nyid kyis dbang du bsdus zil gyis mnan te/ bdud de rnams gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa rgyud dang/ lung dang/ man ngag la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa la 'du shes bzlog pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ g.yeng ba dang/ chags pa la sogs rnam par ma dag pa'i rgyud la zhugs te/ bar du gcod du 'ong ba ngas bltas te de tshar phyis kyang gcad pa'i phyir/ dregs pa can thams cad kyi mdo rgyud chen po/ rmod pa kun 'dus pa'i 'phrin las/ gsang ba'i rgyud dang sngags kyi rgyud so so'i rtog pa ma ru rtse 'bum sde 'dod pa bzhin bshad pa'o// de lta bu'i las 'di dag dus lnga brgya tha ma la rab tu gces par 'gyur bas/ khyed rnams kyi 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar po'i dge

'dun du gnas pa'i don du dregs pa can thams cad kyi mdo rgyud gsang ba dang/ sngags kyi tan tra las su rung bar bya ba dang/ dregs pa shan pa thams cad kyi rmod pa kun 'dul gyi las kha bsgyur ba'i las/ rang gi las kyi 'dul skal du/ sgrol ging dmar po'i mtshon cha rno la ngar gyis bslud pa// rmod sngags byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes kyang dbang bskur ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gyis shig/ ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin zla gsang dmar po/ bse mdung dug mda' nag po/ dmar po spu gri rag chod kyi rgyud/ gnam lcags thog gi sta re las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u dang khrag gi zor rgyogs kyis bdud dpung bcom pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dregs pa can thams cad kyi bdag po rgyal po gshin rje ma ru rtse zhes bya ba/ srin po ma ru rtse dang/ bdud ma ru rtse dang/ gnod sbyin ma ru rtse dang/ gnod sbyin mo gdug pa can dang/ bal mo bse mo gdug pa can dang/ ging pho mo rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor nas/ sgrol ging gi khro mo 'phrin las kyi bdag mo re ma ti dang bcas te/ bdag nyid kyi ston pa 'jam dpal dmar po dang khro mo e ka dza ti mngon par phyogs nas bltas te/ khye'u sngon ya man ta ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chen po dpal ldan chen po 'jam dpal ma ru rtse/ sgrol ging gi rgyal po/ ye shes dang las la grub pa'i gtso bo/ sku bstan pas kyang dregs pa can kun 'dul bar gyur te/ rdza 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir dbu gsum phyag drug pa'i las kyi las kyi sbyor kha dang/ dbu gcig phyag gnyis pa'i las sbyor ston cig/ de ltar du ni bdag gis rigs 'dzin tshogs kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyis brlab par bya ste/ de yi sgrub thabs bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje khro bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ dregs can chen po phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo sangs rgyas sku gsum bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su 'dus pas de zung zhig/ de nyid bdud ru dra'i sde 'dul ba'i phyir thugs khros pa khrag 'thung sum cu tham par gyur te/ ma sring nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang du bsdus te khro bo spros pas de zung zhig/ de dag kyang bdud dang srin po log 'dren 'dul bar thugs rdo rje srin por sprul te/ thugs ye shes kyi rol pa phyogs bcu'i khro bo bstan pas de zung zhig/ de nyid thams cad kyi sku mchog yon tan thams cad 'dus pa ste/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las thams cad 'dus pa'i sku 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste/ de thugs zhi ba chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs las khro bo ya man ta kar sprul te/ bgegs

rigs mi srun pa kun btul ba'o// de lta bu'i khro bo ni phyi ltar bstan pa gdong drug dang/ nang ltar bstan pa gdong gsum pa dang/ gsang ba ltar bstan pa gdong gcig du yang bstan cing/ stong bye ba sa ya la sogs par yang cho 'phrul bstan pa'o// de'i phyag kyang bcu gnyis dang/ drug dang/ gnyis dang/ zhabs kyang drug dang/ bzhi dang/ gnyis la sogs pa phyi nang gsang bar bstan te/ stong bye ba sa ya la sogs par yang cho 'phrul bstan to// dpa' bo chen po de'i thugs kyi sras su gyur pa ya ma rA dza zhes bya ba dregs pa thams cad kyi gnyen po ging dang ma mo thams cad las la 'dzud pa'i skur gyur pas/ las kyi bdag po de'i phyag mtshan ni 'di lta ste/ res 'ga' ni spu gri dang lcags kyu bsnams te ging dang sku mchog dmag dpon thams cad las la 'dzud do// res 'ga' ni me dang rlung gi 'khor los gtso bo bzhi las la 'dzud do// res 'ga' ni be con dang zhabs pa can de 'chi bdag kun 'dul lo// res 'ga' ni rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub kyis skyes bu ging pho mo thams cad 'dul zhing 'byung po yongs kyang 'dul ba/ don dam par thugs kyi sras mchog ye shes shes rab kyi ral gris phyin ci log gi lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa thams cad gcod par mdzad de/ thugs rje'i zhags pas gang dang gang la bab pa thams cad 'dren no// rgyal ba'i sras po de la rtog 'dzin mi mnga' yang/ ji ltar mos pas 'dul ba ltar cho 'phrul gnyen por snang ba'o// de lta bas na dregs pa kun 'dul ba zhes bya ba las thams cad grub pa'i ston pa ni sku gsum ye shes drug dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis/ skye ba bzhi bdud bzhi dbang du song ba gnon te/ dug gsum rtsad nas gcod cing rgyu drug gnas su sbyang ngo// skye ba bzhi tshar gcad nas de'i phyir ngas cho 'phrul 'di lta bu sngar yang bstan to// da ltar yang bstan to// phyis kyang bstan par bya'o// 'dus pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis gang rnal 'byor la zhugs pa rnams la las gang 'dod pa bsam pa ltar sgrubs shig/ da ngas bshad kyis nyon cig/ lha bdun pa'i las su zung zhig/ dngos ma ru rtse mched lnga'i sgrub par zung zhig/ bsnyen pa nag po la bya'o// sgrub pa dmar po la bya'o// las sbyor ging la bya'o// sngar bstan pa'i nang gi phyogs la zhugs te/ sngon du bsnyen pa 'di bye ba gcig 'bum ri mo la rten de bya'o// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na thaM ban dza hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snyen pa ni/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ sgrub pa ni/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza dzA/ trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag mo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ raka mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma ting b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma hi b+h+yo/ ya ba lon tsin dan

ma snying khrag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ las kyi bsnyen pa ni/ oM AHhU~M/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya ya me do ru Na yo ta ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+she ya/ yak+she yats+tsha ni ra ma ya hU~M phaT/ dus rtag tu mchod pa ni/ oM ya man ta ka dza khA hi/ ya ma rA dza hu khA hi/ gu ya dz+nyA na muM khA hi/ ya ma ya tsa khA hi/ ma gshin tshogs kyi zhal du khA hi/ dmar nag ma ging gshin rje ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir dus rtag tu dran par bya'o// rtog pa ni rang rgyud du khrol cig/ ces gsungs so// de'i phyir zla gsang zhes bya'o// bse yi mdung dmar du mda' dmar po/ spu gri reg chod kyi rgyud/ gnas lcags thog gi sta ri las/ gleng bslang zhing bsnyen pa nag po la bya ba don du zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed po yis// 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i don ched du// 'jam dpal dam tshig bdag po'i sku// bse mkhar dmar po chen po ru// gshin rje dam tshig sgrub pa'i thabs// ging bdud la bgzhug pa dang// 'khu ldog thams cad mi 'byung dang// 'phrin las bka' rnams nyan pa'i phyir// dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po'i las/ 'chi bdag ya ma rA dza'i thun/ kha thun nag po zhes bya ba// gsad pa las kyi brnag pa bshad// de nas myur du las grub phyir// zangs khang bse mkhar dmar por bsgyur// dam tshig bse mkhar sgrub pa bshad// dben drag bkra shis gnas btsal te// dam rdzas gtor ma sha khrag dang// khrag chang 'byor tshad bdud rtsi dbul// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba bca'// gsad pa'i ling ga drag po thun// bse mkhar bca' zhing bcang bar bya// ba glang dmar po'i sha khrag dang// 'o ma dam tshig blangs te bsrungs ting 'dzin stong nyid snying rje hU~M// lha ni dmar po yab yum sgom// sku bskyed pa dang bskul ba dang// rgyun gyi snying po nyid mtshan drang// sngags ni ma 'khrugs pa ru bzlas sngags kyi thun kha dbab par bya// dmar po srog la shan par rbad// lha sgom sngags bzlas las la bskul// phur pa gdab cing zor thun dbab// bsregs nas btab ste gtor ma btang// rlung la bskur te brlag par smon// reg chod rdo rje spu gri yin// sgrub ba'i thabs bstan pa dang las kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas drag sngags yang dag pa// mkhas pas de don shes par bzung// oM ya ma rA dza ging baM hU~M/ yaM kro d+hi shwa ri be ta li baM hU~M/ ya ma rA dza sa twa me ya snying la to ru na baM ril rbad/ ma ma trag rak+sha snying la thuM ril rbad/ sku bskyed pa dang bskul ba'o// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza sa twa me ya/ yaM yaM thums thums/ gshin rje nag po'i snying khrag la thun b+h+yo/ ma ru tse tsa la hur thums/ tri ling shang ka du tri za yag sha rbad pu phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig/ dgra bo nr-i mA ra ya/ tsa

tsa rA dza rbad/ rgyun gyi snying po nyin par drang// oM shrI many+dzu u tsus rma rnal ma rnal te b+h+yo/ gshin rje nag po'i snying khrag la tshal b+h+yo/ kuM kuM ta ki nri/ ta kiM nri/ haM haM ma ra gi dza/ rgyun gyi snying po mtshan mo drang ya ma rA dza sa ta me yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje mug to me yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje kha to me yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje kha thun nag po thun dzubs/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje nag po sum b+h+yo/ gshin rje nag po dun dun b+h+yo/ kring kring rA dza ma ni snying shad shad b+h+yo/ nri dzA dzA nri dzA dzA/ snying kha rag snying kha rag/ rak+sha du na thu lu lu shag/ rak+sha mun tang ni dza b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu dgra bo la las kyi thun phob/ khrag nad phob/ rims nad phob/ badzra yak+sha mA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ dmar po rak+sha snying khrag la khug ril rbad/ mngag tsing thun kha dbab pa dang/ dmar po srog la rbad par bya// bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa dang// sgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po bya// bsnyen pa nag po dag la yang// rab tu byas na ging bdun 'khol// sgrub pa dmar po dag la yang// rab tu byas na dmag dpung 'bebs// las sbyor ging chen pho mo la// rab tu byas na srid pa 'khrug/ dam tshig bse mkhar gyi bdag po gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bstod cing las la bskul// hU~M/ mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gshin rje dmar po yab yum gshegs su gsol// rak+ta rba glong 'khrugs pa'i maN+Dal na// srog bdud dri za bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// thugs kyi sras mchog 'jam dpal dmar po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// sku mdog dmar po me yi ral pa can// ral pa'i rtse la ban+d+ha lcang los brgyan// spyan nas me yi tsha tshas dgra bgegs bsreg/ shangs nas rlung 'byung sa gzhi bar snang 'khrug/ snyan nas 'brug ldir srid gsum zil gyis gnon// 'bar ba'i ag tshoms nag po glog stong 'gyu// dgra bgegs snying nas 'dren mdzad mche ba gtsigs// g.yas kyi dang po be con dbyug pa thogs// g.yon gyi dang po zangs kyi spu gri bsnams// dgra bgegs spu gris gtubs la dbyug thos gtogs// g.yas kyi bar ma me yi 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon gyi bar ma rlung gi 'khor lo bsnams// dgra bgegs me yis bsregs la rlung gis gtor// g.yas kyi tha ma bdud khram dgra sta bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dung dmar zhal du rdub// dgra bgegs mgo lus gshogs la snying khrag 'thung// bdud kyi khram la thob la zhags pas chings// myur bar sdigs mdzub tshugs la dbang du bsdus// sku stod ko rlon zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// sku smad dpa' brtul stag gi sham thabs can// sbrul nag stong gis sku dang yan lag brgyan// mche ba

gtsigs shing dgra sha rlon pa za// khro bo'i rgyan cha sna tshogs sku la brgyan// srin po gshin rje bdud dang gnod sbyin dang// ma mo bal mo ging bdud las la gtong// me dpung dmar nag 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs// dbang drag khros pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yon tan bye bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// mchod cing bstod 'bum rtag tu khyod la 'dud// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs nas// thugs rje'i spyan gyis rtag tu bdag la gzigs// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// lha mchog khyod la gang dag su rten pa// mi yi tha ma rnams kyang mchog tu 'gyur// thams cad khyod kyi skur ni gsal bsgoms na// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka bder 'tshal nas// srog gi phyir yang lha mchog mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzangs sngon du btang ba dang// bdag la gnod par byed pa'i dgra ngang bgegs// zung zhig chings shig sgrol cig rnam par non// khyod ltar bdag gyur de phyir bstod phyag 'tshal// 'jigs byed khro bo'i thugs dam dgyes bskul ba// gshin rje'i yum la bdud kyi lcam gcig ma// mi srin nag mo srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma// dre nag chibs shing mi lpags rlon pa gsol// mi mgo stong gis ral pa'i zar bu brgyan// mig nas khrag 'dzag khrag nad rgyu gzer gtong// sna nas dbugs phyung phyugs nad phyags mas 'debs// zhal nas me 'bar mtsho skems rims nad gtong// klu bdud pho nyar 'gyed cing mdze nad gtong// lag na lcags kyu khra bam nad rkyal thogs// dam nyams zung la khram thob nad kha phob// sha za lce spyang dam nyams bla la rbod// nyams pa'i snying phyung snying khrag gtso la stob// dgra bo dbang du bsdu ba'i dus la bab// gshin rje dmar po sgrol ging yab yum gyis// brnag pa'i dgra bgegs tshogs rnams brlag par mdzod// 'jam dpal thugs las sprul pa yang sprul ni// sku yi sprul pa gshin rje ma ru rtse// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms par mdzad// nga rgyal khros pa sdang ba'i dgra bgegs gshed// bka' 'khor gshin rje 'bum ni las la 'gyed// gsung gi sprul pa srin po ma ru rtse// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang khros pa dam nyams dgra bo'i gshed// bka' 'khor srin po 'bum ni las la 'gyed// thugs kyi sprul pa bdud po ma ru rtse// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms par mdzad// 'dod chags khros pa dam nyams dgra bo'i gshed// bka' 'khor bdud po 'bum ni las la 'gyed// las kyi sprul pa gnod sbyin ma ru rtse// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'jom par

mdzad// phrag dog khros pa dam nyams dgra bo'i gshed// bka' 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum ni las la 'gyed// mon mo khros pa ma mo gdug pa can// e ka dzA ti nag mo re ma ti// gnod sbyin ma mo gdug pa 'bum dang bcas// gshin rje dmar po'i 'phrin las grub par mdzad// bal mo khros pa bse mo gdug pa can// yang byin de byin bse byin phag byin ma// gtso mo blon mo bran dang yang bran bcas// nyis brgya lnga bcus dmar po'i las mdzad ma// dmar po mched bzhi sprul pa bka' nyan bzhi// bse yi skye bu gtum po mched de bzhi// sku mchog dmar po bco brgyad ging dang bcas// dmar po shan pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// gshin rje dmar po'i phyi yi dge bsnyen ni// mgon po 'dul mdzad ma hA ka la'i sku// rgyal po 'dul mdzad srog bdag spyan gcig pa// gtsan gong 'dul mdzad rdo rje legs pa'i sku// klu srin 'dul mdzad yam shod dmar po'i sku// sku bzhi khro bo sgrol gang byin pa bzhi// rang rang 'khor g.yog sprul pa grags mang yang// gtsor ni 'gong po dpun dgu las la gtong// dam nyams dgra la phung dkrugs 'bebs par mdzad// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das dregs pa'i tshogs// ye shes las dang las kyi khro bo'i tshogs// 'jig rten dregs pa bka' yi las mdzad pa// gshin rje dmar po gtso 'khor kun 'dus tshogs// bcol ba'i 'phrin las ma thogs myur du mdzod// ces gsungs so// 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bas rtag tu bse mkhar bcas shing bsnyen sgrub byas pas bsam pa yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur ro// bse mdung dmar po/ dug mda' nag po/ spu gri reg chod kyi rgyud gnam lcags thog gi sta ri/ gnod sbyin zla gsang dmar po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bse mkhar gyi bdag po las la bskul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gshin rje dmar po rtsa ba'i sgrub lugs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gnas sam sum thog rtse// yang na brag ri dgon pa ru// sa chog byas te maN+Dal bsham// thod ngan dag la dgra gzugs bri// maN+Dal khongs su pho brang gdab// dmar po'i pho brang btab par dmigs// de nas zhi khro'i bsnyen pa bya// ya man ta ka yang ni bstod// de nas dmar po'i las la 'jug/ rnal 'byor gang la mos pa'i las// gtsor ni de bzhin dam rdzas sgrub// srog la sgrub pa'i srog sgrub dang// zhal la sgrub pa'i zhal sgrub dang// thun la sgrub pa'i thun sgrub gsum// yan lag grogs dang bcas pa bsham// srog ni tsi ra dag yin te// ra dang ra mgo ra snying la// srog dang srog sgrub srog thun bya// zhal ni thod pa 'khor lo ste// gshin rje'i zhal phyung thod 'khor la// zhal dang zhal

sgrub zhal thun bya// thun ni dug khrag nyungs rdzas te// ban d+ha nag po rar bcos nas// thun dang thun sgrub thun zor bya// dmar po phur pa'i sgrub pa dang// dmar po hom nag sgrub pa dang// dmar po dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang// srog sgrub zhal sgrub thun sgrub la// las kyi grogs su shes pas spyad// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sngar ni bsnyen pa mthar phyin pas// de nas dmar po 'khor dang bcas// bsnyen dang sgrub dang las la bskul// dang po gtso bo bsnyen par bya// las la bskul dang bsnyen sgrub ni// stong nyid ngang las snying rjer bzhengs// rig pa hU~M dmar gcig tu dmigs// chu las chu bur rdol ba ltar// rak+ta'i mtsho dkyil zla stengs su// dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// me rlung 'khor lo thogs pa bskyed// de las ci yang mi sgom par// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// go bzlog bsnyen pa'i rim pa bya// mtshon cha gter dang nyo dang brdung// grub pa'i rtags mtshan mthong ba dang// bsnyen pa brgya brgya rtsa brgyad kyis// nyin dang mtshan gyi mgo drangs nas// gnod sbyin dmar pos dmag dpung dbab// rtag tu btsun chen rtags mang nas// srin pos dgra bo ngos 'dzin gtang// rang rgyud dmar po grub pa yin// sngags rgod rim pas rtags tshad bsnyen// go mtshon mi bshar mang mthong nas// gtso bo las kyi sngags rgod dang// gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje dag/ nyin dang mtshan du dril byas la// nang nub rgyun gtor btang zhing bskul// yid ches rngam pa'i sems drod 'byung// de nas bdud po rgyan du gtang// bdud kyi cho 'phrul nges par 'byung// de nas de la rim pa yis// nyin mtshan phye nas mo sngags sgrub// mi rta khyi yi snying rten cing// sha chen rak+ta sman phud dang// gtor ma breng nge btang bar bya// 'phrin las las la sbyor ba'i tshe// gzas pa mgar ba a lags gis// gzugs brnyan ming rus rten bcas nas// dug gtor sgro dang hom phur dang// dam rdzas gtor ma drag po rnams// dkyil 'khor la bkod sgrub pa bya// ra 'am ra thod ra snying ngam// ra yi sog pa g.yas pa la// bsnyen pa rab 'bring tha ma yis// sngags kyi 'phrin las drag tu phyar// rtsa ba'i lha lnga dmar po'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje yis// bse dmar srog tig brnag pa'i las// srog gi chan pa'i las 'di bshad// de yang snying po sngags rgod ni// bod rbad gsad pa drag sngags rnams// mkhas pas gtso 'khor rtsa ba las// rim pa shes pas drang ba las// ci dgar bzlas na rang phung zhing// ma nyes bstabs na tshur la gdon// kun la na chad pa 'ong// dben gnas yid 'ong

nyams dga' bar// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum bya// zla kham 'khor lo bar 'khyams dang// sgo khyud la sogs tshul bzhin bri// dbus su gshed po yab yum dang// thugs kyi sras mchog dgod par bya// bse mo bzhi dang blon mo dang// bse yi skyes bu la sogs pa// mchog phur lcags phur bya phur zangs// tsan dan la sogs phur bu la// mngags te rim pas dkyil 'khor dgod// srin mo ging gi rtsang phur dang// 'o ma khrag dag sbrang rtsi dang// mar khu phyar ba'i dam rdzas dgod// dpal gyi gtor ma zla gam la// dug tor gru gsum rtse la dgod// tsa ra rog po zangs ltag can// dmigs pa'i ming byang bcas la bzhag/ rnel dri ru stongs la sogs su// so so'i rdzas dang thun rdzas bsags// dbus su bse mkhar phab nas kyang// ting 'dzin rnam gsum tshul bzhin sgom// bskang ba'i rgyu mchog dam rdzas dang// sman rag dza gad gtor tshogs bcas// dang po zhi khro bskang bshags te// bstod cing mchod nas drag po 'jug/ bdag nyid gshed por gsal bsgoms nas// yum gnyis lus dang grib bzhin bskyed// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// yi ge hU~M ni dmar nag las// sgrol ging bdag po ma ru rtse// sku che yan lag rags pa bskyed// oM badzra yak+sha ma ru tse dun dun/ ben con g.yas paM sdigs mdzub g.yon// bdud kyi gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// de la dza dang ma 'phros las// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las te// spyan shangs ljags thugs yan lag bzhi// ma ru rtse dang bse mo bskyed// spyan drangs bstim ste mnyes mchod dbul// bstod cing thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// bod rbad gsad pa'i las la 'jug/ oM sa ma ya shrI many+dzu ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dzA ti dzA dzA/ trag rak+sha mu tra kha mu ru lu ru lu ru b+h+yo// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dzA sa twa me ya yaM yaM thum thum/ gshin rje nag po snying khrag la dun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtse tsa la hur thums// sbugs la thums/ srog la yaM yaM dzA dzA/ oM su tri ba ya/ bar tsit+ta yo gi sha ri ya ma tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ de nas khyi khrid btang/ ma ma ma la yaM btang/ oM tsi bi ri tsikra ba na sa ma yA tshal pa a nir tri mA ra ya/ oM gu sha dzA dzA nA ga ma ra dza/ shu shu rak+sha ya/ oM la gus ma du hu lu lir myos na rgal ga gzer ga sna ya/ tri ling shang ka du tang/ gzhan yang drag sngags rnams ci rigs gtang ngo// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor sgom// sring mos bkug cing ming pos bsgral// rang gi bzlas pa dgra la bsam// glang chen sna nas khrid pa bzhin// bkug ste dmod pa'i sngags kyis gsad// ming sring gdug pa'i ngan sngags 'di// nyin mtshan med par thun du dbab// pho nya bskul nas phur pa gdab// snying dang g.yas g.yon yab yum

sras// yan lag bse mo gsang ba'i ging// dmar pos btab ste thun khrag spyo// ra bsgral snying du ming byang gzhug/ hri ti bzhis bskor bzlas te mnan// brag chu 'thab par gtad gnyer bya// dmar nag bse yi srog tig sngags// nyes med la rbad dam tshig nyams// drag po dgos na bzlas par bya// rung rung thong chor bzlas na ni// dam tshig chen po nyams pa yin// de bas sgrub pa'i sngags tshan bcu// sngags kyi rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin// chu bo'i rgyud ltar drang bar bya// zhes so// bse dmar snying zan ma'i gsad las bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de la drag sngags rtsa ba ni// lha gcig gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga// drug dang bdun dang lha bcu'i sngags// mkhas pas rim pas bsnyen pa dang// don ldan lha bcu dril te sgrub// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti nri dza dza/ 'jam dpal dmar po'i spu gri yin// na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na mo bai shra ma na s+ye ha/ ma hA rA dza s+ye ha/ na mo na ta ku pa ra s+ye ha/ gu ya ga te pa te du pa ya na/ ta ku pa ra ma ta'i sha mi/ a nu ru pa/ su ru pa na ta/ ku pa ra tsan tra kha na tsa khaM/ he mo kha sa ka na ta ku pa ra na he ma kan/ gu ha ka tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ phu lu phu lu swAhA/ gnod sbyin dmar pos smras te phul ba'o// oM rnal ma rnal te gsod la rngam bshol la mer spris la chum thu bsi thu lcags kyi skra dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ srin po dmar bos phul ba'o// oM tri ling shang ka du dri za yag sha rbad pu phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru bra bra duM duM shig dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ gshin rje dmar pos phul ba'o// bdud pra ma ya/ bdud mA ra ya/ snying mgo chod du ru du ru/ har ti har ti dgra bo'i snying la dza/ nag po ti ba tsa ba tsa dgra bo'i snying la pa tsa bam ral rbad/ nA ga kro d+hi shwa ri snying la ba tsa la/ trag ma trag shig dgra bo'i snying la kha raM khA hi/ nag po shag pa ti ba tsa baM ril rbad/ nag po her haM baM ril rbad/ nA ga snying mgo chod kha la zo snying mgo chod// tsa la rog pa dgra bo'i snying la dza dza/ dgra bo'i snying la hu ra be ra baM ril rbad/ hu ya hu ya dgra bo'i snying la dur dur/ blo tsa la baM ril rbad/ yang na myos shing lkugs su chug/ yang na smyo zhing 'bog tu chug/ yang na rtsa ba bdun rgyud chod// ces bdud po dmar pos phul ba'o// trag rak+sha kha mu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ rag mo te kuM dza dzA kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma hi b+h+yo/ gnod sbyin mos phul smras pa'o// oM khyi khrid ra khri ro la khrag 'thung/ kang kang keng keng kying kying tsan da ma ro la khrag 'thung// kaM kaM keng keng gying gying sha za ba snying 'byin pa khrag 'thung ba/ dbugs 'phrog pa/ srog gcod pa/ sha za ba'i tsit+ta me ri sha tang par lang thong sha la kyi khye kra he ka he hU~M phaT phaT/ bal mo bse mos

smras te phul ba'o// oM shel gyi ru gnyan dkar po thuM ril rbad/ srog la khug thum ril rbad/ oM ma tri rak+sha mu thuM trag dral dun dun yaM yaM/ ling kar ling rak+sha baM ril rbad// bse yi skyes bu rang rgyud pa bzhis smras pa'o// oM tro ta ni tro ta ni pa tra pa tra/ k+shu la k+shu la/ d+ha sha gri ba d+ha sha gri ba hU~M phaT/ dmar po gyad pa chen po bzhis smras pa'o// oM ni tro ta ni ni tro ta na hu ru hu ru hU~M phaT/ sku mchog dmar pos smras so// oM tri tsi pa la a shug ma/ ma tsa pa la a shug me hU~M phaT/ ging pho dgu mo dgus phul ba'o// oM shrI mahA kA la tri yaM dza dza tri tsa la ag me shug me baM laM shaM tri dza ya du/ mgon po dge bsnyen ging dang bcas pas phul ba'o// tri pa sha mi sa ma ya b+h+yo/ a ni yo ga tsa ra ging tsa ra ging tsa ra ging tsa ra/ ging chen tsa ra ging chen tsa ra/ bar ba ta bar ba ta/ su ka dkar po cho cho/ srog bdag ging dang bcas pas smras te phul ba'o// de nas 'khor rnams kyis/ gtso bo chen po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi srog gi snying po de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ byin rlabs dang ldan par mdzad du gsol/ ces gsol pas/ dpa' bo chen pos rig pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te bod rbad gsad pa thams cad 'grub par byin gyis brlabs so// dregs ba'i rtsa ba sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang sngags de rnams kyis 'phrin las thams cad grub pa'i phyir mtshon cha ngar thabs gsungs pa/ nyon cig sgrol ging ma ru rtse// drag sngags las kyi snying po ni/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dza la ma re ka re ya/ oM dzA la dza la pra dza la pra dza la/ spu ta spu ta/ sarba nA ga ta ba na ni/ sa ra sa ra/ byi sa ra byi sa ra/ sarba duSh+taM/ hri da ya sho to ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ an d+ha ra ban d+ha ra tsan d+ha ra kan d+ha ra swAhA/ na ma sa man ta bi sho ta ya bing bing hU~M phaT/ oM hriSh+ti bi kri tA mon ta dgra bo mA ra ya ma ra du/ ma ra nan/ ma ra yaM/ oM mdzod ta bkri ta sod sod/ dgra bo nri sod ma ra na b+ho b+ho yaM yaM/ oM ru ta ru ta ma ra yaM/ ma ra du/ dgra bo nri mA ra ya phaT/ ma ma ma la yaM gro lo Ne tse gran g.yas pa la/ ti te rbad na thuM ril/ ma ti ta rbad na thuM ri li li/ sha sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li/ kha chum ni ya sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li/ yak+sha ni ya sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li/ dgra bo ni ya sti sta rbad na thuM ri li li/ phur pas gdab dang bal mos rol// mon mo 'khor gyis gsad pa dang// dmar pos mnan dang gtad pa dang// las gzhug gcod pa'i sngags rgod yin// de yang rbad cing las la gzhug/ gsad pa'i mtshon cha 'di lta ste// gtum po yaM yaM/ sgrol ging yaM yaM/ ma ru rtse las la yaM yaM/ rtsa la hur thums srogs la ya/ du na dzA du na ling khrad de khrad de dza dzA/ tsakra raM tsit+ta gu lu nan/ sod tri

kha raM sum tri ni shaM tri ni/ ni tri dzA dzA/ oM ya ma rA dza klu ling b+ha sang sang/ kun b+ha sang sang/ klu ling sang ku ta nan/ yo lcags sang ku ta ki hU~M phaT/ na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ tsa la tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ shrI ga ga mi ni swAhA/ ta ku ta ku par par ma sta ni dzA/ ni mA ra ya/ ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa bam ril dam pa dum bu hU~M phaT/ ni sha ku ru ni sha ku ru kha sob tri yaM/ ru ti yaM/ sen men yang/ snying tshal pa rbad/ dun dun mug pa shang/ ha la ha la tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hi li hi li/ rba na rba na/ rbad pu ling rbad bu ling/ me sha ya me sha ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sta na sta na/ rba na rba na/ rbad na rbud rbad na rbud/ snying shos ya/ snying shos ya/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem/ yaM yaM las la yaM/ pri li li pri li li/ ya ya rgyob rgyob/ bod cing spyan drang mchod pa bya ba ni/ e ma ha sa ka nan na ta ka pa/ re s+ya dza hU~M baM ho/ badzra sa ma ya dzA/ oM shrI many+dzu ku ma rA dza khA hi/ a nu ru pa khA hi/ pu ru pa khA hi/ ti ku pa ra ma ta khA hi/ ma hA maM sa/ rak+ta tsit+ta/ go ro tsan/ ba su ta khA hi/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta khA hi/ ma hA b+ha ling ta khA hi/ tri du ni srog dung dbugs dung dral dral ma dum shaM ma dum shaM srog khyer dbugs long srog srig srig ya/ dmar po rak+sha srog la khug thum ril rbad b+h+yo/ ma hA sa ma ya hU~M/ ma hA rak+ta hU~M/ ma hA tsit+ta hU~M/ ma hA ki ku sa ma ya hU~M/ de la sogs pa sngags rnams ni// phyi nang gsang ba drang dang// dbang du bsdu dang 'dril bya dang// gnad la dbab dang rbad dang dgug/ bsad dang mnan pa la sogs pa// 'brub khung ra thod ling ga la// dug thun drag po hom phur mngags// pod thod pa nag por dug khrag la// thun gyi drag sngags dril te sgrub// oM a ba ta lo ka te ya na ma sho/ hri sti snying kha la rak+sha ga du na ga du na/ a ka ne rbad/ tri kha ra lang ma ru dra hU~M thuM ru lu ru lu+u ma he b+h+yo/ gur ti shi na ling/ ra ti shi na ling/ khu ti shi na ling/ ling ti shi na ling/ snying ti shi na ling/ shi ta shi na ling/ 'od dang sgra dang 'tsheg dang khol/ rtags de byung nas thun las bya// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo de// spu gri reg chod sngags 'dis sgral// yaM du snying khrag ni sha ku ru/ kha so pa tri yaM/ ru ti yaM sen men yaM/ sen yang snying tshal pa rbad/ srog tsa mA ra ya/ ya ma rA dza ni mA ra ya/ du ma ra ya sa ma ra du/ ya ma khrag/ snying lam khrag yaM rbad/ yaM tshal pa yaM baM ri la/ ya ma dam pa dum bu mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ dmar po rak+sha srog la kug thuM ril rbad b+h+yo/ dmar po spu gri reg chod sngags 'di ni gsad tig kho na'o// i u a sa ma ya thibs thibs/ ling shar nges sod/ thig nig gcig med gnyis trag/ brgyad gcad gnam mthong phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rang sod/ glang thob thog dril mthongs

brtol// gnad chod rgyun stobs gzugs chom dpung shig/ lhu phyung ya rgyob dur phug spugs/ tsakra raM tsit+ta gu lu nan/ sod tri kha raM/ suM tri ni shaM tri ni/ ni tri chod/ a yu chod/ dz+nyA na khog mA ra ya/ drag sngags gsang thig shod rde brab// oM tro ta ni tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ haM sham tri gtum po yaM yaM/ sgrol ging yaM yaM/ ma ru tse las la yaM yaM/ rtsal hur thums/ srog la yaM yaM/ du na dza du na ling khrad de khrad de/ ging ka ra ging ka ra/ rak+shu rak+shu/ dzA len tra dza len tra/ dzu len tra dzu len tra/ tro ta ya tro ta ya/ ni tro ta ya/ ni tro ta ya/ pa tra pa tra/ k+shu la k+shu la/ da sha gri ba da sha gri ba/ yak+sha gri ba yak+sha gri ba/ kar cha rak+sha sod dgra snying la thun b+h+yo/ sngags rgod drag po de dag gis/ rtsa ba'i sngags drug po ji ltar 'dod pa'i las la kha bsgyur bar bya'o// las kyi drag sngags zab mo bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas srog sgrub zhal sgrub dang// thun sgrub 'khor lo hom sgrub rnams// de dag sgrub pa'i 'phrin las bshad// phyi ni srog chags la rten sgrub// nang du thod pa la rten sgrub// gsang ba thun la rten te sgrub// srog chags sbubs la rten pa dang// 'khor lo sku gsung thugs la rten// drag po hom la rten pa dang// bse mkhar sku la rten pa dang// gcan gzan thod pa la rten dang// thod chen zhal la rtan pa dang// ra thod ra snying sog pa g.yas// drag sngags ling ga la rten dang// drag po phur pa la rten dang// de la sogs pa gang mos bya// dam rdzas hom phur dug gtor sgro// snying dang dam rdzas bla rdo gzung// phur pa gtsang la sku rten bzung// srog chags mdangs la 'ben rta bzung sum cu gsum dang bdun phrag gsum// sgrub dang 'phrin las drag tu gzugs// lhi bdun bskor 'khor lo dang// sngags kyi rim pa sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo'i rim pa bdun bskor dang// drag sngags lto bar tshud par bya// thun gyi rim pa bdun bskor dang// 'phrin las las mthar bsdu bar bya// de la lha yi bdun bskor ni// gtso bo dpal dang gnod sbyin dang// gshin rje srin po bdud po dang// ma mo bal mo sngags bskor bya// de la 'khor lo bdun bskor ni// ging pho las byed zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dang// gnod sbyin dmar po zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dang// srog bdag g.yang gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang// bal mo ro rkun dkyil 'khor dang// tsit+ta mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor dang// ma hA de ba hom nag bdud zhal dkyil 'khor dang/ 'chi bdag ma traM dkyil 'khor te// so sor sgrub dang yang na dril// de la thun gyi bdun bskor ni// dbye ba las kyi dug sgro'i thun// brab pa drag po s+ye thun dang// pags pa g.yang gzhi bsha' ba'i thun// don snying phur pa gtab

pa'i thun// 'brub khung e la brub pa'i thun// 'bar ma me dpung hom gyi thun// gnan gtad thun du dbye bar bya// thun bdun zer yang srog thun te// dug khrag nyung phur thal chen dril// drag po lha sngags bdun bskor gyis// rtags kyang rnam pa bdun du 'byung// de la dus tshod bdun du brtag/ dus bdun shes pas las la sbyar// dang po las byed byon pa'i dus// mi bshar mi reng skya bshar tshogs// rdigs dang 'bring dang 'grogs pa 'byung// las byed las la cha ba'i dus// btsun chen dang ni zhu bas can dang// 'khrug pa'i ru bskos rko klog byed// go gon mtshon cha thogs par 'byung// las byed las la zhugs pa'i dus// mon dang a tsar dmag 'dren dang// yul mkhar 'jigs dang ra g.yag khrid// las byed las byed lto ba'i dus// sha khur gsod 'god za ba 'byung// las byed las ni zin pa'i dus// dus 'debs thun brdeg 'o dod 'bod// dngos po gsad pa'i rtags 'byung ngo// las byed ngo so ngoms pa'i dus// 'od dang sgra dang drags pa byung// las byed gsang gtam brda ston dus// las dang bya ba thams cad kun// mkha' 'gro brda yi lung ston 'byung// de dag bdun la dus bzung ba// stag shar kha gdangs pa yi dus// phud gtor bstab cing sngags tshan bskyed// gshin rje stong rub byed pa'i dus// sha khrag snying btab rbad sngags btab// bdud po dmag la chas pa'i dus// rgyun gtor dbul cing drag tu rbad// gnod sbyin sha 'thog pa yi dus// phud mang btab cing gsang sngags gdags// ma mo khrag 'thor ba yi dus// gtang rag khas blangs 'phrin la spogs// ging po chu srin du rgyug dus// rgyun gtor dbul cing bla dam blang// 'chi bdag ral pa gsig pa'i dus// spyod pa bsrung zhing mtshan ltas rtag/ legs nyes thams cad rngas lung ston// 'phrin las sbyar so'i dus bdun la// dregs pa gzan la rgyu ba'i dus// nang nub mchod pa dbul bar bya// sgrol ging las la rgyug pa'i dus// dribs so 'ubs la phur pa gdab// dgra bo bla rtse 'khyam pa'i dus// srod kyi dus la bla tshe dgug/ dgra bo myos te brgyal ba'i dus// nam gung gsang sngags drag tu gdab// ro langs las la rub pa'i dus// tho rangs drag tu rbad bar bya// bgegs chen lha srungs myos pa'i dus// nyi phyed lha dbye gzir gnan bya// 'bru sgra tshub ma langs pa'i dus// thun 'phang dbang gzugs dus kyang gdab// dang po rdzas kyi drod ldan pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi drod thob bya// dus kyi drod la drag sngags 'jug/ sngags kyi drod tshad shes par bzlas// mtshan ma rtags kyi drod tshad brtag/ 'phrin las drod tshad mthar phyin bya// sha sna khrag dang snying sna dang// dam rdzas

gtor ma bdud rtsi phud// gtsang phur drag po srog thod sogs// gsad pa'i rdzas dang bcas pa gcas// ting 'dzin rnam gsum cho 'phrul sku// bskyed pa gsal ba'i tshad thob gces// nyams dga' bskor ba byed pa dang// nyi shar nam mangs slob dpon 'grogs// gcer bu mi reng mdza' bo grogs// lo zhabs dbyar tha dgun tha dang// nya dang nyer gnyis nyi shu dgu// 'jug gdon skar ma gza' drag gces// bsnyen dang sgrub dang 'phrin las sngags// bod rbad gsad pa'i las 'brel gces// sa rko shing gcod ra g.yag gsod// khyim phug lag cha khrogs pa gces// 'phrin las sbobs pa med pa yis// mnan gtad mtha' ru phyin pa gces// zhes man ngag dam pa yang dag pa bshad pa'o// drag sngags sgrub pa'i man ngag thabs dang drod tshad du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad// las la bskul zhing bod pa'i tshe// oM ma hA yak+sha dza'i/ oM hU~M phaT/ ma nyes pa ma yo'o// re re dag la lan bdun du// dbyangs su blang zhi 'o dod bod// gtor ma dam rdzas bsag byas te// dus gsum bstan las len pa yi// 'dza' dang dbyangs su bod cing bskul// de nas khro bo brjid 'gyings nas// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab zhabs// ling ga gom pas mnan gzir cing// sprul pa'i pho nya las kyi gtso// nye bar gnyer ba'i bdag bskul// 'di la man ngag gnad gsum ste// nag po'i brnag pa rkang mthil bya// dmar po'i brnag pa lce stengs bya// dkar po'i brnag pa lag par bya// de nas dmag dpon gtso bo bzhi// pho nya bka' nyan la sogs pa// rim pa bzhin du las la bskul// zhes gsungs so// nag po bskul ba'i dus su ma he gshin rje'i 'og tu mnan pa dran par bya'o// dmar po bskul ba'i dus su mche bas tsit+ta drangs te lce stengs na rngam par za ba dran par bya'o// dkar po bskul ba'i dus su zhabs pas 'ching zhing lag gis tsit+ta 'byin pa dran pa gces so// 'tshang tshig gnad nas bskul ba'i thabs gnad kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad// mtshan dang ldan pa'i thod pa ru// bdud rtsi 'dza' gad rag+ta phyar// lha rnams mchod pa'i rjes su yang// hU~M/ dmar chen mtsho dang maM sa dri// pany+tsa a mr-i ta dang sbyar// bsre ba'i mchog ste srog gi snying// snying dang snying gi grogs po bya// sngags pa bdag gi las mdzod cig/ oM ma hA ku ku sa ma ya hU~M/ hU~M ma hA rak+ta sa ma ya hU~M/ hU~M ma hA tsit+ta sa ma yahU~M/ lan gsum dbul zhing rang gi lce thog tu yang bzhag/ dus bzhir snying gsum gtor mar 'dar// snying 'byin par ni dbang yang bskur// bskur ba'i dam tshig thub par bya'o// tha tshig gnyan po

dam bsre ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gtor mar sman rag 'dza' gad bsgrengs te dus gsum dang ma ru rtse bskul nas dregs pa ngar blud de/ ho/ sgrol ging gi bdag po sa ma ya// sgrol ging dam tshig gi bdag po khyod// khyod kyis mi 'dul ba yang gang med de// dregs pa kun gyi bdag po khyod// khyod kyis mnga' mi mdzad pa gang yang med// khyod kyis mi sgrol ba gang yang med// khyod kyis mi thub pa gang yang med// khyod kyi bka' mi nyan pa yang gang yang med// ri rab yang khyod kyis snyil bar mdzad// rgya mtsho yang khyod kyis skams par mdzad// gnam lcags thog ser 'bebs pa yang khyod kyis mdzad// 'jig rten du sa g.yo ba dang/ shwa rgyug pa dang/ chu 'gyur ba yang khyod kyis mdzad// mdor na dregs pa thams cad kyi bdag po chen po khyod yin te// khyod kyis thugs dam dus la bab bo// de skad brjod la las dmigs gtad// dam tshig bsre zhing tha tshig bca'// snying btab snying gi snying po gnod// snying 'byin pa ru dbang bskur bya// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// rang la rang gis dbang bskur nas// dregs pa can la dbang bskur bya// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa dregs thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de la gshin rje dmar po yis gsungs pa// lta ba stong pa nam mkha' las// rnam rtog sprin gyi dri ma byung// nam mkha' ngang gis sprin yin te// gzhan nas dngos po 'ongs pa med// sems nyid stong gsal bde chen la// de bzhin sems la rtog pa byung// sems nyid rang las byung ba las// dngos po gzhan dbang grub pa med// rtog pa ngo shes slar la ni// snang stong dbyer med ye shes shar// bde 'o lta spyod rab tu bde 'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ kye kye nga yis gtso 'khor bcas pa bshad pa'i rgyud// ma gshin gshin rje dmar po dang// shan pa sgrol byed ging phor bcas// kun gyi spyod yul ma yin te// nges pa de nyid de kho na// nga yis 'khor la yang dag par// las dang bya thabs bshad pa ni// ma lus 'dul ba'i sde rgyud bzhi// tsha ba shod kyi mchod rten dang// e yi gtsug lag khang dag tu// rgyal mo mkha' 'gro gtso 'khor gyis// tshig dang yi ge'i snang byas te// byin gyis brlabs kyis sbas par bya// lan cig myur du ma thogs par// bstan pa mar ldan dus dag tu// 'gro rnams rab tu nyon mongs shing// rdo rje theg pa la sdang tshe// sprul pa cig gis de yi don// rgyud dang yan lag las phra mo// so sor nges pa'i don mthong nas// skal ldan rnams la so sor ston// ces gsungs so// rgyud dang sgrub pa man ngag lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo yang dag

dpal// phyi mar don la rab dgongs nas// sngags kyi rgyud dang gsang ba'i rgyud// rtsa ba'i mdo rgyud chen pos las// gsal ba'i sgron ma'i man ngag 'di// phyi rabs rnal 'byor mtshon cha ru// gces pa'i dmigs sel 'di ltar btus// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bstan pa 'di// las dang las 'phro rab ldan pa'i// gshin rje dmar po'i dge 'dun des// dregs pa can gyi mdo gsang rgyud// sngags kyi sbyor ba bsam yas la// dmar po'i dmar po rtsa ba lnga// lha lnga'i rtsa ba las sgrel ba// lha sngags sgrub pa bod rbad gsad// thugs mtha' las kha la sogs pa// gces pa'i don 'di rab shes na// gcos pa'i spu gri ngar thabs yin// sngon du dbang lung ma thob na// bsam pa 'grub par ga la 'gyur// blo dang ldan pa'i skal ldan des// yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma btsal// ya man ta ka'i dkyil 'khor du// zhugs te las kyi gshin rje la// dbang bsgyur bsnyen sgrub rdzogs par bya// bla ma dam pa gshed po des// rigs su nges pa'i bu de la// yi dwags phal chen dkyil 'khor du// phyi nang gsang ba'i bdang bskur nas// sgrol ging dmar po gtor ma'i dbang// bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas drag po'i rdzas// rigs kyi bu la dbang rnams bskur// bu yis dbang dang dam tshig dag/ legs par thob nas bsrung zhing sgrub// nag po bsnyen pa ma shes na// ma gshin ging bdud ga la 'khor// dmar po sgrub pa ma shes na// dregs ba'i dmar dpung gnas bzlogs// ging gi las sbyor ma shes na// shan pa srog la ga la 'jug/ e ma dmar po'i dge 'dun nyon// te pa ta yis ma bskyed na// sku gsal lus rdzogs ga la 'grub// gsung sgra'i snying po ma bsgrags na// grags pa thon par ga la 'gyur// be ba sa ta ma brdungs nas// thugs kyi phyag mtshan ga la ldan// kra ma rA dza ma bzlas na// phun sum tshogs par ga la 'gyur// shrI many+dzu ma bzlas na// 'phrin las dngos grub ga la thob// sku lnga bsnyen pa ma rdzogs nas// yid bzhin bsam grub ga la 'grub// sku gsum bsnyen pa ma byas na// dregs pa khol por ga la 'khol// e ma dmar po'i dge 'dun rnams// bai shra ma ma bzlas na/ dmar po'i dmag dpung ga la phebs// snal ma bsnal te ma bzlas na// byin rlabs thebs pa rag la 'gyur// tri ling shaM ka ma bzlas na// dmar po 'chun par ga la 'gyur// de gsum lus snying dbang po ste// e ma dmar po'i dge 'dun nyon// gnod sbyin chu bor ma drangs na// gnod sbyin lta bur ga la 'grub// srin bos ngo bo ma rtags na// khram la thebs par ga la 'gyur// dgra rnams ngos zin ma 'khyams na// gshin rje'i lag tu ma gtad na// dmar kha byed par ga la 'gyur// dgra dpung

pha tshan dpung langs na// pra ma ya ni ma bzlas na// phung shig nag po bla spungs dang// srog la bdud gcod ga la phebs// trag rak+sha ma bzlas na// ma mo'i dmag dpung ga la phebs// su khri khyi khrid ma bzlas na// bal mo bse mo ga la 'khol// rtsa dang drug skor ma shes na// gzi brjid thob par ga la 'gyur// rkyang ba rno bsdebs ma shes na// dregs pa gzan la ga la phebs// e ma dmar po'i dge 'dun nyon// rtsa ba las su ma sgrel na// las rnams myur du ga la 'grub// sgo phugs med par ma btugs na// gtso 'khor ging tshogs ga la 'khor// ta gu ta gu ma bkug na// lha dang dgra bo ga la khugs// e ma lha zhes ma bos na// ji tsam bos kyang ga la byon// spu gri gdags thabs ma shes na// rno la ngar du+u ga la ldan// sngags rdzogs las la ma sbyar na// las de grub par ga la 'gyur// dun dun mug pa la sogs pa// rnon po ngar dum btang na// srog rtsa myur du ga la chod// dril gtor rno bsdebs ma shes na// dregs pa gnad la ga la phebs// bram ze lce dgug ma btab na// sde brgyad khol phor ga la 'gyur// e ma dmar po'i dge 'dun rnams// dam tshig tha tshig ma bsrungs na// gzhung dang ldan par ga la 'gyur// bsre ba'i snying grogs ma bsres na// snying gi grogs su ga la 'gyur// dregs pa dregs thabs ma shes na// nga rgyal snyems par ga la 'gyur// gtum pos gtum por ma rbad na// las la 'gro bar ga la 'gyur// tsakra raM ni ma bzlas na// las la 'jug par ga la 'gyur// ni sha ku ru ma bzlas na// lus srog 'byed par ga la 'gyur// glung ling sang sang ma bzlas na// lha dang phyed par ga la 'gyur// rat+na tra tsal ma bzlas na// legs par so sor ga la 'brel// tri du dung sngags ma bzlas na// snying khrag 'thung bar ga la 'gyur// mtshan tshig gnad nas ma bskul na// las ngo len par ga la 'gyur// mnyes pa'i thun rdzas ma 'tshogs na// byon kyang gnas su ga la sdod// a nu ru bas ma mchod na// thugs dam sgrol bas ga na bskongs// e ma lus kyi rnal 'byor pa// dmar po'i dge 'dun 'dus pa nyon// rgyal po'i rgyab rten ma btsal na// bran rnams nyan par ga la 'gyur// blon po'i mdun sa ma bzung na// dmangs rnams cham la ga la 'phebs// dmag dpung dmangs kyis ma byas na// dgra rnams cham la ga la phebs// dza la ma ras ma btab na// lung 'dir phur bu ga la thebs// hri s+t+ri hri bzhis ma bskor na// dgra dpung non par ga la 'gyur// thugs dam thugs snying ma bzlas na// thugs kyi brnag pa ga la 'grub// spyi dang sgo sgor ma bsgrubs na// gdams ngag thob par ga la 'gyur// gtor dril rno bsdebs ma shes na// drag sngags bzlos

la ga la dbang// bsnyen sgrub las sum phye na// mthu rtags dngos grub ga la thon// bod rbad gsad gsum ma 'brel na// dregs pa las la ga la tshud// gnan bsreg 'phang gsum ma she na// las kyi 'phrin las ga la rdzogs// 'phrin las rdzogs par ma gyur na// spogs pa med par ga la 'grub// ma grub lan gsum ma spogs na// sngags ma'i las rnams la 'grub// spogs kyang ma grub ma gtad na// las kyi 'phrin las ga la rdzogs// grub kyang ma nyen ma gsad na// rgyal pos dmangs kyang ga la 'chun// bla rdo srog rten ma bzung na// bkra ni shis par ga la 'gyur// pho mo sdeb par ma shes na// dregs pa gnad la ga la phebs// dam tshig thub par ma bsrungs na// don de 'dod par ga la 'gyur// lta ba'i ri la ma bros na// thar pa thob par ga la 'gyur// spyod pa'i 'phrin las ma spyad na// thun mong dngos grub ga la thob// ting 'dzin mkhar du ma zhugs na// lus kyi rje bor ga la mthong// lta spyod ldan pas ma bsgrubs na// tshe srog mtha' ru ga la phyin// bsam pa dag pas ma bsgrubs na// bdag gzhan don rnams ga la 'grub// e ma gshin rje dmar po'i tshogs// chad pa che la drag shul che// ma yengs gtso ru len shes na// bsam pa gang yang mi 'grub med// drag po'i sngags ni gang bzlas kyang// de dag 'ong bar the tshom med// byung ba tsam gyis mi 'khol bas// des na gnad kyi man ngag gces// gshin rje dmar po 'di rnams la// 'di las mthu che dregs pa can// gzhan na yod pa ma yin te// 'di la dbang rtsal che ba yi// dregs pa can kyang gzhan na med// shin tu 'di las 'grogs bde dang// rgyud 'jam pa yang gang yang med// 'di las 'grogs pa ma bde dang// 'di las rgyud rtsub pa yang med// 'di las lha srin dpung che ba// dregs pa rnams kyi nang na med// de bzhin shis dang ma shis pa// 'dod pa grub dang mi grub pa// rang ngam rang la rang lus de// 'di yi sgor zhugs rnal 'byor pas// bsnyen sgrub dang po mtha' rdzogs par// gzhung bzhin nyams su longs pa gces// bsnyen sgrub rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas// skyon dang yon tan de dag 'byung// gtso 'khor rim pa ngo shes pas// sgom sgrub bod rbad ngo shes bya// zhes 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsungs te/ mdo rgyud chen po sngags kyi dgongs pa 'bru btus te gal 'geg bstan pa'o// man ngag ma lus bstan pa drag sngags kyi spu gri ngar slud pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bsgom bya bshad// chos nyid spros dang bral ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam bya ste// snying rje sems can dran par bya// cho 'phrul byang sems hU~M dmar sgom// de yi byin rlabs

g.yos pa ni// ra las 'og phyogs rak+ta'i mtsho// a las tsan+t+ra'i maN+Dal bcas// de stengs yi ge hU~M de sgom// spro bsdus 'khor lo hU~M ldan bsam// de nyid bdag nyid ma ru tse// dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas g.yon me rlung 'khor lo bskor// ral pa kham nag 'ban snyims te// spyan bzlog zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs// me dpung nang na gnas pa las// tsakra bruM zhes brjod pa las// 'khor lo'i gzhal yas lhag gis bskyed// dza bzhi spros pas phyogs bzhi ru// dmar po bse yi skyes bu bzhi// kun kyang bya khra dmar po bzhin// 'od kyi zhags pa bse mdung dang// ral gri bse yi mda' gzhu
