oM AH hU~M khong na gnas pa srog yin te// phyi nang rgyu ba rtsol ba yin// de nas bzlas pa 'thems pa na// mchog gi dngos grub sku gsum thob// thun mong dngos grub grub chen brgyad// 'thob 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang pau pa'i gang zag smin par bya ba 'di dag yongs su gsungs so// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// dbang bskur rnam pa bzhir gnas pa// mtshungs rgyu rang la gnas pa'o// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bum pa'i dbang// sngags kyi yi ge tsan Da li// khams kyi bdud rtsi shes rab la// snying po rlung ni bde chen dbang// 'di bzhin mtshungs rgyu yin par 'dod// dbang bzhi mtshungs rgyu rang la gnas pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rig pa'i dbang lnga rab gsungs phyir// ngas ni khyod la gsal bar bshad// bum pa rdo rje mi skyod chus// bkrus shing spyi nas dbang bskur bas// las dang bag chags dag pa dang// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru 'gyur// cod pan bzang po bcings pa yis// dbu rgyan spyi bor rab bzhugs nas// bdud dang bgegs rigs bsrung ba dang// rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru 'gyur// rdo rje lag tu gtad pa yis// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gnas lhag pa'i bdud 'joms shing// tshe dpag med de snang mthar 'gyur// dril bu gsung gi sgra sgrags pas// brda sprod don rnams go ba yis// mchog dang thun mongs dngos grub thob// gdon mi za ba'i sku ru 'gyur// ming gi dbang ni bskur ba yis// srid pa bar dor skyob pa ste// rdo rje ming gi yi dam dran// rnam par snang mdzad sku ru 'gyur// mtshan ldan gzugs ma bum pa la// pad+mar rdo rje bcug pa rdo rje'i dbang// rdo rje pad skyod dril bu'i dbang// byang sems dkar dmar cod pan la// rang gis zos pa ming gi dbang// rig pa'i dbang lnga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas

gsang ba'i dbang bshad pa// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma yis// rlung dang thig le 'dres pa ni// yid ni nang du yang dag bzung// rang rdzas thig le phyir thog nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod// slob ma dag la sbyin pa yang// rab ni ba dang be'u 'dra// 'bring ni bung ba me tog 'dra// tha ma bya dang byi'u ltar// byang sems thig le zos pa ni// brtul zhugs dbang zhes bya bar bshad// gsal ba'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas shes rab ye shes kyi// dbang yang khyed la bshad kyis nyon// 'dod pa'i mnyam pa'i ming sring gnyis// sgrom bsgrub mnyam pa'i yi dam lha// byin rlabs mnyam pas mkha' gnyis po// bsnol mar byin gyis brlabs par bya// reg pa sra ba sa yin te// dga' ba'i bde ba zhes kyang bya// de nas gsher ba chu yin te// mchog dga'i bde ba zhes kyang bya// de nas dro ba tsha ba me// dga' 'bral bde ba zhes kyang bya// de nas g.yo ba rlung yin te// thig le byang sems 'bebs pa ni// dga' ba lhan cig skyes par 'dod// rang gi nyams su myong bas na// shes rab dag la rten nas ni// ye shes skyes pa ngos zin pas// shes rab ye shes dbang du ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bde ba chen po yi// dbang bskur khyed la yang dag bshad// yab yum rol pa'i byang chub sems// gsang ba'i gnas nas bzlog byas nas// lte ba me long ngos dang 'dra// 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub// ro stod seng ge'i khog pa 'dra// lces ni zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// smin mtshams mdzod pu 'khyil ba dang// dbu yi gtsug tor grub pa ni// spyi gtsug ring bsrel mchod rten gnas// de ni dung chen g.yas su 'khyil// gdung zlum brtsegs pa'i gzhal khang// mtshan rnams kun gyi mthar thug pa// rdo rje rba rlabs lam la sa thob// lus ngag yid kyi gnas las thob// bde ba chen po'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang bzhis sgrib dag pa// bum dbang lus kyi dri ma dag/ lus gnas rtsa ni bum pa'i tshul// gsang dbang ngag gi dri ma dag/ sngags kyi yi ge dag las 'byung// shes rab ye shes sgrib dag/ sems las shes pa'i ye shes nyid// bde chen lus ngag yid gsum gyis// spyi yi sgrib dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dbang bskur bas dri ma dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang gi nyams blangs te// dbang lam bgrod pa khyod la bshad// dang po rgyu yi dbang bshad na// ri mo bud med dkyil 'khor du// bla ma dag la rim pa bzhin// dbang bskur rdzogs pa thob par bya// bar du lam gyi dbang blangs pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa

sgom dus su// dam tshig sems dpa'i lha tshogs la// ye shes rnam lngas dbang bskur zhing// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// bum dbang lnga dang gsang dbang gsum// tha ma 'bras bu thob dus su// gsang dbang gsum ni sku gsum la// bum dbang lnga ni ye shes nyid// sku gsum ye shes rnam pa lnga// theg pa'i lam rnams gang bgrod kyang// 'bras bu yin bar dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba rnams kyis mthun par bshad// pad+ma dbang chen dregs ba gsang ba'i rgyud las// rim pa dbang gi bgrod par bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya drag po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// lus dang ngag dang sems sbyangs shing// de bzhin gnad la dbab par bya// byang chub sems dang tshogs bdun dang// mtshams kyi bsrung ba rnam par bsam// stong pa'i ngang las rol pa'i sku// dbu lnga dmar po gshog pa bzhi// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang// cang te'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag/ rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig g.yas pa na// lcags kyu sdigs mdzub lu gu rgyud// thod rlon khro snying me zhags khra/ sdigs mdzub me 'bar kha T+wAM sogs// zhabs brgyad me klong gsal ba dang// de ltar bskyed pa'i sku de la// nyid la nyid kyis 'di ltar bstod// hU~M dbang chen kun 'dul dbang gi rgyal po ni// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// dbang chen rngam brjid nyi ma 'bum gyis brjid// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar bsgom pa'i rim pa yang// gar gyi dbang phyug sku gcig la// 'khor gyi lha rnams sbas pa'i don// man ngag dam pa bstan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yang// man ngag gsang bar rgyud pa ni// gar gyi dbang phyug sku la sbas// yum chen khro mo gzi ldan ma// gdan gyi pad+ma nyid la sbas// skye med ye shes sems dpa' ni// thugs kyi dpa' be'u nyid la sbas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbu lnga'i gzhal yas nyid la sbas// gsung dang dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbu yi rta mgo nyid la sbas// rigs bzhi gsang ba'i he ru ka/ rin chen khri rkang bzhi la sbas// gsang ba'i rigs kyi yum chen ni// pad+ma'i gdan khri nyid la sbas// dur khrod ma mo bcu drug ni// 'jigs pa'i phyag mtshan nyid la sbas// dur khrod gsang ba'i yum rnams ni// lha mo bzhir yang rab bsgyur nas// rin chen gshog pa nyid la sbas// ma bdun gsang ba'i ba'i phyag rgya ni// gsal ba'i nyi ma bdun du sbas// ma tshogs dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// 'degs pa seng ge'i gdan du sbas// sprul

pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po kun// chos sku gzugs su mi mthong bas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la sbas// sgo srungs yab yum brgyad rnams ni// sprul sku dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir// gzhal yas sgo bzhi nyid du sbas// me 'brug rlung 'brug la sogs kun// dgra nyid dgra mthar stong pa'i phyir// stong pa chen po nyid la sbas// de ltar phyag rgya dkyil 'khor du// log rtog dngos po gzhom pa'i phyir// mngon sum lta bur snang na yang// rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas// dmigs pa bzhin du gsal nas ni// dngos po med pas thig le che// phyi nang snod bcud phyag rgya'i sku// dngos dang dngos dang dngos med ma lus kun// dngos po nyid kyang skye 'gag med pa'i ngang// dbyings las ma g.yos spros pa'i mtha' dang bral// mnyam pa chen por gcig pas sbas pa yin// de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i don// shes rab can gyi don bsgoms na// sems la gsal por 'dris byas te// rgyun du 'bral med gnas par bya'o// sku'i dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyidakyil 'khor sbas pas dbang chen sku gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni// oM ni gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// hu lu kham rgya chen mo drug/ hu lu long pa chen po brgyad// hU~M ni dmun long drug cu la// phaT ni dpal gyi khyi brgyad la// oM ni ye shes khyi bcu nyid// a ni sgo srungs rnam pa bzhi// raM ni sgo srungs pho nya bzhi// laM ni me 'brug rlung 'brug sogs// hris ni sku yi dkyil 'khor 'dus// dzas ni lha srin ma lus 'gugs// bzhi 'bum grangs su thems pa ni// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun// gang gis 'grub bar 'dod pa des// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gsung gi dkyil 'khor du thams cad ma lus par 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bzlas pas skyo ba na// nyungs dkar la ni sems gtad pa// ldang 'jug gnas rdzogs rnam pa bzhis// phra mo rlung nang 'dir 'dus so// srog rtsol ba'i bdag nyid las// g.yas g.yon dge dang mi dge ba'i// pho mo ma ning thod rga la sogs// srog dang rtsol ba bslab pa dang/ rgyu ba bsal dang rnam pa gnyis// las dang mngon par shes pa dang// dus ma yin par nges par sel// dbugs gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ldang nas btang ba gsum du bya// sna g.yon rtsol bkag srog nas btang// btang ba'i dngos po med pa na// me tog myur du skye ba dang// stod nas kun las rnam par thar// shugs skyed gnyis btang mdzod dpur btang// de la dngos po med pa dang// gsal ba nyams su myong ba dang// mgon dmig gi sgrib pa sel// kha nas si sgra sems gtad sbyangs// de la

'byongs par gyur pa na// lus ni yang la zo mdog bde// tshad pa'i rigs sogs kun las sgrol// phyir la ldang la rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// srog gi lte bar a na dgang// na tsha med cing thub pa na// drod dang bde ba lus la 'bar// grang ba ma zhus sras nad 'dzoms// sgra med lte bar a gang zhig/ nyin mtshan med par thub pa na// des ni bde ba skye ba ste// 'byung ba lus 'khrug ma ra ya// srog dang rtsol ba bslab pa dang// rgyu ma gsal dang rnam pa gnyis// las dang mngon par shes pa dang// dus ma yin pa nges par sel// nang du 'jug pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lus kyi zhabs phyag og ma bcun/ kha sbyar nang na spyod lam sgyur// 'dug pa tsam gyis zin pa na// mnyam gzhag rjes thob mi 'ong bas// 'du ba bzhi yin da dang bral// chos sku yang dag thob pa'o// khong du gnas pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas pad+ma dbang chen gyis// yon tan glu bro gar bya ba// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// sharda pa dang garda pa/ lcang ka de'u dbang ka de'u// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor du// sku yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dung de pa yi glu blungs pas// brgya sbyin lha yi dbang po yis// gsung gi dngos grub dam pa thob// sharda pa yi glu blangs pas// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi// thugs kyi dngos grub chen po thob// garda pa yi glu blangs pas// phyogs skyong chen po bcu rnams kyis// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// lcang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// srid pa dbang sdud mthu bo che// drag po yul bdag dbang du sdud// dpang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// dngos grub rlabs chen grub ba thob// yon tan glu drug ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// de yang ye shes lha yi lha// pad+ma rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ sku yi ngo bor spyan drangs nas// mchod pa kun gyis mnyes par bya// rnga dang dung dang dril bu dang// ro mo sgra dang bcas pa yin// glu drug blangs te bstod par bya// hU~M chos nyid skye ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i skur ston pa// pad+ma rigs kyi lha tshogs bsdus pa'i sku// dbang chen kun 'dul dbang gi rgyal po bzhengs// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// dbang chen rngam brjid nyi ma 'bum gyis brjid// dbang mdzad dbang gi khro rgyal ma lus kun// gdug pa 'dul phyir gnas 'dir spyan 'dren na// dbang gi rta skad 'tsher zhing gshegs su gsol// dzaH hU~M baM hoH pad+ma shrI he ru ka yo gi shwa ri ha ya gri

pa hriM hriM/ dbang chen dregs 'dul dbang gi rgyal po'i sku// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// dbang mchog rngam brjid nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra ti dza ho// a la la ho/ 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes ldan pa yin/ yum lnga'i mkha' glong bde ba'i gzhal yas su// gar gyi dbang phyug rta mgrin khro rgyal sku// bdud dang srin po la sogs 'dul ba'i phyir// ji srid dngos grub ma thob de srid bar// bdag dang gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// oM pad+ma shri he ru ka sa ma ya sti ra badzra hU~M// hU~M bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gtso// bde bar gshegs so a ra li// rgyal brgya mtsho ye shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzangs mchod sprin mchog tu rol// hU~M/ lha yi rol mo glu bro gar gyi tshogs// dga' ldan longs spyod bsod nams grub pa'i rdzas// mthun par snang ba'i spyod yul dag pa la// mdzes pa'i gar dang tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu// mi gnas bro dang thugs dam bskul ba'i tshig/ sprul pa rgya mtsho'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i phyir// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul lags na// kun tu bzang po'i ngang du bzhes su gsol// oM badzre badzre// mahA badzre// ma hA+e te dza badzre// ma hA tsa ra badzre// ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta man to ba to/ pa saM kra ma na badzre// sarba a bar+d+har ni badzre swAhA/ mtshan dang ldan pa b+han da'i snod mchog tu// bdud rtsi lnga dang dza gad ldan pa 'di// dbang mchog he ru ka la 'bul lags na// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma rig dbang gis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// 'jig rten skye shi rtsad nas gcad ba'i phyir// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba'i dam rdzas 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// blang dor med pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// rang rgyud bshig pa'i phung po 'dos pa can// bdag med rgyal ba'i zhing dusbyor ba'i phyir// zhing chen rdzas kyis mchod pa dam pa 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// blang dor med pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ ru lu ma ti mahA su kha/ mahA yo gi ni/ kha raM kha hi/ kha kha le le b+h+yo/ hU~M/ dbang chen rgyal po rdo rje ser chen 'bebs// hU~M dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hU~M mdzad hU~M gi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems// rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu lum 'dril// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang// gdug pa sel zhing dug gsum rtsad gcod pa// dbang mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM pad+ma shri he he ru ru kam hU~M

phaT// dbang chen 'phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// dpal pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka'i gsang sngags dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// pad+ma dbang chen gyi sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rgyud le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis gsang ba glu drug gi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnams dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// breng nge ba yi glu blangs na// 'gro ba rigs drug dbang du sdud// dung nge ba yi glu blangs na// mu stegs rtag chad dbang du sdud// sha rda pa yis glu blangs na// nyan thos rang rgyal dbang du sdud// garda pa yi glu blangs na// dbu ma sems tsam dbang du sdud// lcang ka de'u'i glu blangs na// bya spyod rnal 'byor dbang du sdud// dpang ka de'u'i glu blangs na// skye dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen sdud// theg pa dgu yi klong brdol nas// dug lnga lha srin rang srog rnams// lhun grub dkyil 'khor pad+ma yis// zhabs la 'dud nas rang srog 'bul// glu drug dbyangs kyi ting nge 'dzin to// breng nge ba yi glu dbyangs ni// sgra tshig don gsum ldan pa yis// ri rab rtser gnas lha rnams kun// me tog mchod pa sna tshogs kun// dbang chen sku la mchod byas nas// rang gi srog snying a dkar 'bul// ri rab khong seng nang gnas pa'i// lha min gdug pa'i mtshon cha kun// pad+ma'i phyag tu phul byas nas// su ser srog snying 'bul bar bgyis// gling bzhir gnas pa'i mi rnams kun// nr-i ljang srog snying ltar shes nas// nr-i yig sngon po hrir gyur nas// pad+ma dbang chen sgom zhing bsgrub// phyi yi rgya mtsho nang gnas pa'i// chu srin la sogs dud 'gro rnams// du yi srog snying dud kha ba// pad+ma dbang la 'bul bar byed// grong khyer ser skyar gnas pa yi// yi dgas phyi nang sgrib pa can// srid dmar srog snying 'bul byed cing// pad+ma dbang gi lhag ma sdud// rdo rje gdan gyi 'og gnas pa'i// tsha grang dmyal ba ma lus kun// rang srog tri nag las sad de// sems skyes pad+ma dbang chen dran// glu ni yon tan ma lus ldan// nang du sems la nyams skyes pas// phyi rol lus la gar 'gyur nas// ngag tu rang gi sngags kyang 'don// mthong snang yul la snang bar 'gyur// bag chags rmi lam rmi bar byed// dbang chen bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// glu 'di blangs pa'i yon tan yin// breng nge ba'i glu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas// snyan pa'i tshig la chags pas na// mu stegs dbang du byed pa ni// lta ba rnam grangs sum brgya dang// lta ba'i ri bo brgyad cu dang// de bsdus lta ba drug cu dang// de bsdus bdag 'dzin rnam pa bcu// de yang rtag tshad gnyis 'dus pa'o// lta ba'i rnam grangs

sum brgya ni// tshangs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas kyang// ston pa drug tu sprul byas nas// lta ba'i ngo bo lnga bcu gsungs// ston pa re la lnga bcu re// lnga bcu tshan drug sum brgya yin// de la tshangs pa'i ston pa drug/ zhal nas sprul 'dod 'di lta ste// 'od srungs bu ni rdzogs byed dang// chu lha'i bu ni ka ri dang// ka t+ya'i bu ni nog chen dang// gcer bu pa ni gnyen gyi bu// mu stegs nam mkha'i gos can dang// skra yi zla ba can dang drug/ rang gi blon po rnam drug ni// blon po nyi zla grags pa dang// blon po snying thob smra ba dang// bden pa thob kyi smra ba dang// 'jigs byed thob kyi smra ba dang// thams cad don shes smra ba dang// bkra shis thob ces smra drug la// rang gi lta ba'i 'dod lugs te// ston pas 'dod pa sum brgyar 'gyur// lta ba'i ngo bo lnga bcu ni// mu stegs gtar ka sde drug 'dod// wa sgo re thong sde pa dang// rtsig dpag sha zan sde pa da nga// bse ru 'od de sde pa dang// rgyang 'phen tshe 'di'i sde pa dang// snga phyi med pa'i sde pa drug/ ngang gis shar ba'i mu stegs yin// zhor byung mu stegs bzhi yod de// chad pa'i dus shes can dang ni// de bzhin g.yeng ba'i 'du shes can// mos pa'i 'du shes can dang ni// yangs pa'i 'du shes can dang bzhi// tshangs pa'i byin rlabs shar zhes bzhed// sangs rgyas pa dang mgo mnyam bcu// yang dag pa yi bzhi po ni// tha snyad pa dang zab pa dang// phra ba dang ni rgya che ba'o// mu stegs gsang sngags pa ni gsum// rig byed pa dang rigs spyod pa// rigs sbyor ba dang gsum yin no// mu stegs gsang chen pa ni gsum// brtul zhugs cher spyod pa dag dang// rgyal phog pa dang rgyal thob pa'o// rgyu ru lta ba rnam bzhi ni// rang bzhin rgyu ru lta ba dang// byed pa rgyu ru lta ba dang// dbang phyug rgyu ru lta ba dang// dus la rgyu ru lta ba'o// rang snang phyogs sbyong rtags pa dgu/ phya'am dbang phyug rtag par 'dod// rig byed tshig ni rtag par 'dod// brjod med gang zag rtag par 'dod// rig byed rtag par 'dod pa dang// bye brag tshig don yon tan rtag/ grangs kyang nyi shu rtsa lngar rtag/ tshig don rgyu ru rtag par 'dod// rig byed rtag par 'dod pa dang// rig can tshig don bcu drug rtag/ sbyor snyon dga' ba bdun po ni// skyes bu chos can thams cad mkhyen// bdag ni chos can bde sdug dmigs// sgra ni rtag ste ma byas phyir// shing la srog yod pags bshus 'chi// shing la sems yod mtshan mo 'khum// gson lus bdag bcas srog sogs yod// sgra rtag mig gis gzung bya yin// sgom la dga' ba bdun yod de// snang ba 'di bor stong gzhan sgom// don dam med pas kun rdzob med// snang 'di bral ba gcig mi rtog/ dran pas skyon yin dran

bkag sems// skyon yon mi lta rnam par dang// bde ba rtog med tsam du sgom// skye 'jig rtog bral tsam du blta// mu stegs gsang ba rig byed ni// phyi rol don med sems 'di rtag/ mtha' yi gsang ba rig byed ni// snying dkyil shel sgong phyis 'dra sems// snyan dngags ri byed 'dod pa ni// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i srog/ lta ba sum brgya drug bcu ni// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnam shes lnga po la// re re la yang bzhi bzhir brtsi// gzugs nyid bdag ma yin pa dang// gzugs la bdag ni med pa dang// bdag nyid kyang ni gzugs ma yin// bdag la yang ni gzugs med do// tshor ba la sogs de ltar du// bzhi bzhir brtsis bas nyi shu pa'o// de la yang ni gzugs kyi gzugs// gzugs kyi tshor ba bya ba dang// gzugs kyi 'du shes shes pa dang// gzugs kyi 'du byed ces pa dang// gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bzhi bzhir brtsis bas nyi shu'o// de yang nyi shu brtsib ni// gzugs la bzhi ste tshor ba bzhi// 'du byed bzhi la 'du shes bzhi// rnam sems bzhi ste nyi shu'o// nyi shu tham pa lnga la brgya// 'das pa brgya ni nyi shu dang// ma 'ongs brgya dang nyi shu dang// da ltar brgya dang nyi shu ste// rtag pa chad pa gnyis po rnams// sum brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis yin// lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis ni// sngon mthar rtog pa bco brgyad dang// phyi mthar rtog pa bzhi bcu bzhi// spyi bsdus drug cu rtsa gnyis so// 'das pa'i mthar rtog bco brgyad la// 'jig rte na rtag par rtog pa bzhin// bsam gtan chung 'bring chen po gsum// 'jig rten tha dad mi mthong bzhin/ kha cig rtag par rtog pa bzhin// tshangs pa rtag te gzhan mi rtag/ 'byung bzhi'i lus 'byung sems ni rtag/ lha bu rtsod 'khrugs dbang gis 'chi// lha bu yin 'khrugs 'chi 'gyur yang// lha gzhan sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag/ lha mi spong ba'i lta ba bzhi// rang la blo ma sbyangs pa dang// rtogs pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang// ma sbyangs rnam par g.yeng ma yin// shes pa gzhan bzhin shin tu rmongs// mtha' la yod med lta ba bzhi// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan// bdag dang 'jig rten ldan mi ldan// ldan pa la yin mi ldan min// rgyu med par ni lta ba gnyis// bsam gtan dag la rten pa dang// rtog ge bdag la rten pa'o// phyi ma'i mtha' rtog bzhi bcu bzhi// 'du shes can sogs drug cu ni// bdag gzugs can yin 'du shes yod// bdag gzugs ma yin 'du shes yod// gzugs yin gzugs min 'du shes yod// ma yin pa yang ma yin 'du shes yod// bdag mtha' dag dang mi ldan 'du shes yod// ldan mi ldan la 'du shes yod// ldan mi ma ldan 'du

shes yod// bdag 'du shes chung rngun dang yang ldan// 'du shes tshad med pa dang yang ldan// 'du shes gcig dang ldan pa dang// 'du shes sna tshogs ldan pa dang// gcig tu bde ba ldan pa dang// gcig tu sdug bsngal ldan pa dang// gcig tu bde ba sdug bsngal ldan// gcig pu bde sdug mi ldan pa'o// 'du shes med par smra ba brgyad// gzugs can yin la 'du shes med// gzugs can ma yin 'du shes med// yin la ma yin 'du shes med// yin yang yin la 'du shes med// mtha' dag ldan la 'du shes med// mtha' dag mi ldan 'du shes med// ldan mi ldan la 'du shes med// ldan mi mi ldan 'du shes med// 'du shes yod med rtog pa brgyad// gzugs yin 'du shes yod med min// gzugs can ma yin 'du shes yod med dang// gzugs min gzugs can ma yin yod// gzugs can ma yin pa yang min// 'du shes yod pa ma yin med pa min// mtha' dag ldan yang yod min med// mtha' dag mi ldan yod min med// mtha' dag ldan ma ldan pa yod med min// mtha' dag ldan yang mi ldan yod min med// chad par lta ba rnam pa bdun// shes pa rtag bzhi phung po rtag/ gzugs yod 'dod khams med nas chad// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams pa dang// gzugs med khams la bzhi ste bdun// tshe 'dir mya ngan 'das lta lnga// dbang lnga 'dod yon lnga shor yang// de nyid myang 'das dgongs pa dag/ bdag gir 'dzin pa rnam bcu ni// phung po lnga la gcig pur 'dzin// de las kun 'byung dgu ru 'dzin// bdag ni de la za bar 'dzin// bdag yin legs nyes byed par 'dzin// nyon mongs rnam byang bdag por 'dzin// phya dang dbang phyug gtso bor 'dzin// rang dbang gyur pas dbang du 'dzin// rang bzhin ye nas rtag par yang 'dzin// bdag yod chos yod rnal 'byor 'dzin// nyon mongs rnam par byang bar 'dzin// mu stegs rtag chad spyi'i rnam grangs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rtag par lta ba ni// snying dkyil byed pa po nyid rtag/ chad par lta ba'i mu stegs ni// tshe la snga phyi med par 'dod// de la rtag par lta ba dgu// spyir ni bdag rtag blo 'gyur lta// phya'am dbang phyug rtag par 'dod// rig byed tshig rtag dug sngags 'dra// brjod du med pa'i gang zag rtag/ rigs bya rtag pas khams gsum mo// bye brag rtag pa thams cad sems// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rtag/ srog zag sgom la nges par rtag/ byed pa thams cad mthar thug rtag/ chad par lta ba rnam pa gsum// yon tan khyad par chad par lta// las ni rgyu 'bras chad par lta// tshe ni snga phyi chad par lta// dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba las// mu stegs kyi lta ba gsang

bar ston pa'i le'u ste// mun pa'i 'khor sgo gtan la dbab pa'i le'u stelnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan pad+ma yis// sharda pa yi glu blangs pas// glu dang tshig bcad bab chol sbyar// don dang tshig tu mthun pa ni// mos pa chung ba'i nyan thos dang// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang rgyal 'dus// de yang sprul pa'i nyan thos ni// kun dga' bo dang shA ri'i bu// mo 'gal bu dang 'od srungs so// lam la gnas pa'i nyan thos ni// 'gog pa dag la gnas pa'o// tshul rtag 'dzin pa'i nyan thos ni// rtsa ba bzhi la gyes pa ni// thams cad smra ba'i sde pa bdun// 'od srungs sde dngas stong sde// chos srungs sde dang mang thos sde// gos dmar sde dang rnam phye'i sde// rmongs pa'i sde dang rnam bdun yin// mang po'i bkur ba'i sde la gsum// 'jig rten gnas pa'i sde pa dang// gtsug lag khang chen sde pa dang// rgyal byed tshangs pa'i sde pa gsum// phal chen pa yi sde pa lnga// sha ra ri pa yi sde pa dang// nub ri pa yi sde pa dang// gsang ba'i rig byed gnas pa dang// 'jig rten 'das par smra ba dang// rtag par yod par smra sde'o// gnas brtan pa yi sde pa gsum// sgra sgrogs dril bu'i sde pa dang// sku srungs pa yi sde padang// gnas ma bu pa'i sde pa gsum// nyan thos grags pa 'di dang yang// rang byung sdom pa bcu gsungs te// gang zag gang las skye ba dang// sdom pa blangs bya'i yul dang ni// thob dang ma thob pa yi rgyu// thob pa rang gi ngo bo dang// ming gi rnam grangs bgrang ba dang// nges pa'i tshig gis mtshon pa dang// rab tu dbye ba'i grangs res dang// gtong ba'i rgyu dang bcas pa dang// thob pa'i don ni brtan pa dang// gtang ba'i don rnam ldan par byed// sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis ldan// zas kyi sgo nas sbyangs pa gsum// bsod snyoms gdan cig phyis mi len// gos kyi sgo nas sbyangs pa gsum// thang bsham thabs chos gos gsum// gnas kyi sgo nas sbyangs pa bzhi// bla khab med dang dgon pa dang// shing drung pa dang dur khrod pa// spyod lam sgo nas sbyangs pa gnyis// cog pu pa dang ji bzhin pa// mdo sde bye brag lta ba yang// mthun pa'i mu bcu 'di lta ste// dgag bya rtag chad 'gegs par mthun// nyams len lam ni bden bzhir mthun// 'bras bu sa bdun thob dus mthun// lhag bcas lhag med thub tshul mthun// 'bras bu dgra bcom ngeM bo mthun// theg pa'i sa lam mthong lam mthun// nyon mongs gra dang tshor spong mthun// phyogs rtogs gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan mthun// nges 'byung theg pa'i rgyu mtshan mthun// rnam shes tshogs drug smra bar mthun// nyan thos kyi gsang ba bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang rgyal ni// bse ru lta bur gcig pur

gnas// ne tso lta bur khyu yang lding// 'di gnyis mthun pa'i mu dgu yod// dgag bya gzung 'dzin 'gog par mthun// nyams len rten 'brel lam du mthun// skye ba lngas thob 'bras dus mthun// mgyogs chen rdzu 'phrul thob tshul 'thun// me 'bar chu 'brug rdzu 'phrul 'thun// yid ni bde mchog ngo bo 'thun// phyogs rtogs gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshon 'thun// nges 'byung gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan mthun// lta ba rten 'brel bcu gnyis la// lugs nas byung ba bcu gnyis ni// ma rig rgan mo long ma 'dra// 'du byed rdza mkhan mkhas pa 'dra// rnam par shes pa spre'u 'dra// ming dang gzugs ni yul mkhar 'dra// skye mched drug ni mkhar dang 'dra// reg pa 'od ni byed pa 'dra// tshor ba bus mo mda' 'phog 'dra// len pa me tog 'thu ba 'dra// sred pa tshwa chu 'thung ba 'dra// srid pa pho mo sprad pa 'dra// skye ba mal bu skyes 'dra// rgas pa re shul zhig pa 'dra// shi ba ro ni bsdum pa 'dra// de nas lugs su bzlog pa ni/ shug 'bru dag la rtag pa yis// phyi yi rten 'brel lugs las bzlog/ dur khrod dag tu rtag pa yis// nang gi ma rig rtsad nas gcod// phyi nang rten 'brel dgongs pa sgom// rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// garda pa yi glu blangs pas// gar dang dbyangs ni khrol bur bcad// don mthun pa ru sbyar ba yis// sems tsam pa dang dbu ma pa// rang dbang med par sdud pa'o// sems tsam rnam pa gsum yod de// rnam bcas rnam med rnam rdzun smra// rnam bcas grib bcas shes bya ba// gnyis med dag la gnyis snang 'dod// rnam med grib med ces bya ba// gnyis med gnyis snang dri ma med// rnam rdzun rnam bden rnam pa gnyis// rnam rdzun gang gis shes pa la// rgyu gnyis 'dod bar byed pa dang// de min rnam pa bden pa'o// 'di dag 'thun pa'i mu bcu yod// dgag bya nyan rang 'gog par mthun// theg chen lam lngas lam mthun// nyams len gcig dang 'du 'bral mthun// bskal pa gsum na 'bras thob mthun// rang gi ngo bo sku gsumamathun// nyon mongs spong sbyongagand ka mthun// nges 'byung bzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan mthun// phyogs rtogs bzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan mthun// rnam par rig tsam smra ba mthun// gtan tshig chen po bzhi mthun no// sems tsam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bye brag gshis kyi dbu ma ni// chos nyid spros pa'i mtha' bral dbus// brjod pa sgra yi dbu ma ni// dbu ma can du mtshon byed dbu ma ni// dbu ma tsam du mtshon byed tshig/ phyogs su 'dzin pa'i dbu ma gsum// mdo sde spyod pa'i dbu ma ni// nyan thos mdo sde pa bzhin 'dod// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma ni// sems cam lta ba bzhin du 'dod// dbu ma spyi zlum

zhal che ba// don dam spros pa kun dang bral// kun rdzob gtan 'bebs rnam pa brgyad// kun rdzob spyi yi mtshan nyid dang// ngo bo slu bar byed pa dang// nges tshig rtags mi bzod pa dang// dbye ba yang dag bzlog pa gnyis// so so'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang// skyob par byed pa'i mthun dpe dang// sgrub bar byed pa'i rig pa don// kun rdzob gnyis kyi khyad par brgyad// ngas ni khyod la gsal bar bstan// don dam bden pa bstan 'bebs brgyad// spyi yi mtshan nyid spros dang bral// don dam ngo bo dam pa'i yul// nges tshig shes bya dam pa'o// dbye ba rnam grangs rnam grangs min// so so'i mtshan nyid stong par gnas// khyad par skyob pa bco brgyad stong// sgrub byed rig pa rnal 'byor go/ mtshan dpe gang 'thad sbyar ba rnams// dbu ma'i don rnams rab smras pa'o// dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// spyod pa'i 'dren sgo bstan pa ste drug pa'o//// de nas khro rgyal chen po yis// lcang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// dbyangs dang tshigs su bcad pa ni// kri ya u pa yo ga btus// kri ya don gyi lha drug ni// stong pa chos nyid lha ru gnas// grag pa sgra yi lha yin la/ yig 'bru gsung gi phyag rgya lha// phyag mtshan lha ni thugs yin te// sku ni dngos su grub pa la// yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus yang bsrungs// rnam sna nga snang mtha' mi bskyod gsum// rigs kyi gtso bo sangs rgyas nyid// spyan ma gos dkar ma ma ki/ rigs kyi yum gsum sangs rgyas gzugs// 'jam dpal spyan ras phyag na rdor// rigs kyi bdag po byang chub sems// gshin rje rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil// rigs kyi khro bo rnam pa gsum// rnon po rtse mo phur ma gsum// rigs kyi pho nya gsum du grags// bco lnga rje khol lta bur 'dod// bya ba'i rgyud ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lta ba yo ga spyod pa 'og/ cha gnyis 'dzin pa u pa ya// rdo rje'i gdung dang rin chen gdung// pad+mo'i gdung dang gzhon nu'i gdung// dam tshig sems dpa' rang nyid la// ye shes sems dpa' grogs po'i tshul// mchod cing bsgrub pa dngos grub don// ma lus don rnams grub byed pa// spyod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga ni// stong pa nyid la byang chub dang// zla ba'i gdan dang yig 'bru gsum// phyag mtshan sku ru grub pa ni// gtso bo dgu dang lha mo brgyad// byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang// sgo ba bzhi rnams rab gsal nas// dbang bskur ba yi cho 'phrul dang// spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa yi// cho 'phrul bzhi yi lha tshogs rnams// spun zla lta bur bsgrub par 'dod// rnal 'byor rgyud ces bya bar grags// dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// thabs kyi sbyor sgo'i le'u ste bdun

pa'o//// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// dpang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// dbyangs tshig don gsum gnas sbyangs pas// bskyed dang rdzogs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ste/ rnam smin rig 'dzin rnal 'byor lus// tshe dbang rig 'dzin sprul sku'i 'khor// phyag rgya chen po longs sku'i 'khor// lhun grub rigs 'dzin chos sku'i 'khor// 'bras bu sku lnga lhun grub thob// rgyud ma hA yo ga'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnal 'byor bla med lung gi don// rig par snang ba kun bzang yab/ yul du snang ba bzang mo yum// bar na 'brel ba bde chen sras// ye shes yab kyi skur snang bas// dbyings ni yum du rnam par dag/ sras ni bde ba chen por gnas// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa// sprul pa'i sku ru snang ba de// lung chen ngang du sangs rgyas pa'o// lung a nu yo ga'i don bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnal 'byor bla med man ngag don// rang bzhin skye ba med pa las// rol pa 'gag pa med par shar// mtshan nyid gnyis su med par gnas// blo rtogs thams cad chos nyid grol// mdo ni thig le nyag gcig bsdu// 'gag ni bya btsal med par sdom// phu thag da lta'i snang bar bcad// 'gro sa chos kyi dbyings su gtang// chos kyi sku ru sangs rgyas pa'o// dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// nges pa'i gsang sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// sngags dang mtshan nyid khyad par gsungs// 'khor 'das chos kyi mtshan nyid rnams// ji ltar gsal ston rgyu yi lam// dngos po rnams ni stong par ston// bskal pa grangs med tshogs kyang bsogs// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg par gsungs// de ltar 'bras bu mi shes so// 'khor 'das chos rnams ma lus pa// sku gsung 'bras bu gtan la 'bebs// rigs gsum rigs bzhi rigs lnga dang// longs sku sprul sku chos kyi sku// snang tshabs ched ston gzugs skur gsal// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras thob pa'o// dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu gsang sngags rnam par dbye ba ste le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems la dmigs pa 'di gsungs so// sems la dmigs par byed pa ni// de la ngo bo rab bshad na// bem po'i las ni log pa yis// rang gi rig pa tsam du 'dod// de la nged tshigs rab bshad na// dmigs yul bsam pas 'jug pas sems// de la rnam grangs rab bshad na// sna tshogs pas ni snang bas sems// rten byed pas ni yid ces bya// dbang po rang rang yul shes pas// de ni rnam par shes pa'o// de la dbye ba rab bshad na// rtog med kun tu snang ba ni// snang ba mched pa nyer thob gsum// rtog

bcas rang bzhin snang ba ni/ rang bzhin rtogs bcas brgyad bcu'o// de la mthun snang rab bshad na// mi mkhas pa la snang ba ni// nyi na mo mtshan mo mtshams kyi cha// mkhas pa rnams la snang ba ni// yi ge brda sprod snang ba yang// oM dang AHdang hU~M du snang// mtshan nyid pa la snang ba ni// sems dang sems byung ma rig pa'o// gsang sngags pa la snang ba ni// bskyed rim pa la snang ba yang// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma dang// lha yi sku dang gshegs su gsol// rdzogs rim pa la snang ba ni// rtsa rlung thig ler snang ba'o// de la rang bzhin rna gzhag ni// snang ba'i 'khor du gsum gsum las// mchod pa rang bzhin bzhi bcu dang// nyer thob ma rig skad cig ma// de la mtshan nyid rab bshad na// bcos pa'i mtshan nyid blun mo ni// ba glang rdzi la snang ba yang// nyin mtshan mtshams kyi char snang la// rnal ma'i mtshan nyid sems gsum snang// de la 'jug pa'i go rim ni// dang po snang ba de la mchod// de nas nye bar thob pa'o// de la 'jug pa'i dus tshod ni// yun thung skad cig thang gcig nas// yun rings 'khor bar gnas kyi bar// snang pa gsum gyi kun khyab 'jug/ de la sems gsum nges bsgrub na// rtog med kun snang nges rlung yin// rtog bcas rang bzhi snang ba ni// snang ba gsum dang khams phra gnyis// kun gzhi dang ni yid yin no// de la man ngag gtan la dbab// spyi dang bye brag rnam gnyis bshad// spyi ni dngos dang 'gyur tshul bcas// bye brag gso so spyir dril bstan// dngos ni yid kyi rnam shes so// 'gyur tshul rlung sems bcas pa la// mi rta lta bu tshogs pa gcig/ chu dang 'o ma dbyer med bzhin// so so dbang po rnam lnga yang// mig sna rna ba lce dang ni// lus kyi dbang po gsang ba'o// mig la gzugs kyi snang ba gsum// rna ba sgra yi snang ba gsum// sna la dri yi snang ba gsum// lce la ro yi snang ba gsum// lus la reg bya'i snang ba gsum// tha mal rnal 'byor yang dag gsum// tha mal pa la snang ba ni// dmyal khams gzugs med khams rnams la// kun la snang ba'i khyab pa'o// gzugs can rnams la dbang lngas khyab// gzugs med yid kyi snang ba'i khyab// yul can rnal 'byor snang ba gsum// snang bas yul de mthong ba dang// mched pas yul la legs nyes brtags// nye bar thob pas zhen pa log/ dag pa sangs rgyas snang ba gsum// snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin la// mched pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nye bar thob pa chos kyi sku// sbrul sku rang la snang ba gsum// snang ba sprul skur 'khrungs pa dang// mched pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// nye bar thob pas mya ngan 'das// longs sku rang la snang ba gsum// snang ba ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// mched pa

dgongs pas chos kyang ston// nye ba thob pa sa bcu pa'i// 'khor gyi sgrib sbyongs chos skur grol// chos sku rang la snang ba gsum// snang ba ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// snang bas chos sku longs skur shar// mched pa longs skus sprul skur 'gyed// nyer thob slar yang chos skur grol// de la don ni rab bshad na// snang ba gang ldan bshad pa gsum// 'khor ba'i khams gsum sems can rnams// rnang ba gsum dang ldan pa dang// 'jig rten lha srin gdug pa rnams// snang ba gsum dang ldan pa dang// dag pa'i sangs rgyas sku gsum rnams// snang ba gsum dang ldan pa'o// de la skyel sa rab bshad na// sems gsam dag ni skyel sa ni// gsal stong gnyis su med pa yi// mngon par byang chub ngang du bskyal// gsal ba rang rig snang ba la// stong pa yul gyi snang ba ste// yul sems gnyis su med pa ni// mngon sum byang chub sangs rgyas par// dbang chen rnal 'byor pa yis mthong// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// snang ba gsum gtan la dbab pa sems gsum la dmigs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rlung rnams kyi de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so// rlung rnams de nyid rab bshad na// de yang rlung gi ngo bo bshad// srog dang rtsol pa'i bdag nyid de// srog ni nang du gnas pa la// rtsol ba phyi nang ldang 'jug byed// de nas rlung gi nged tshig ni// 'khor 'das las kun byed pas rlung// 'khor ba'i rgas na 'chi bar byed// 'das pa'i sku dang ye shes byed// de nas rlung gi dbye ba ni// rtsa ba'i rlung dang yan lag rlung// rtsa ba'i rlung ni rnam pa lnga// srog 'dzin pa dang gyen du rgyu// thur sel me mnyam khyab byed yin// yan lag rlung yang rnam pa lnga// rgyu ba rab tu rnam par rgyu// yang dag rgyu dang nges par rgyu// de nas rlung de rigs 'dzin la// rtsa ba yan lag brdas pa bshad bya// klu yi rlung dang rus sbal rlung// tshangs pa lha sbyin lta bu'i rlung// gzhu rgyal lnga ni rtsa ba yin// nyi ma 'brug dang gla rtsi dang// a ru ra dang reg 'jam bya// de nas rlung gi gnas pa gsum// rtsa ba srog 'dzin snying gar gnas// gyen du rgyub lkog ma ste// me dang mnyam pa lte ba la// thur du sel ba gsang ba na// khyab byed tshig la gnas pa'o// yan lag rgyu ba mig la gnas// rab tu rgyu ba rna ba la// rnam par rgyu ba sna yin te// yang dag par ni rgyu ba lce// nges par rgyu ba lus la gnas// de nas rlung gi las byed tshul// thun mong khyad par gnyis yod de// thun mong 'khor ba bskyed pa dang// 'das pa bskyed pa'i las gnyis byed// 'khor bskyed par byed pa yang// dang po pha ma'i sa bon 'byin// bar do'i shes pa dag dang bsres// ma yi mngal du

smin par byed// bar du lus rgyas rgas par byed// tha mar 'chi ste lus sems 'bral// bar dor lus lan yang yang 'khor// 'das pa bskyed par byed pa yang// rnal 'byor bskyed rim sgom pa dang// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang// 'bras bu thob par rlung gis byed// khyad par las gnyis 'khor 'das te// 'khor ba'i rgyu la las byed gnyis// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag yin// ma shi bar du tshe srog 'dzin// mchil snabs gyen la 'dren pa dang// bshang gci khu khrag thur la sel// me mnyam drod kyis kha zas 'ju// khyad par 'gro drug las rnams byed// rgyu bas gzugs ni mthong bar byed// rab tu rgyu bas sgra rnams thos// rnam par rgyu bas dri yang tshor// yang dag rgyu bas ro rnams myong// nges par rgyu bas reg bya shes// 'das pa'i bye brag ci shes pa// srog 'dzin la sogs las bzhi 'grub// khyab byed bar dor 'od gsal 'char// yan lag spyi dang bye brag bshad// thun mongs dngos grub thob pa dang// mngon shes rnam pa lnga yang 'char// de nas rlung gi bya ba yang// 'byung lnga rtsa ba yan lag yin// srog 'dzin chu la gyen rgyu me// thur sel sa yin me mnyam me// khyab byed nam mkha'i rlung du 'dod// rgyu ba me la rab rgyu rlung// rnam rgyus ste yang dag/ nges par rgyu ba nam mkha' 'o// de nas rlung gi rgyu tshul ni/ gcig ni gtso bor rgyu tsam na// rlung gzhan 'khor du rgyu ba'o// me yi rlung ni gyen du ldang// chu yi rlung ni thur du dbab// sa yi rlung ni thad kar gnas// rlung gi rlung ni bsegs la gro// nam mkha'i rlung ni kun la khyab// de nas rlung gi rgyu ba'i grangs// spyi dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis// spyir na nyin zhig phrugs gcig la// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya pa'o// bye brag tu ni me yi rlung// nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar rgyu// gzhan yang de bzhin rgyu ba yin// de nas rlung gi nyams len gsum// phyir la 'gro na btang ba yis// man ngag stod nad tshad pa sel// nang du 'jug na gang pa yis// man ngag smad kyi grang ba 'joms// khong du gnas na kha sbyor gyi// man ngag tshe yi rigs 'dzin thob// 'byung 'jug gnas pa gsum du slobs// de nas rlung gi man ngag 'di// rlung gi kha dog rab bshad bya// srog 'dzin dkar la gyen rgyu dmar// thur sel ser la me mnyam ljang// khyab byed mthing kha'i mdog can yin// rgyu ba dmar la rab rgyu ljang// rnam par rgyu ba ser po la// yang dag par ni rgyu ba dkar// nges par rgyu ba mthing kha la// de nas rlung dang lha sbyar na// rtsa ba'i rlung yang gnyis su snang// rags par snang ba rigs lnga'i yum// phra bar snang ba rigs lnga yab// yan lag gnyis su snang ba yang// rags par snang ba sems mal// phra bar snang ba sems dpa'

ste// mdor na zhi dang khro bor snang// khro rgyal pad+ma he ru ka/ rlung gi de nyid 'dul bya'i don// pho nya 'gug 'dren las rnams spro// de nas rlung gi rang bzhin gnyis// ma dag 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ni// phung po khams dang skye mched yin// dag pa sangs rgyas rang bzhin ni// bde gshegs sku lnga ye shes lnga// de sogs dpag med rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas rlung gi bsdu ba ni// rtsa ba'i rlung lnga bems por bsdu// yan lag rlung lnga gsal bar bsdu// bems po 'byung ba rlung dang ni// gsal ba rig pa'i rlung zhes bya// de nas rlung gi 'byor sa tshad ni// rnam par ral tu gsal ba dang// rgyu ba nges par 'byung ba'o// rtsam pa kha dog lngar shes te// rgyu ba lo zla nyin zhag dus// de nas rlung gi dgos pa ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pa grub pas dgos// de nas rlung gi don bshad na// rlung rnams gang la ldan pa ni// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la// zag bcas rlung dang ldan pa la// rnal 'byor lam bsgrub rnams la yang// khams kyi 'du lugs gsum dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la// zag pa med pa'i rlung dang ldan// de nas rlung gi 'bras bu ni// lam gyur 'bras bu rigs 'dzin bgrod// mthar thug 'bras bu wa gsum thob// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba yang// 'di ni ngo bo rab bshad pa// yi ge 'bru gsum zhes bya ba// oM dang AHdang hU~M du gnas// 'di ni nges pa'i tshig bshad na// sngags ni shes skyob shes bya ste// sngags rnams der ni 'dus pas shes// 'dod ba'i don grub 'khor ba skyob// 'di ni dbye ba rnam bzhir gnas// brjod par bya ba'i 'bru gsum ni// oM dang AHdang hU~M du bzlas// dmigs par bya ba'i 'bru gsum ni// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// brda ru gyur pa'i 'bru gsum ni// rlung ni 'jug ldang gnas pa gsum// don dam pa yi 'bru gsum ni// 'od gsal stong pa zung du 'jug/ 'di ni las kyi rnam bzhi byed// brjod par bya ba'i 'bru gsum las// sngon 'gro mchod rdzas byin brlabs dang// dngos gzhi lha sku bskyed pa dang// snying pos bskul ba'i bsnyen bsgrub dang// tha mar sku gsung thugs su thim// dmigs par bya ba'i 'bru gsum las// 'khor ba'i lus ngag yid gsum bskyed// 'das pa'i sku gsung thugs 'grub ba'o// brdar gyur ba yi 'bru gsum las// phyir sdang oM las 'gro don mdzad// nang 'jug hU~M gis dngos grub len// khong gnas AHni chos kyi sku'o// don dam pa'i yi 'bru gsum las// 'od gsal

snying rje chen po thabs// stong pa shes rab ngos bzung bral// thabs shes zung 'jug dbyer med pa'o// 'di ni bzlas pa'i dpe bzhi ni// rdo rje ltar na dbyer med pa// 'bru gsum lus ngag yid gsum dang// sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med do// rdo rje lta bu thogs med ni// nyin bzhag phrugs gcig dag la yang// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu// bzlas pa de ltar 'grub pa ni// rang bzhin lta gong sa bzlas brjod do// rdo rje rtse lnga ltar gnas ni// dper na rdo rje rtse lnga pa// cha gsum dag tu yod pa ltar// phyir la ldang ba bde gshegs lnga// nang du 'jug pa ye shes lnga// khong du gnas pa 'byung lnga'o// rdo rje rin chen lta bu ru// dgos 'dod re ba skong ba ni// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams// thams cad ma lus 'grub pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i bzlas pa bya ba dang// khro bo'i bzlas pa bya ba dang// de dag re re kun la yang// bsnyen pa bzlas byar gnyis su 'gyur// 'di ni bzlas pa'i yon tan yang// nyon mongs dug gsum sbyong ba dang// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dang// sku gsum 'bras bu thob pa'o// 'di ni srid gsum sbyar na bzhi// phyi yi srid pa gsum po ni// steng na lha gnas bar na mi// 'og na klu yi srid pa'o// nang gi srid pa gsum po ni// dang po skye bar srid pa dang// bar du na ba'i srid pa dang// thar mar 'chi ba'i srid pa'o// g.yang ba'i srid pa gsum po ni// la la na dang ras na// a wa d+hu ti dag tu 'dod// dbang ba'i srid pa gsum po ni// pho dang mo dang ma ning gsum// 'di ni khams gsum sbyar ba ni// 'dod khams hU~M la gzugs khams oM// gzugs med khams ni yi ge AH 'di ni mtho ris ngan song sbyar// oM ni byol song yi dgas AH/ hU~M don ma rtogs dmyal bar 'khor// oM ni lha yin lha min hU~M// AHni mi ru gnas pa'o// 'di ni mya ngan 'das bar sbyar// sbrul sku oM la longs sku hU~M// AHni chos skur gnas pa'o// 'di ni 'bru gsum kha dog bshad// oM ni dkar la AHni dmar// hU~M nimathing ka'i mdog yin no// 'di ni 'bru gsum lha srin sbyar// oM ni gti mug klu yin la// AHni 'dod chags gnod sbyin te// hU~M ni zhe sdang gshin rje'o// 'di ni 'bru gsum sgra yi gnas// oM gyi sgra ni spyi bo nas// kha ru yong ba'i yum tsam mo// AHyi sgra ni greb nas// kha ru song ba'i yun tsam mo// hU~M gi sgra ni lte ba nas// kha ru yong ba'i yun tsam mo// 'di ni 'bru gsum don bshad pa// lus kyi stod smad gnas pa ni// oM ni lus steng mgon gnas// AH ni lus bar mgrin par gnas// hU~M ni lus smad thugs kar gnas// 'di ni 'bru gsum bskyed pa'i rgyu// rgyu ba'i rgyu ni yi ge

AH// dngos rgyu A li kA li sogs// gsang sngags ma lus 'dis bskyed pas// sngags kun rtsa bar 'di 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'bru gsum dgongs pa ni// bskyed rim rdzogs rim kun 'grub bas// 'bru gsum sngags kyi rgyal po 'di// lam zhugs rnal 'byor kun la dgos// 'di ni 'bru gsum don bshad ni// chos dgos gang yin ngos bzung na// 'di ni rdo rje bzlas pa yin// oM AH hU~M// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i don bstan pa le'u stebacu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par byang chub pa 'di gsungs so// mngon par byang chub don nyid ni// khyed la gdams ngag bshad par bya// 'di yi byang chub ngo bo ni// don dam spros pa bral ba'o// 'di yi byang chub nges tshig ni// mngon zhen 'khor ba snod bcud la// chub pa snang dang zhen bral nas// de don mngon du byas pa'o// 'di yi byang chub dbye ba ni// ngo bo nyid kyi byang chub ni// chos rnams gnas lugs skye med gnas// lam rim mngon par byang chub ni// bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i lus 'di yang// rgyu ma bsam gtan stong par rtogs// 'bras bu'i mngon par byang chub ni// gzugs sku gnyis po chos skur thim// 'di yi rnam grangs rnam gcig ste// phyi dpe mngon par byang chub ni/ nyi ma dag kyang ma shar ba'i// nam mkha' sprin med lta bu'o// nang don mngon par byang chub ni// rang rig spros pa'i mtha' bral ba// bde stong dag tu gnas pa'o// 'di yi bsam gtan rnam pa bzhi// sngon 'gro bla mar gsol ba btab// dngos gzhi bsam gtan rnam bzhi bsgom// thun mtshams thun tshod bzung ba dang// rjes spyod lam kun mi 'bral bya// dngos gzhi bsam gtan gnyis sgom pa// ril por gzhig pa'i bsam gtan dang// rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan no// ril 'dzin bsam gtan bdag nyid ni// pad+ma dbang gi skur gsal nas// de ni dam tshig sems dpa' yin// thugs kar yi ge gsal ba ni// de ni ye shes sems dpa' yin// yig 'bru thig le'i rang bzhin nam// de yi nang du thig le gsal// de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' yin// rang nyid de ltar sgom pa dang// sems can rnams dang tha dad med// yi ge 'od 'phros 'phags pa mchod// sems can sbyangs nas slar la 'dus// spyi nas snying gar thur la thim// rkang mthil snying gar gyen la thim// snying kha'i thig ge stong par bsgom// rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan ni// sgom pa'i rim pa kun mthun yang// de ltar sgom par byed pa yis// shes pa rang yang stong par thim// 'di yi byang chub dpe bstan pa// ril por 'dzin pa'i bsam gtan dpe// me long dag la has btab

pa'i// dbugs kyi ngad 'dus lta bu'o// rjes su gzhig pa'i bsam gtan dpe// lteng ka dag tu chu 'khyil ba// sa la thim nas med pa'am// thal ba rlung gis 'thor byas nas// rlung bcas nam mkha' zhi bzhin no// 'di yi nyams kyi 'char dus ni// gnyis dus ye shes skye ba dang// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor dus// lhan skyes ye shes skye ba dag// lam sgom dus su ye shes skye// 'chi dus ye shes skye ba'o// 'di yi byang chub thim lugs ni// sa ni chu la thim pa yi// rtags ni smig rgyu lta bu dang// de yi nyams yang 'od lngar 'char// chu yang me la thim pa yi// rtags ni du ba lta bu dang// me yang chu la thim pa ni// srin bu me khyer lta bu dang// rlung ni rnam par shes pa la// thim pas nyi ma lta bu dang// rnam par shes pa chos nyid du// thim dus sprin med nam mkha' 'dra// dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// byang chub kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zung du 'jug pa 'di gsungs so// zung du 'jug pa'i don 'di ni// khyed la rab tu bshad bya na// de nyid zung 'jug ngo bo ni// gnyis med ye shes chen po yin// de nyid nges pa'i tshig bshad na// zung ni gnyis kyi rnam pa la// 'jug pa gcig tu bsres pa'o// de nyid dbye ba bye brag spyi// bye brag gzhi lam 'bras bu ni// ngo bo nyid kyi zung 'jug bzhi// chos rnams gnyis med gnas pa'o// lam gyi rim pa'i zung 'jug ni// dngos por snang ba'i chos can rnams// chos nyid stong par gnas pa'o// 'bras bu'i zung du 'jug pa ni// sku gsung tha dad med par gcig/ spyir ni 'od gsal zug 'jug gnyis// rig pa'i sems kyi 'od gsal ni// rgyu yis ma bskyed rkyen mi 'jig/ rig cing gsal ba'i sems 'di yang// cir yang ma grub ye shes rtogs// de ni sems kyi 'od gsal yin// dbang po sgo lnga'i yul snang ba'i// snod du 'dzin pa kun bral de// yul du ma grub ngos bzung bral// stong par rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// chos can chos nyid ngang du grol// de na chos nyid 'od gsal yin// yul sems gcig tu 'dres pa ni// de ni 'dres pa'i zung 'jug yin// sems nyid chos nyid dbyer med na// de ni dbyer med zung 'jug yin// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba ni// de ni 'brel ba'i zung 'jug yin// don dam kun rdzob tha dad bral// de na don gcig zung 'jug yin// mdor na gnyis pa'i chos rnams kun// gnyis med gyur na zung 'jug yin// de nid mtshon dpe bstan pa yang// dper na glang chen mthun po gnyis// gnya' shing gcig gis bsdus nas ni// zhing rmo'i bya ba byed pa ltar// snang ba dang ni stong pa gnyis// don gcig tu ni rtogs par byed// de nyid rnam grangs rnam pa

gsum// snang ba zung du 'jug pa ni// zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bos te// de yang thabs dang kun rdzob dang// shes rab dang ni don dam gnyis// gnyis med gcig tu ston pa'o// 'brel ba zung du 'jug pa ni// yon tan dag gi rnam pas te// gsal stong gnyis su med pa ru// chos rnams thams cad gnas pa la// de ltar ma rtogs thugs rje skye// 'gog pa zung du 'jug pa ni// rtog pa'i khyad par dbye ba ste// gsal ba dang ni stong pa ru// chos rnams thams cad 'dus rtogs nas// de la rnal 'byor blo chen gyis// gnyis 'dzin rnam rtog mi gnas so// de nyid zung du 'jug rtogs pa'i// gang zag mya ngan 'das lugs gnyis// theg pa chung ngu thams cad ni// las dang nyon mongs sgo nas 'byed// theg pa chen por gyur pa kun// sku gsum sgo nas 'byed pa'o// theg chung nyan rang lta bu ni// sems can thams cad 'chi ba yang// lhag ma'i lus 'dir dor mod kyang// las dang nyon mongs bag chags kyis// lus de ma bor yod pas na// de yi phyi ma'i lus len pas// lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa yin// da lta'i lus 'di dor byas nas// las dang nyon mongs bag chags kyis// lus yang med par gyur pa yis// lhag med mya ngan 'das pa'o// theg pa chen po 'di ltar bshad// lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa ni// rigs 'dzin gzugs sku rnam gnyis thob// lhag med mya ngan 'das pa ni// chos kyi sku nyid mngon gyur thob// de nyid zung du gang 'jug na// rig pa'i ye shes gsal ba dang// yul gyi dbyings nyid stong pa gnyis// gcig tu 'dres shing ro gcig pa'o// de bzhin zung 'jug 'bras bu ni// rdo rjes 'chang ba chen pos sku// mtshan dpes brgyan pa longs sku la// de yi thugs ni mi rtog pa'i/ ye shes 'od gsal chos kyi sku// de la thugs rje 'byung ba ni// ma 'gags shar ba sprul pa'i sku// sku gsum lta bur snang na yang// gsum mo tha dad ma yin no// rdo rje 'chang skur ro gcig 'gyur// zung 'jug 'bras bu de nyid ni// dkyil 'khor bdag po rdo rje 'chang// rgyud kyi ston pa kun tu bzang// gdug pa 'dul na pad+ma dbang// mdor na 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// ji ltar snang ba pad+ma'i sku// dbang chen don las ma g.yos pas// 'khor 'das dregs pa gsang bar phyung// rmongs pa mi shes mun pa la// gab sbas med pa'i rgyud chen 'di// 'gro bas rtogs phyir gsal bar bshad// 'di ltar bstan yang ma go na// skal med rigs chad med par nges// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// dbyer med zung du 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dregs pa dbang gi las la bskol ba 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor

dgra bo sgrol 'dod na// dkyil 'khor mal gyi 'og tu bca'// gru gsum nag po rgya sog byug/ tsher ma can gyi shing gdan la// ra rog sogs pa ming byang ni// khyi yi khrag gis bri bar bya// yugs sa'i skras bkyigs dong nang gzhug/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad gdab// nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsang dmar ni// thur du kha bstan gzugs par bya// ri rab g.yam pas kha yang bcad// de ltar rang gi mal yang bca'// mdun du mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang// rta na gar rog khyi nag snying// sha sna snying sna'i gtor ma bshams// g.yag rog rwa co g.yas pa'i nang// dug khrag lcags zangs nyungs nag dang// nyungs kar skye tshe gang 'byor dang// pha 'ong nag po'i grig pa blug/ bya rog mda' la dar nag gdags// gtor ma dar nag zhal kheb bya// rang nyid pad+ma gsang chung ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje gdengs pa la// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kha na// pad stong steng na thod par bcas// mdun na lha chen nag pa ni// g.yas pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon pa gun+d+he sku la bsten// dug gul nag mo ras gyon ma// g.yas pa phyag gis gtsol 'khyud// g.yon pa rak+ta gtso la stob// mon pa nag po thar byed dgug/ zhags pa g.yas la gri gug g.yon// mon mo nag mo khrag mig dgug/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// bse yi skyes bu dmar po dgu/ lag na dmigs pa len par sgom// zla ba gsum du sngags 'di gdon// has khyung bya kri mu ka phaT// rog ti nag po srog la chem chem// rog sha nag posrog po ba ma ril ril// tsi ta nag po srog la rbad rbad// 'ur ba 'ur ba kha long kha/ ku tri ku tri dgra la b+h+yo// dam nyams srog nal kha sog sog/ rgyug breng kha long kha/ badzra ma tra srog la rbud rbud// glog snying dron mo thang la phyung// snying khral dron mo zhal du 'thung// dam nyams che ge mo'i srog ngan sgal nas chod// spyi bor skra bcings 'gram g.yas khrag// g.yon pa sol bas byug par bya// gcer bu ro sol thal bas byugs// d+ha ra ma glegs bam khur byas la// lag tu cang te 'u thog sa la dkrol// sngags bzlas sku nyid dngos su ston// me chen 'bar ba mthong na rab// bya nag mang po lding ba dang// shing la sta res gcod pa dang// sprin nag 'thibs pa 'byung ba ni// 'bring po yin par shes par bya// skya shar mang po byung ba dang// sha la khyi yis stod pa dang// lug khyur spyang ki zhugs ba ni// tha ma yin par shes par bya// mal 'og ling ka sbyin sreg bya// g.yag ru'i thun rnams zor du 'phangs// bsgrub pa sa thob bar dag tu// gdong dang lag pa mi bkru zhing// rang gi mal stan mi sprug go/ thon nas blo bur don mi gnyer// 'gro na rang lus gu kul

bdug/ khrus byas nas ni 'gro bar bya// dregs pa gsang byed dbang chen gyi rgyud las// pho zhe sdang gi gtso bo las srog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thog dang ser bas gzhom pa 'di gsungs so// dang por rang nyid pad+ma dbang// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa seng ldeng dbyug pas te// g.yon pasdigs mdzub zhags can sgom// oM sbar ta krid hri// ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT// gsum tsho bcu gcig skyol ba na// ra nga gi lus kyi bsrung ba yi na// de na smyug ma'i dong bu'i nang// nyung kar gtsang ma byas nas// snga'adi'abum tsho gsum du bzlas// oM na mo b+ha bag+to rig khrid mi ri ya hU~M phaT phaT// tshes bdun nas ni pha mo'i sngags// bcu bzhi bar du bzlas par bya ha ri nag phog/ ha ri nA ga myogs// ha ri nA ga khril// ha ri nA ga b+h+yo// ha ri rak+Sha b+h+yo// ha ri rag sha shag/ ha ri rig+sha phro// ha ri rag sha shar// ha ri rag+sha bron// de nas dben pa'i gnas nyid tu// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum nang// mi nag rta nag khyi nag khrag/ nyungs kar thun gyis rdzas su bya// phur pa gsum dang mchod rten dang// rnel gri 'am ni sha ba'i mgo// gru gsum grwa la gzhag pa ni// marda bud+d+ha zhes kyang bya// de nang 'khor lo gru bzhi pa// 'brug glog sbrul gyis dgang bar bya// sngags 'di 'bum chog gsum du bzlas// oM sum b+ha ra hril hril// hU~M na mo ba ga bag+to rig khrim la ri ya// yul che ge mor tsita ni ra sna ta ye sAr la phob bo// gru gsum rtse la gnas pa ni// dbang phyug chen po sbrul la zhon// mthing nag rdo rje be con bsnams// lha mchog chen po spre'u la zhon// mthing skya zor ba pho rtags 'dzin// gu lang nag po khyi la zhon// ser nag rlung nag phyag na 'dzin// gru gsum logs la gnas pa ni// ra hU~M la ni phag la zhon// mgo dgu dud kha mda' gzhu thogs// spen pa nag po 'brug la zhon// phyag na bre ba phyags ma bsnams// be ba sa ra stag la zhon// mthing skye be con snyem bsnams// mi nag rta nag khyi nag dang// 'bri nag byung na grub pa yin// sdur ma sngo la zhugs pa dang// btsas ma rnga na grub pa yin// ri rtser skyer ba'i phur pa gzugs// 'bring ni kham pa'i khrag dang ni// thun khrag bsres pas lam yang bstan// thod pa seng ldeng phur pa yis// yul gyi lha yang 'phang bar bya// mchod rten skyer ba'i phur pa yis// zhing gi dkyil du mtho yang gzugs// bcu bzhi dag la ser rta bskyal// bco lnga thog ser 'khrug cing 'bab// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// nga rgyal can gyi gnod sbyin chen po drug gis thog dang ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba 'di gsungs

so// rang nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis rta mgo ljang// rdo rje sdigs mdzub yum dang 'khril// thod pa kha twAM 'dzin pa'o// mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i chus// lag pa g.yon pas maN+Dal 'bul// srin lag g.yon pa'i chos 'byung bri// de'i steng gser mdog mkha' 'gro ma// g.yas pa shing thog a ru ra// g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin// sngags 'dis man+Dal dbul bar bya// oM g+ha taM dz+hi ba/ pa ra k+sha ni/ pha la ha re/ b+ha su n+he/ dz+hi wang+ka sha ri/ puSh+ti ka re/ b+ha ya nA sa ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+ta ni/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dz+ham+ba dz+hi ut+d+ha be/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma karaM dzaMswAhA/ sngags 'di 'bum du bzlas par bya// 'dod pa ma lus thams cad 'grub/ oM rA dzi hri dza/ badzra b+ha ra hi/ ha ri nis ri na// shrI ba su ni/ d+ha ma na k+She tre/ a pa rwa dza ta hri dza/ dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid kyis dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung zhing bzlog pa 'di gsungs so// mchod rten zur gsum nag po bya// bum pa'i nang du bdag gi gzugs// lag tu phur bu bzung byas nas/ zur la bzlog sngags gsum po bri// 'og gi ling ga dag la gzer// pho mo klu gsum 'dis bzlog go/ oM trag rak+sha ka rdar ni rbad b+h+yo// kha thun tshal ba nri rbad b+h+yo// nA ga shu tsa ra nri rbad b+h+yo// shan+ti pa ra nri rbad b+h+yo// ma nri ra ga nri rbad b+h+yo// yag+sha kha thun nri rbad b+h+yo// kha thun tshal pa nri rbad b+h+yo// hri tri dza nri rbad b+h+yo// pho thams cad dril te bzlog pa'o// dza thun kha la rak+sha ya// du ra yak+sha snying la ya// khal tsha nA ga srog la ya// kha rag yak+sha rbad su ya// ma ma rag ga khrag la ya// hi ri kha la rak+sha ya/ shu bo ra dza dbugs la ya// traM b+h+yo ta ma b+h+yo las la ya// mo thams cad sbyir dril te bzlog pa'i sngags so// tri thun kha la rtse yak+sha trad// ma ni dza thun kha la rbad// ma ni ra ga snying la rbad// pI ra tsa ni gzugs la rbad// snying khrag da la srog la rbad// ya ka yak+Sha srog la rbad// a gu sha ya snying la rbad// ma nri ra ga srog la rbad// klu gnyan thams cad dril te/ bzlog pa'i sngags so// zla ba gang yang rung ba yi// dus brgyad la ni gza' bdud dang// sde brgyad sdongs nas rgyu bas na// khang pa zur gsum skong bu nang// du ga khrag nyung dkar snga gas bzlas nas// dgra la zer du 'phang bar bya// bla rtsi ba bla mu li dang// sdong rgyus 'u 'bul shul dag dang// shing kun nyung dkar sngags bzlas nas// mgul du btags na bsrung bar 'gyur// dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las// phrag dog can gyi sde brgyad kyis bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal bskol ba 'di gsungs

so// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nang dag tu// ling ga ming rus ldan pa la// tha ma rbod rbad sngags kyis bskor// phyi ni rdza rnal ga 'ur gzhug/ nang ni glang ru nang du bya// gsang ba mdze thod nang bzhug go/ bdag nyid pad+ma dbang chen sgom/ sngags 'dis klu rnams bod par bya// oM nag po tam pa rtsa ya hU~M dza nA ga kro ti shwa ri hU~M dza/ na ga du na du na/ he li na ga 'dus 'dus sa ma yA dza/ klu yi cho 'phrul du ma byung// dkar gsum dmar gsum gtor ma dbul// rbad sngags 'dis bsgrub las la btang// 'jig rten khams kyi klu rnams 'du// oM nag po ta pi rtsa ya/ na ga rak+Sha/ che ge mo he khu la/ phe shan phos phos shig shig/ chuM chuM hU ya hU ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pas// dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya dza/ de nas gsad par bya ba ni// dug gi thun dang khrag gi thun// phurapas btab nas gtad par bya// bsad pa'i sngags 'dis rang glud brdeg/ nag po baM tsit+ta la rgyob// trag thur snying la thur// snying 'gul gul myags myags// rtsa bzhi bkums// shan shan srog la shan// thur thur srog la thur// che ge mo ma ra ya sod// sha ra na rgyal rigs gnas pas dkar// lho na bram ze gnas pas ser// nub na rje rigs gnas pas dmar// byang na dmangs rigs gnas pas sngo// byang shar rdol pa gnas bas nag/ phyogs dang kha dog shes nas ni// dmangs dang gdol pa nag la gtad// gang gtad 'chor ba med par 'gyur// gal te ldog pa gyur pa na// pad+ma dbang chen skur gsal te// thugs las bya khyung sprul pa gtang// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya// oM hu lu hu lu nag po tsa pa la rak+sha// e A ra la ni ga sri hU~M/ ka ru na tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT// ces bzlas bsrung ba dam pa'o// dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gti mug can klu nag po la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' 'gro ma dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la gzigs nas 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yis// lha tshogs bcu gsum dkyil 'khor gsal// gzugs bsnyen dkyil 'khor bris pa yis// thugs kyi rten la bsgrub par bya// rim pa dbang la bgrod pa yis// dbang bzhis lam dang mchod par bya// sku gsum yon tan 'phrin las kyis// dbang chen dregs pa 'dul bar bya// mun pa'i 'khor sgo chen po yis// 'gro drug mu stegs dbang du bya// spyod pa'i 'dren sgo bsten pa yis// mtshan nyid theg pa dbang du bya// thabs kyi sbyor sgo bshad pa yis// bya spyod rnal 'byor don rnams 'dul// nges pa'i gsang sgro bstan pa yis// bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen pa la bskyal// rgyu 'bras dbye ba bshad pa yis// snang tshabs stong tshabs che chung

shes// sems la dmigs par byas pa yis// snang ba gsum po gtan la 'bebs// rlung gi de nyid bsten pa yis// 'khor 'das bya ba byed pa shes// rdo rje bzlas pa bshad pa yis// gsang sngags 'bru gsum don du 'dus// mngon par byang chub rim pa yis// sgrib bral dgongs pa mya ngan 'das// 'od gsal zung du 'jug pa yis// rdo rje dbang du yang sangs rgyas// pho yi bsgrub pas bskol ba ni// zhe sdang can la srog mthus bsgrub// gnod sbyin zan la phabs pa yis// nga rgyal can la thog ser bsgrub// mo yi bsgrub pa byas pa yis// 'dod chags can la dbang du sdud// gdug pa gsum po mngags pa yis// phrag dog can la bsrung zhing bzlog/ klu gnyan sa bdag gzer ba yis// gti mug can la klu gtad bsgrub// man ngag ma lus gsang ba rnams// 'dis 'dus dbang chen gsang ba'i rgyud// bstan pa dar bar spyod 'gyur ba// lha dang mkha' 'gro'i thugs kyis zung// zhes phyogs bcur sgra sgrags pas// kun gyis rang rang gi skad du go nas bde ba chen po chos kyi sku la thim mo// dbang chen dregs pa gsang ba las// yongs su bsdus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o//// rgyud 'di u rgyan slob dpon pad+mas bsgyur nas// rgyal po la gtad de sbas pa 'dis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/ dbang chen thugs kyi rgyud dregs pa gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// sa ma la/ rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ba shang ma hA na rag+hi ra ta ne staM pa na n+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thob pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon tan dang/ 'phrin las ma lus pa'i pad+ma chen po de ni// 'di ltar dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa chen mo'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnam par dag pa'i pho brang na snyoms par bzhugs pa las// 'khor 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon bar 'dod nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ dbu lnga phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyi lta// dbu skra smin ma spyan dang sma ra ljags// shangs dang zhal dang mche ba rab tu gtsigs// rta mgo ljang zhur rngog ma le'u rgan 'bar// rigs lnga'i rgyal ba dbu rgyan rang byung sku// shar du rol ba'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba bsnams// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// lho ru rol pa'iphyag bzhi ni// thod rlon khrag gis bkang dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con dang ni rde'u chung 'dzin

pas rol// nub tu rol ba'i phyag bzhi ni// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM kha ni rab tu 'khrol// byang du rol ba'i phyag bzhi ni// rdo rdo rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ rdo rje lta bu'i gshog pas nam 'phang gcod// rin chen spyod pa'i gshog pas dam sbyin gtong// thugs la ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs// de yi sku la gzi ldan pad+ma 'khril// dpa' rtags stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyan// rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyan te// rdo rje chol bas lho phyogs zhabs kyang brgyan// bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkyang pa brgyan// gcan gzan gzig gis byang shar rkyang pa brgyan// shun ken dar gyis byang phyogs zhabs la brgyan// mchi ba dmar pos nub byang rkyang pa brgyan// sbrul nag khyil bas 'og phyogs 'dul ba brgyan// khro brgyad nyid kyi gdan du bting nas mnan// sa bcu'i zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs la gnas// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis yongs la khyab// de lta bu'i sku mngon par shar nas 'khor rnams la yongs su gzigs te// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs// 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la sprul pa'i sku skyed// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can ma lus pa rnams zil gyis mnan// theg pa rim pa dgu'i lta dgongs sam 'dres pa phye nas// nyid kyi sku las gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phyung ngo// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsa na d+ha sarba dush+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M phaT// ces brjod pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis mnan par gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// shar du gzugs pa'i dbu nang du// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// mi skyod mthing ka rdo rje 'dzin// sa gnon phyag rgya g.yas pa na// g.yon pa mnyam par rab tu bzhag/ yum chen dbyings phyug ma dang 'khril// hU~M badzra d+h+rig/ muM da tu shwa ri/ sems can khams rnams ma lus la// bum pa'i dbang ni bskur ba yis// bag chags ma lus dag byas nas// me long ye shes chen po yis// rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang// nam mkha' 'dzin pa rnam par dag/ lho ru gzigs pa'i dbu nang du// rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang// rin 'byung ser po rin chen 'dzin// sbyin gtong phyag rgya g.yas pa

na// g.yon pa mnyam gzhag skyil mo krung// yum chen ma ma ki dang 'khril// swa ra da na d+h+rig/ maM mo ha ra ti/ 'jig rten gang zag sems can la/ cod pan dbang ni bskur ba yis// bdud kyi 'jigs pa sel byed cing// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// tshor ba'i phung por 'dzin pa dang// 'byung ba chu yi zhen pa dag/ nub tu gzigs pa'i dbu nang na// pad+ma rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang// snang ba mtha' yas le brgan sku// phyag gnyis mnyam par gzhag par gnas// zhabs ni rdo rje skyil mo krung// yum chen gos dkar mo dang 'khril// aM a ro lig/ pyaM ra ga ra ti+e/ khams gsum sems can ma lus la// rdo rje 'bar bar dbang bskur bas// 'chi bdag bdud bcom rdo rje'i sku// 'du shes phung por 'dzin pa dang// 'byung ba me yi snang ba dag/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rdzogs// byang du zhal gzigs dbu nang du// rdo rje rgya gram gzhal yas khang// don grub ljang khu ral gri 'dzin// g.yon pa mnyam par bzhag par gnas// skyabs sbyin phyag rgya g.yas pa na// yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma 'khril// ha prad nya d+h+rig/ taM badzra ra ti/ 'gro ba sems can ma lus pa// dril bu'i sgra yis dbang bskur nas// don rnams 'grub par lung ston cing// 'du byed phur bor snang ba dang// 'byung ba rlung du 'dzin pa dag/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rdzogs// dbus ma'i zhal gyi dbu nang du// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// rnam par snang mdzad du nga ltar dkar// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// mdzub mo'i rtse la 'khor lo 'bar// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan dpa' khril// oM dzi na dzig/ la dwe sha ra ti// sems can dkyil 'khor bzhugs rnams na// gsang ba'i mtshan rtags dbang bskul bas// srid pa bar dor gnas pa kun// gsang ba ming nas bos 'gyur nas// gzugs phung 'byung ba sa dag nas// chos dbyings ye shes ngang du gshegs// rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang// rin 'byung snang ba mtha' yas dang// don yod grub pa zhes bya ba'i// rigs lngar rtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// dbang lnga 'dod la dbang bskur zhing// dngos grub 'dod la dngos grub ster// 'dod dang thar pa rab tu sgrub// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir 'dus so// sangs rgyas spyan dang dbyings phyug ma// ma ma ki dang na bza' dka'// dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya bas// dbang bskur gsang ba'i byang chub sems// gsang ba'i dbang dang rab ldan zhing// de bzhin shes rab ye shes dang// bde chen dbang yang yum las byung// rmad pa mi gsang khu ba'i dbang// rmad byung yum dbang sus thob pa// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM

bod+ha ce ta mahA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu a// oM bai ro tsa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ hU~M badzra sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M// swa ra da na saM b+ha ba a b+hi Shi na tsa swa/ aM a mi de ba a b+hi Shi na tsa aM/ ha a mo g+ha si d+h+wi ab+hi shin tsa ha/ bum pa ye shes chu rgyun gyis// rnam rtog dri ma dag par byed// thabs dang shes rab cod pan gyis// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'chi bdag bdud kyi grong khyer 'joms// dril bu chos kyis sgra sgrags pas// mya ngan 'das par lung yang ston// gsang ba ming gi dbang bskur bas// srid pa bar dor grol bar byed// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// dbu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// dbu gtsug rtag par rta mgo ljang khu lnga// dpral ba zhur po zhi ba'i las su bstan// phrum phrum ser pos rgyas pa'i bya ba 'grub// rngog ma le'u rgan thams cad dbang du sdud// rta gdong ljang khu drag po 'grub bar byed// rta skad dgu yis theg pa rim dgu la// dbang gi rnal 'byor sgrub pa byed pa yis// brda skad thal mo lan gsum drag tu brdabs// rab kyi rgyal ba'i sku dang mnyam par byed// 'bring gis thugs dam gnad nas bskul ba dang// tha mal rtags tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin// dpal gyis rta skad hrid+ha hrid+ha phe phe sgras// dang po chos kyi sku las mnal ba sad// bar du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru bzhengs// tha ma gang 'dul zhi khro sprul par ston// ma mo'i brda skad dang por brda yang sprod// bar du klong brtol mkha' las sprin bzhin 'dus// tha mar las la bkye nas dgra bgegs 'dul// rta mgrin dmar po rab 'jigs dbang gi lha// gri gug thod pa bsnams pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs// srin po 'dul ba'i mthu chen dur khrod brgyan// zhal nas gsang ba'i sngags ni rab tu sgrogs// oM pad+ma ta krid hi ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag dong zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas dbugs dkyi rgyu ba 'di zhal nas gsang ba'i sngags ni rab tu sgrogs// oM pad+ma ta krid hri ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas dbugs kyi rgyu ba 'di dag gsungs so// srog dang gyen rgyu thur ser dang// khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga yi rlung// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid do// rgyu ba rab tu rgyu ba'i rlung// yang dag rgyu dang rnam par rgyu// nges par rgyu ba yan lag lnga// phung po lnga dang dbang po lnga// skyed cing de la dbang bas na// rgyas pa'i rtsa dang rnam par rgyas// myos dang ltung dang

mdza' bo la// rtsa ba lnga ni yang dag gnas// srog shing dbang po myos pa dang// za byed kun tu rgyu ba zhes// de dag gnas na spyod pa'o// zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni// bsnyen bkur bskong bshal mtshon byed pa// yan lag lnga po rtsa der gnas// klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang// lha sbyin dang ni zhu las rgyal// de dag de na gnas te rgyu// g.yas na rgyu ba me yi rlung// kha dog dmar la gdangs pa dang// g.yon nas 'byung ba rlung gi rlung// kha dog ljang ser dag tu snang// gnyis ka nas ni byung ba'i rlung// kha dor ser por snang ba la// dal zhing rgyu ba chu yi rlung// dkar por snang ba 'od dang ldan// khams kun 'byung ba srog 'dzin rlung// gang tshe 'pho na 'chi khar 'byung// de dag lha sku sngags su spro// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i srog rtsol kun// yang dag don du shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// rtag pa rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dur khrod 'phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// khro snying dkar mo zhes bya ste// kha ro seng ge'i mgo can la// lcags kyu bos mos gnas pa dang// sbrul zhags bya rgod mgo can shar// thod rlon rkun mor gnas pa la// lu gu rgyud ni stag gi mgo/ be con gtum mo zhes bya ste// rnge'u chung kang ka'i mgo can lho// me yi zhags pa smong mo la// khyung gi khra ni bya rog gdong// sdigs mdzub me ni ma tshogs ma// kha ta wa yi mgo can nub// rdo rje rtse dgu thal byed ma// rdo rje rtse lnga sbyang khu'i mgo/ rdo rje rtse gsum sme sha can// rdo rje rtse gcig 'ug gdong byang// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dag dang// tshan d+ho nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha/ gang na gnas pa'i ma mo dang// mkha' 'gro lha mo la sogs pa// phyag gi sprul par shar ba yin// bcu drug phyag mtshan 'di dag yang// gzhal yas khang du gnas pa'i nang// ma mo bcu drug gnas pa yis// 'jig rten rnams la dbang sgyur bas// phyag mtshan nang du sbas nas ni// sgrub pa'i las lam ma byas na// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' 'gro ma rnams las la mngag pa'i sngags 'di dag gsungs so// oM AHhU~M ha he phaT// hU~M ni ri ma tsi ta tsi ta// tsa ro ma rdul phran rdul phran// keng keng rag ta rag ta// ma ri sha snying la shad shad// tsin dam khrag la keng keng// hU~M tri sha rbad rbad/ dza hU~M baM ho/ dbugs la 'ub 'ub// a hU~M he// ma b+h+yo dza/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo dza/ ha ha ru lu lu hU~M phaT// che ge mo ma ra ya dza dza/ gru gsum mthing

nag thod pa'i nang// zhing ras ling gar thun gyis brab// phyag rgya bzhi bcings nyungs kar brdeg/ bcu drug ma mos gsad par bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// phyag rgya 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod brgyad kyi ma mo bcu drug bsgrub pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshog pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// rdo rje lta bu'i gshog pa ni// rtog pa'i 'phang yang gcod par byed// khro las sku grub gser gyi mdog/ zas su rgya mtsho'i grong khyer za// gnod par byed pa rdo rjes brdung// nad pa'i nad ro smra shad byab// gdug tsub zhen chags me la sreg/ sa bdag klu gnyan zhen chags sbyong// oM badzra pa ti ga ru Ta// kaM ya dz+wa la pa// na ga ru pa ya/ ma hA rwa dza krod+ha/ b+hai ra bA ya/ badzra du na te dza li ta// nA ga sarba/ a gad ta yA/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ nA ga pa ya/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ kra ma sa ra sa ra/ ud tsa ta ya phaT// nA ga s+pho ta ya/ d+hI/ 'khA da khA da// nA ga sarba duSh+tan ka ri dzi ban d+ha ra// d+ha ma ka/ nA ga bi de ra yA/ ti ling g+ha le/ nag b+hasming ku ru hU~M phaT/ dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bru sna dang// chang zan shing tog la sogs pa'i// gtor mas mnyes par rab tu bya// rin chen gser gyi khyung chen yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin chen gshog pas klu rnams thams cad 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor skal bzang la// bar du gcod pa bsrung mdzad pa// rang nyid yi dam lha ru gnas// gcod byed rang la bskor ba las// bdag gis khrom zhes rab bsgrags pas// d+ha las nam mkhar khyung du grub// pho mo pad+ma ra ga'i mdangs// 'thab 'dzing 'dzum shing skor bar byed// gnod byed dpag tshad brgyar rdengs nas// phyin chad gnas 'dir 'khor mi srid// oM ga ru Datsa le tsa le pa tsi ru g+ha/ nyin mo'i sngags so// oM ga ru Da tsa le tsa le pa tsi ru d+ha/ mtshan mo'i sngags so// sa nag tsa tri du mi hur thums dza/ thun sngags so// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gnyis yang// nyi ma zla bas rab tu brgyan// lta ba'i 'degs gshog rdo rjes brgyan// spyod pa'i 'dzum gshog rin chen spras// a mo de ba sder mo can// drab mo dang glog 'gyur can// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// 'di dag gshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas// badzra ang ku sha dza rad na pA sha hU~M/ sbar s+phe ta baM/ karma g+han+Do ho// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa zil mnon pad+ma dbang chen gyi rgyud las// gshegs pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bya khyung klu 'dul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung mchog sku// pad+ma dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ skye med ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dmar// phyag na rin chen za ma tog/ yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// g.yas dang g.yon na rnam par 'dzin// pad+ma dmar po kha phye ba'i// snying por sa bon yang dag 'khrungs// 'dab ma gsang sngags 'phreng ba yis// ril por 'dzin nam rjes su zhigs// yang na bskyed rim thams cad la// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gsal// oM dz+nyA na satwa hU~M/ oM ra dza tri dza b+ha ga ba ti pa ra ma si ho// pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nya bar da ni bad tre na ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha b+har d+ha ni pa khyed b+hi ri bud+ha pa ra d+ha ni ha ri ni sa hi/ zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyi ngang nas g.yo byed rnam par rgyud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas 'di gsungs so// srog 'dzin rgyas nas mi 'bral 'dzin// snying 'dod kha shugs gsal stong bkye// smyo rlung srog shing ko ta k+Sha// la dor byin rlabs bde bsgom// me mnyam mdza' bo lte snyings 'jug/ pho sogs bde stong thung ba skye// dmu chu za byed ko ta ba// k+Sha zhes rnam pagasum du bya// thur sel smyos dang gsang bar sel// 'og nad skye dang bde stong ring// phol dang zha khum myos pa dang// ko ta ba te rnam gsum bya// gyen rgyu rnam rgyas mgrin smra rgod// mgrin srang gsal stong 'bras kug dbang// ka ta gyen gyis sgra yin te// dor byin bde ba yang dag dgod// khyab byed ltung dang chu gnyis las// khol bde gsal dngas kun rgyu zhing// ku ti rag bya ba de// der sbyin bde ba byed pa'o// rgyu ba zla cha dmigs gzugs ri// na zhing gzugs nyid lhong ba dang// klu dang ko ta shu zhes pas// la de byin dang ldan pa bya// shin tu rgyu ba snar gnas dril// yul nyid rig na dri mi tshor// rus sbal ko la pa ko la// gsum gyi de nyid rab tu bya// rgyu byed rna ba sgra gsum rig/ de zha mi gnod ting 'dzin ho na// rtsangs pa kol pa yin te// bcos pa rnams ni kun tu rig/ sngon rgyu bsnyen bkur ces re rig/ smra ka ro nyid rogs bkug pas// lha sbyin ko la ba shu d+ha// bcos pa kun rigs gsum po yin// nges par kongs bags reg bya rig/ ber langs yags ring ye shes yul// gzhu rgyal ko la ta tha zhes// yo ga gsum po bya ba yin// byung rgyal drod kyi la dor ba// de nyid rtsa de gnas su dor// g.yo byed la ni rngan gdags sbyin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// mdo rgyud snang ba rten 'brel brlabs// steng du longs spyod brlabs rten de// 'og du gsang ba snyoms par 'jug/ chu sogs kun la rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnad du
