che// ming gnas rtsa dang las zug dang// ting 'dzin rengs bcos brda sgra rnams// du ba la sogs zin 'gyur nas// kun gyis sangs rgyas sa thob ste// dbang chen zhes kyang de la bya// 'di las gzhan gyis dgongs pa med// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// ye shes sems dpa' mkhyen rigs gsal ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi ldan pad+mo yum sku la 'khrul bar sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bzhugs nas sangs rgyas thams cad gyes par byed pa 'di gsungs so// thugs kyi ting 'dzin dgongs pa rab gsal ba'i// gzi ldan pad+mo sems dpa'i sku la 'khril// dmar gsal 'khor lo rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba chen po'i rtags su mnyam par sbyor// yab yum bde bsgom pa'i sbyor ba can// rlung gis gzhu gdungs me yi mda' 'phangs pas// bar snang lha bran zhu ba'i khu ba thigs// yum gyi kong bur dmar me 'od du gsal// mi yi bu mo dung can ban glang can// ri dgas ma dang rus sbal mo la sbyor// 'dod pa mnyam pa dang sgom pa byin brlabs mnyam// bsnyen pa rigs ma gzugs sgra brtag par bya// nye ba snyen zangs kyi mdog gis bzung sogs te// bsgrub pa pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje bsgom// bsgrub chen sgrub de b+ha gar rdo rje yis// 'o ma 'thung ba'i don la bsgom par bya// rdo rje rtse nas gyen du drang ba ni// srid pa gsum gyi lam nas gnas su 'dren// lte ba'i gnas su 'grongs na rgya bor 'dra// snying khar ser ge'i khog pa lta bur rgyas// lce yis zhal gyi gdong yang rab tu khebs// smin mtshams mdzod spu spyi gtsug dung ltar 'khril// byang sems dkar dmar mthar phyin bsgrub pa po// zab mo tshe yi dngos grub thob pa'i tshe// rang gi gnas rnams rang zhal rang gis mthong// gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur pa'i dus zhes bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po 'di dag sems can la phan pa'i don du gsungs so// oM ka te bi ka te ni ke te ka tang ka te swAhA// oM sarba sa ka ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri ba re swAhA/ oM pad+ma A yu She hri/ A yudz+nyA na tshe bruM swahA// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// gsang ba gzi ldan pad+ma tshe gnas gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum sangs rgyas ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs pa dang// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas la sogs ji snyed pa// kun kyang sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'dus// 'di las ma gtogs

gzhan na grub pa med// oM ni sangs rgyas sku yi gnas// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi sgra// ji snyed skad du chos yang ston// hU~M ni sangs rgyas thugs kyi 'jings// sems dang ye shes kun 'byung gnas// sku ni phyag rgya chen por gnas// mdzad pa'i phyag rgya sprul pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod sku// gnas pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// gsung gi las dang dam tshig rgya// sngon gyi dam tshig dbang gis na// chos kyi don la mi 'da' bar// las dang dam tshig rab sbyin byed// thugs ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ma lus 'dus pa'i byang sems thugs// thams cad 'byung 'jug gnas par bshad// oM zhes bya ba sku yin te// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gnas// AH zhes bya ba gsung yin te// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo sgrogs// hU~M ni thugs kyi gsang sngags te// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo thim// sku gsung thugs kyi mi ge gsum// ji snyed chos kyi bzlas pa ste// rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes kyang bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po 'bru gsum zhes bya ste// 'di don gang gis bsgrub pa de'i// nyams ni sems las 'char bar byed// gar ni lus la 'gyur ba yin// sngags kyang dag tu 'byung ba ste// mthong snang yul la 'char ba dang// bag chags rmi lam dag tu rmi// gsang sngags 'di la kun rtag bzlas// las rnams ma lus 'dis 'grub pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas gsang sngags yin// rgyal po lta bur che ba yin// nyi zla bzhin du gsal ba yin/ chu bo lta bur khru mdzad cing// sa ltar gnas shing 'degs par byed// me bzhin rnam rtog bag chags sreg/ rlung bzhin bgegs dang rnam rtog 'thor// nam mkha' lta bur kun la khyab// yid bzhin rin chen lta bur gnas// rgya mtsho bzhin du rab tu che// rang sems rig pa chos kyi sku// snang ba chos sku'i 'od gsal yin// nyi ma dang ni 'od bzhin khyab// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// rigs drug 'khor ba'i gnas lugs rtogs// gang gi rig pa mya ngan 'das// oM da ha da ha sarba na rag ga te he tu hU~M phaT// oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga te he tu hU~M phaT// oM ma tha ma tha sarba ting ya ga ting ya ga te he tu hU~M phaT// oM nri bi shwa mu la ts+tshi na dats+tshi na da hU~M phaT// oM sarba du rga sarba ga me sarba kle she he tu hAM phaT// oM pa ra bid+ha kha da ga te ba sarba tshin d+ha tshin d+ha he tu hU~M phaT// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis rigs drug ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs khro bo rol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// zhabs kyi chas brgyad sgeg po yis// 'das pa'i khro bo brgyad mnan pas// ye shes nyid la nyid rol pas// phyogs skyong rgyal chen rang sar bcom// bdud bzhi zhabs kyi ngang gis brdzis// zil gyis mnan bas khyad par 'phags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad las// khyad par 'gyur bas che ba yin// dpa' bo stag chas hU~M chen bcom// bya bye'u lcags kyis mi g.yo ba// rdo rje chol pas gshin rje gshed// bse khrag smug po dbyug sngon can// sbrul nag pad+ma 'khyil ba ste// mche ba 'dod pa'i rgyal po la// shu ken dar gyi bdud rtsi 'khyil// gcan gzan gzig gis stobs chen mnan// sa stobs dbang chen sbas pa sa rol// zhabs kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan// bsrung bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gro ga la sogs ras la ni// rdo rje rgya gram legs bris pa'i// 'khor lo rdo rje la gnas pa// de yi lte ba zlum po la// ha ni dbus su gzhag nas ni// de la gang srung rus dang ni// ming gi dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// rdo rje rgya gram rwa rnams la// brgyan te legs par gzhag par bya// bskyed nas bstim ste gang btags pa'i// bsrung ba dam par 'di 'gyur ro// gang gi 'di la nan tan bya// oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+ta tiSh+ta/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// gro ga la sogs gzhi ma la// g+hi hang snag tshal rab bri ba// rtsibs brgyad pa yi 'khor lo bya// brgyad la khro bo'i mu khyud spyi// lte ba mi rus brgyan byas nas// rab tu gnas te dpung par gdags// yang na mnan pa bris nas ni// tsha tsha'i nang du gang yin mnan// oM a uSh+Ni Sha/ badzra tsa kra wa ra ti// sarba lo ki bruM bruM druM druM/ lo ki ko ta ra yan tra man tra tan tra// sha tsor rna// pram ga ye na ke// na ma ma tri ta gar ti/ ta na tsa ta na/ sarba lo ki/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da na da ha// pa tsa pa tsa// bi d+hA na sa ya/ sa ta sa ta/ phra ta phra ta/ pi tsur Na pi tsur Na/ oM a u Sha Ni Sha/ badzra tsa kra wa ra ti b+h+ruM// sarba lo ki swAhA// bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM a u Sha nI Sha/ du ru sa du e ka du nak+She du nan/ ba nri ra hU~M/ laM staM g+ha narga/ gnan pa'i sngags so// oM badzra krod+ha hU~M ka ra hU~M/ oM badzra kro ta ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hU~M// oM badzra kro ta nI la dan Da hU~M// oM badzra kro ta pad+ma kun Da li hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ta ki rwa dza hU~M/ oM badzra krod+he a mr-i ta kun Da la hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA pa la hU~M/ khro bo'i sngags so// oM e u Sha Ni Sha ya ya rbad// yan tra tsin+t+ra rbad// man tra ya tsa ma rbad// bsad pa'i sngags so// oM a us NI sha pa tsa phi to sa

sho shA ya/ mo ha ya/ staM b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ ser ba bsrung ba'o// oM a us NI sha// nA ga ri raM bi bo ha ma/ tsin ta tsin ta/ nA ga nag tha hA/ klu gnyen bdag bsrung ba'o// eM a uSh+Ni sha/ sarba tsi ta kha tham/ srog gzer rbud nan/ 'drid shu po hri shag rbad/ bgegs spyir bsrung ba'o// oM a us NI Sha/ ya ma ra tsa b+h+yo bzlog rbad// ki li ki li ye b+h+yo bzlog rbad/ oM ma ma he kaM phraM bzlog b+h+yo rbad// 'khor lo byas pa bshig pa'i sngags so// bsrung dang gsad dang bzlog pa dang// bshig pa'i las su bstan pa rnams// rdzas dang ting 'dzin sngags ldan pas// gang gis 'di don sbyor byed pa// pad+ma dbang gi zhabs kyi mthus// gdug byed kun las rnam par rgyal// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen drags pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// zhabs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gdug pa can gzir mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor dgu'i sgrub thabs 'di dag gsungs so// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi pa rab tu brgyad// dbus kyi pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// rin chen khri rkang zur bzhir gnas// de dbus dbang gi sku yang bri// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni// thig bzhi btab pas le rtse dgu/ rigs lnga yab yum sku bkod nas// sgo dang rta babs yang dag ldan// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum ma trang lto bar bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba gru gsum nang// thod pa zhing ras ling gar bcas// khams gsum rnam rgyal sbyin sreg thabs// rma shad lcag ma rdo rjes bsdu// ye shes sems dpa' rin chen dbus/ tshe yi bum pa bzhag par bya// gzi ldan maN+Dal bum pa'i steng// mtshan ldan thod par byang chub sems// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa// zla ba pad+ma nyi zlar bcas// zhabs kyi khro rgyal 'khor lo ni// maN+Dal steng du rab bkod nas// rab tu gnas pa byas nas ni// gang bsrung de la gdags par bya// zhes sungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// 'khor gyis yongs su mnyes bar bya ba'i phyir bsgrub pa'i don 'di gsol to// gar dbang bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang nyid las// srid gsum thugs rjes spyod pa'i khyad par gyis// ye shes ngang nas rol cing gshegs shu gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan/ pad+ma he ru ka sa ma ya/ ma nu smra ra ti sba sa ma ya// ma nu smra ra dza hU~M baM ho// ye nas dbyer med mnyam nyid don la gnas// mi rtog thabs kyi khyadapar cir yang ston// gsal dang gsol ba'i mdzad pa mi gny-is kyang// ji srid gsol 'debs de srid brtan par bzhugs// kA

ya wAka tsit+ta sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ thabs kyi bye brag mang po'i khyed par las// dbang chen pad+ma gar dbang he ru ka/ ye shes sgyu ma'i sku ni dbyings nas gsal// a li ka li'i sgra dbyangs thabs shes ston/ dmigs med thugs ni don dam ngang nas 'char// tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// a ti pu ho// pra ti dza ho// a la la ho/ che mchog mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dur khrod nas// ngag gi dbang phyug dpal chen pad+ma'i sku// thugs dam thabs kyi bdud dpung 'joms mdzad pa// dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka/ rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes pa mchod 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs dbang dang dngos grub gsol// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// gzi ldan chen mo dpal gyi yum mchog dang// ye shes chen po lnga ni mthar phyin cing// 'bras bu chen po sgrub pa'i lha lnga ni// dbu la sbas pa'i rigs lnga sangs rgyas dang// chos rnams thams cad ma lus sgra sgrogs shing// 'gro ba ma lus kha lo gyen du sgyur// ljags la sbas pa'i ngag gi dbang phyug dang// so so'i rigs las kha dog cir yang snang// gdan khri rin chen khri la sbas pa yi// rigs bzhi he ru khro rgyal bzhi rnams dang// yum gyi dbang gis dga' ba bskyed mdzad ma// chags pa'i tshul gyis sku la rab tu 'khril// gdan la sbas pa'i yum chen bzhi rnams dang// sprul pa'i tshul gyis klu rgyal 'dul mdzad pa/ gshegs par rbas pas ma gzhi sangs rgyas dang// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i sku// phyag mtshan mchon char sbas pa'i ma mo bcu drug dang// mi mdzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo mnga' mdzad par// sku gsung thugs la sbas pa'i sangs rgyas dang// gdan la sbas nas 'khor du bstan pa yi// dom dam gsang sbas sing nga 'jam pa la// dbang phyug chen mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i pho nya mo// yon tan 'phrin las gnyis med sgyu 'phrul sbas// sprul pa'i kham rgya che na mo bcu drug rnams// 'khor ba ma stong srid pa ma zad bar// thugs rje'i thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad pa'i phyir// nyin dang mtshan du dgongs pa ma g.yel ba'i// sbas pa'i long pa rgyab 'brel brgyad rnams dang// thugs rje'i smin mdzad nyin dang mtshan mi nyal// skyo dub med par 'gro don lhun rdzogs mdzad// sbas pa'i dmun long 'khor ba drug cu dang// mthu rtsal ldan pas sprul pa kun gyi gtso// nga ro dbyangs snyan ma mo kun gyi bla// za byed dpal gyi ma mo khyi brgyad dang// zhabs las sprul pa'i lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// sbrul pa'i pho nya gar yang thogs pa med// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcur sbas pa dag/ tshad med bzhi yis 'gro ba'i

don mdzad pa'i// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i rnam thar sgo bsrung ba// dbu dgu rkang gcig la sogs sgo ba dang// chos nyid sgra sgrogs dbyar dgun du bzhir 'byed// stong par sbas pa'i me 'brug rlung 'brug rnams// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rjes cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kha raM kha hi/ zhes pa bcu pa'i rtog pa can rnams kyis kyang mnyes pa'i mchod pas mchod do// de nas yang so so nas dngos grub zhu ba 'dis gsol ba btab bo// skye med sku yi rang bzhin rdo rje nyid// 'gags med kun tu grags pa rdo rje'i gsung// mi rtog stong par snang ba rdo rje'i thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par shog/ ka ya sid+hi oM// bAg sid+hi A// tsit+ta sid+ha hU~M/ zhes gsol ba btab pas// bdud rtsi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis theg pa dman pa'i lta ba dag nas// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob pa'i skal ldan du dus der gyur to// de nas rgyud las sbyangs ba'i zhal mthong ba rnams kyis// nyid kyi sku la drin lan du mchod pa 'di phul lo// don dam skye 'gags med pa'i ngo bo las// thabs kyi rol pa'i cho 'phrul ci yang ston// bdag rtog 'dzin pa'i mun pa bsal ba'i phyir// dug snga sman du sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi dang/ dug gsum sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang// khams gsum dbang sdud pad+ma rag ta 'di// pad+ma dbang chen 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// thugs rjes dgongs la dgyes mdzod dngos grub gsol// ma hA rak+ta kha hi/ ma hA b+ha ling ta kha hi/ ma ha pany+tsa kha hi/ zhes lnga srin rnams kyis rang gi dam tshig gis mchod do// de nas yang phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis yongs su bstod do// chos dbyings rnam dag lhun grub zhing khams nas// bcom ldan dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ ye shes sgyu ma'i gzugs su 'jigs par ston// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rngam chen hU~M sgras drag po gdug pa 'joms// cir yang sprul pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// skye med mkhyen pa'i thugs kyis ma bsgribs gsal// rnam dag chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes stod do// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gsungs pa la/ 'khor rnams kyis der byon cing bzhugs par zhus nas mchod bstod kyi dbyangs kyis bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bde ba gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po gang gi dbang phyug gis 'di skad gsungs so// dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// rigs ldan sngags pas rab bsgom pa// stong pa nyid las snying rjer ldan// de las byung ba'i yi ge hri// gzhal

yas zla gam dmar po'i nang// sgo gcig nub tu rnal 'byor gnas// de ni 'byung lnga'i steng du bsgom// gdan stengs hri las gyur pa ni// zhal gsum dkar dmar sngo ba la// rta mgo 'phrin las bzhi dang ldan// de yi phyag rgya drug pa ste// rdo rje kha T+wAMsbrul zhigs g.yas// dril bu ban d+ha lcags sgrog g.yon// ral gcig ma ni sku la 'khril// gsang ba'i ma mo bzhi yis bskor// byi la phu shud pho nyar 'gyed// gsal nas gsang ba'i drag sngags 'di// nang gi bzlas pa byed pa des// dregs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// mchog dang mthun mong ma lus 'grub// hri sbar ta krid d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hri ha ya gri ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu hU~M hri dza dza// des na 'jig rten ma lus pa// gal te dbang du byed 'dod na// bdun 'bum sngags la 'bad nas bsnyen// sum 'bum grangs kyis 'grub yod// sbyin sreg me thab rab rtsegs nas// sha khrag la sogs mchod pa 'bul// gang la dmigs pa rab sreg na// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa grub// oM pad+ma ta kri da ha ni sa shA na ting ku ru ye swA hA// oM pad+mata krid ha ri ni sa puSh+ti ru ye swa hA/ oM pad+ma ta krid ha ri ni sa pa shaM ku ru ye swa hA/ oMpad+ma ta krid ha ri ni sa ha ma ra ma phaT phaT/ shar na mar mo dkar mo gnas// lho na ser la nub la dmar// byang na ljang khu'i ma mo bzhin// spyi gtsug phag gdong kha gdangs ma// kun kyang gri khug thod pa 'dzin// oM badzra bA rA hi hU~M/ oM ra da na bA rA hi trAM// oM pad+ma bA rA hi AH oM karma bA ra hi ha/ zhes gsungs so// dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// dpal rta'i rgyal po dregs pa zil gnon gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan dam pa des// dregs pa thams cad gnad la zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// gang dag ma rungs pa thams cad gnad nas gzir ba'i srog mthu 'di gsungs so// bla ma'i sku la bsdos pa dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas na// bsgrub pa 'di ni rab tu bya// gsang rten gsang bar bca' ba ni// dkyil 'khor 'og tu thod pa'i nang// gri snying sngags bcug dar nag bcas// de'i stengs par khang lug snying du// rtsa dbus gur gum a mri ta// g.yas pa ming rus ling ga bris// g.yon du srog snying rnam pa gsum// de'i stengs dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhir mchod rten re re bzhag/ dbus su hri bris tham sngags// phyi rten thang skur rab tu gnas// nang rten lug nag g.yang gzhi la// mi snying lug snying brgyan par bya// phyi yi dam rdzas dkar gsum mngar// nang gi la dul phug dang// 'bru chang nya sha btsong la sogs// gsang ba'i gtor ma sha khrag dbul// phyi bsgrub thun dang dang zor gyis bsad// nang

bsgrub thod pa ga'u'i nang// sngags bris par bur bskor bar bya'o// gsang bsgrub gru bzhi lto ba la// srog sngags bla rdo bcas nas ni// sril byed phyag chas gzir bar bya// phyi bsgrub bod rbad bsad pa gsum// nang bsgrub gcig tu dril la bzlas// bsad rbad bod pa dkrugs pa'o// gsung bsgrub srog sngags bzlog pa nyid// phyi skongs mdos kyis bskang bar bya// nang gi gtor ma bdud rtsi la// gsang ba tshogs kyis skang bar bya// phyi rtags btsan po mi chen sogs// nang rtags mon dang a tsa ra// gsang ba las byed gsod byed 'byung// bsnyen dus zla gcig ra ba bzhi// bsgrub pa zla gcig 'breng po bzhi// bsad pa bzla gcig tha chung bzhi// 'bod dang rbad dang bsad par bya// phyi rtags chas gos nag por bya// nang rtags khyi nag lug nag rten// gsang ba thod pa sku gzugs snying// oM shrI mahA kA la ga na me ti go la dza hU~M baM ho// 'bod pa de'i phyi sngags so// oM ma hA kA la rag+sha du be ni dza/ rbad pa grub pa de nang gi sngags so// oM srog go ru ta hU~M b+h+yo rbad// mun nag shi b+h+yo/ mun shi b+h+yo// thum ril li li ma ra ya rbad// gsang ba bsad pa'i sngags so// b+ha ling rag ta kha hi kha hi// 'bod rbad bsad dus su gtor ma 'bul lo// phyi bskul rgyal po bzhi nas bskul// nang rim dam can bsrung mar bskul// gsang ba 'phrin las mdzad par bskul// hU~M/ nyi ma byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa'i tshe// rlung nag dgu klong 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// chibs su dre'u rta rkang gsum chibs// 'khor du ma mo nag mo 'bum gyis bskor// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// lcags kyi ral pa bse gdong can// bse yi sre mo g.yu smin can// gser mgo lcags kyi smra ra can// dung gi mche ba le'u brgan ljags// g.yas na tsan dan be tson dang// lcags kyi bar shad rnon po bsnams// g.yon na dar nag lcags sgrog bsnams// phyi yi chos 'khor skyong ba'o tshe// yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// spyan mig bzang dang rnam thos sras// rgyal chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// nang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i tshul// bdud btsan rgyal po snang yang 'dren// gsang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad tsam na// bdud dang ma mo rgyal btsan kun// bsdus shing sdongs nas bstan pa bsrung// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// pho zhe sdang gi bdag nyid srog tu sgrub pa las// mgon po bse gdong bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa gnas nas gzir ba'i srog mthu 'di gsungs so// dang por/ bsnyen pa thems pa yis// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// bu chung pags pa'i

glud bu la// pho mo'i 'khor lo gnyis bris nas// pho ni gri gug thod pa 'dzin// mo ni me long sbrul zhags thogs// rang rang 'khor lo lte bar gnas// 'khor lo drug la ming sring drug/ sngon po lag pa sbrel bar bri// 'khor ni bcu bdun dmar po ni// lag sbrel 'khor lo bcu bdun bri// kha sbyar bar du dgra gzugs ni// phyedapa thon tsam byas nas ni// shing dam rdza sa'i ga 'u ni// dmar po kha sbyor nang du gzhug/ steng du lcags kyu dmar po gzugs// maN+Dal zlum po steng du bzhag/ phag rgod sha yi gtor ma yang// de yi mdun du bzhag par bya// de mtha' dmar po'i gzugs kyis bskor// 'brang rgyas phyed dkar phyed nag gis// de yi mtha' ma bskor bar bya// phyi rim sna tshogs sha yis bskor// de rnams dar dmar gur gyis dbub// sngags ni bri dang bzlas pa ste// zhag gsum dag nas cho 'phrul yod// lnga yi nub mo kho rang yong// de yi gsang sngags bshad kyis nyon// kA la rA tri ye che ge mo ma ra ya phaT// pho'i gzugs kyi snying khar bri'o// ma hA ra kA la rA tri ye che ge mo ma ra ya phaT// mo'i gzugs kyi snying khar bri'o// hrI dza ma hA kA la/ nr-i ka pa la ye// rA tri ha ti/ ro ha sti ba// dan d+ha ru pa// yaM e dza/ dus mtshan pho dgug pa'o// hri dza ma hA kA li lu ma ra pa tra ma e laM e dza mo// dgug pa'o// ka li trid+ha na chi ka pa la b+ha ling kha hi/ gtor ma dbul ba'o// nag po lus po spu yis gang// spre'u gdong mig ser mche ba rno// so nag sen mo rab tu rno// skye la rus pa'i khol thag can// kha nas bshugs pa'i glu len cing// lag na mi thod khrag bkang 'thung// spyi'u tshugs drag tu 'gro ba ni// gang dmigs gnas su yud kyis phyin// bsgoms nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya// dang po'i nub mo mtshan ma ni// skra med mgo bo ras gtums yong// de la ma 'jigs bzlas pa yis// gnyis pa phag rgod mgo can nga// de la ma 'jigs gsum pa na mi lus 'bag gi mgo can yong// de la ma 'asngigs bzlas pa yis// bzhi par gnas khang 'bag gis 'gengs// mgo bo ras kyis phur nas ni// de dag la gnas thogs pa yang// me long khram sde'u dkar nag dang// dbyug pa ral gri zhags pa dang// bya mgo glud bu lcags kyu dang// mi ro skyel pa jon dmar dang// mtshon gyi gru gu la sogs thogs// ha ha ci za zir nas ni// rang gi lag pa 'then du yong// de la ma 'jid bzlas pa yi// lnga yi nub mo dar cig na// mi nag chen po spyi gtsug 'gro lus po thams cad spu yis gang// ha ha ci bya zer nas yong// phag rgod gtor ma sbyin nas ni// dam la btags nas mi snang 'gyur// de nas lasal sbyar bya ba// gru gsum nag po bcas pa'i nang// ga 'ur bcug la dgra

yis gzugs// me long nang du 'char bar bya// rang lus phag rgod tshil bu dang// thal chen sbyar bas byug par bya// nyin zhag bdun du bzlas par bya// hri dza ma hA ka la// nri ka pa la ye/ rA tri ha sti ro ha stib// d+ha na da tub pa/ yaM e dza che ge mo ma ra ya phaT// nyin mo bzlas so// hri dza ma hA ka li// lu ma rad tra ma e yaM e dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya phaT// mtshan mo bzlas so// gal te 'grub par ma gyur na// sngags bzlog bla rdo gnad la dbab/ pha wang long bu hri bris dang// mchong smug po la dza bris dang// thod lo kor la hri bris nas// 'khor lo nang du dril bras la// nyungs dkar dang nyungs nag gnyis// gu gul chu nas bton la brab// srog sngags mgo mjug bzlog byas nas// dus mtshan gnad la 'bebs par byed// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gy-is gnon pa'i rgyud las// zhe sdang pho'i bsgrub pa las dus mtshan nag mo bsgrub pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa gnad nas gzir ba'i srog sngags 'di gsungs so// shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa// dbus kyang gru gsum thod pa'i nang// dgra yi ling ga bzhag par bya// rtsibs drug dag la phur pa dgod// rten pa bya rgod mda' la ni// dar nag gri snying btags pa dang// gnyug rgod sku dang dar btags rten// sha khrag gtor ma bzang du bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// ma hA kA la zhal gcig pa// g.yas na tsan dan beng chen bsnams// g.yon pa thod khrag rgyu zhags sdog/ rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs nas// bstim ste mchod pa dbul bar bya// oM ma hA kA la gu na hri da hU~M/ bsnyen pa'o// ma ra ni dza/ snying la thu li// lus la rbad pu ni sha ga dza dza// bsgrub pa'o// oM ma hA ka la thuM ling thuM ril rbud bu ni dza/ snying la ya/ trag rag sha la thu ril rbad/ snying rtsa la dza dza/ las sbyor ro// slob dpon dang ni a tsa ra/ dril bu'i sgra dang gnas khang 'tsheg/ 'od dang mi nag bya nag dang/ ling byed sems can gsod pa dang// sha za zhing bcu khrag 'thung ba// las rnams grub pas sbyin sreg bya// thal ba gnan nam rlung la phyar// oM tsan Da ma hA kA la badzra shri ni// i daM b+ha ling grih+na thih+Na ya swAhA/ gtor ma dbul lo// gu h+ya sha truM sa ma ya swAhA/ bsang chu dbul ba'o// rag ta tsi ta sho d+ha swAhA/ rag ta dbul ba'o// ba ling ma hA sha truM swAhA/ gtor ma dbul ba'o// oM ma hA kA la ya/ sar+b+ba sha truM// ru ba da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de na me ke na hU~M phaT// che ge mo'i srog rtsa la ma ra ya kha'i/ sreg rdzas dbul ba'o// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// zhe sdang pho'i bsgrub po las mgon po ka thun

nag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang pho'i bsgrub pas sbyor ba sdud pa 'di gsungs so// rang gi snying khar bsam bya ba// a las zla ba'i dkyil du hU~M// de las rdo rje lte bar hU~M// de yi 'od kyis rang gi lus// sbyangs nas 'od kyi phung por gyur/ dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' lta bu// ngag tu oM aM zhes brjod pas// grub pa'i gnas nas spyan drangs pas// rang lus 'od dang gnyis med 'dres// 'phags pa snod 'dzin mdog nag po// byis pa'i gzugs can sbrul gyis brgyan// g.yas na thod pa khrag gis bkang// g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal ba bsnams// nor 'dzin ser po'i gdan stengs na// stag gi sham thabs brkyang bskum bzhugs// de nas lag par yi ge dgod// g.yas pa'i mthil du oM yig las// bum pa bzang po oM gyis brgyan// bum pa'i rtsi bar dzaM yig la/ mdzub mo b+ha la gung mor la/ srin lag dza la mthe'u chung len// mthe bong rtsa bar dra yig bkod// nor bu 'ching ba'i dbus su yi// g.yon du swA ste g.yas su hA/ de ni yi ge bkod bsams nas// sngags 'di lan bdun brjod pa yis// rang gi kha lag byin gyis brlabs// oM in dra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swAhA/ kha la lag reg lan bdun bzlas// de nas rang gi thugs kha nas// phyung nas bdun gyis snod nang bzhag chu yi rgyun ni mi 'chad par// rang gi lag pa na blug pas// rang gi kha nas byung ba'i chu// rang gi lag pa dag tu babs/ de nas snod 'dzin zhal du sbyin// oM dzaM lum pa ni swAhA/ de nas mchod pa rnam lngas mchod// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// oM dzaM b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA// rang gi srin lag sbom po yis// chu yi nang nas snod 'dzin blangs// rang ngam sku gzugs dag la bstim// chu de nor la sbyin par bya// gtor ma gtsang ma'i sa la btang// chu sbyin bya ba'i dus tshod yang// bdud kyi las byed dus yin pas// srod kyi dus su bya ba min// bdud nor khyi dang bya rog ni// yod pa'i sar ni bya ba min/ chu sbyin chag na bsab bar bya// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs// blo chung rnams la phan gdags phyir// ngas ni khyed la gsal bar bshad// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// 'phags pa snod 'dzin sgrub pa ste pho zhe sdang gi bdag nyid la sa zhi ba nor sgrub pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho zhe sdang gi bdag nyid kyis longs spyod rnams 'phel bar byed pa'i bsgrub pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i gnas ni nags khrod dam// ma mo'i khyim dang nyams dga'i sar 'bad pas bris sku bzhengs nas ni// de yi mdun du maN+Dal dang// gtor ma mchod pa

bsham par bya// la phug zas kyang de la dbul// thog mar gdan la 'dug nas ni// chos rnams stong par gnas pa las// nyi ma'i steng nag dmar gnas// 'od 'phros sems can tshogs dag gyur// 'dus nas yi ge ga la thim// la phug shin tu bzang por gyur// de las tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku// dmar po zhal gcig bcu gnyis phyag/ g.yas pa dgra sta gtun shing dang// mda' gzhu ka T+wAM lcags kyu dang// khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams// g.yon pa rdo rje ral gri zhags// thod pa phub chung rtse gsum dang// 'phang mdung bsnams pas bcu gnyis 'dzin// byi la sngon po'i khri stengs na// rol ba'i stabs kyis yang dag gnas// de nas gsang sngags rab bshad bya// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yin no// oM ga ga/ sid+ha sid+ha/ sarba ar+tha mi pra sA d+ha ye hU~M hU~M dza dza dza swAhA/ tshogs bdag 'gugs pa'i sngags so// oM a ga hU~M hri swAhA/ bzlas pa'i sngags so// oM ag hrig+ha na ba ti ba ra ta ka swAhA hU~M/ bsgrub pa'i sngags so// stong phrag brgya yis grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mchil ma yis// dpral bar thim le rab byas na// bgegs rnams mthong na skrag pa dang// rgyal pos mthong na dga' ba ste// 'gro bas mthong na dbang du 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams rab tu ster// zhe sdang pa dag po chags pa'i gtso// stong khams ma lus dbang du 'gyur// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// pho zhe sdang gi bdag nyid las long spyod bsgrub pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mo chags pa'i bdag nyid las drag por bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rgya gram lam dang dur khrod dang// shing gcig drung ngam khang stong gnas// dus ni zla ba mar ngo yi// nyi shu gsum mam brgyad dgu'i dus// mun sros dag la 'jug par bya// der ni maN+Dal gru bzhi pa// phyogs rer khru gang sor bzhi bya// dur khrod thal ba sol chen dang// ba glang lci ba bsres la byug/ dkyil du lug nag khrag gis ni// gru gsum gnyis brtsegs bri bar bya// gru gsum drug po de dkyil du// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni// bdag nyid lho ru kha ltas nas// nag po'i gdan la gnas byas nas// pad+ma'i dbus su bsam bya ba// ri dmar nyi ma'i gdan steng du// tsa yig dmar po las skyes pa'i// gtum mo dmar mo zhal gcig ma// spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'khyil// so rnon lce ni rnam par 'khyil// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po na// gri gug gnyis par glo ba'i sha// g.yon pa thod pa khrag gis bkang// gnyis pa na ni tri shul bsnams// rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang// phyag gdub zhabs gdub smu regs rgyan/ sbrul gyi do shal tshad skud byas// stag gi pags pa'i

sham thabs mdzes// ro yi steng na gar byed bsgom// mdun du mar me g.yas su sbos// de la gtor ma dbul ba ni// tshul khrims ldan pa'i thod pa ru// sha chen zan dang lug nag khrag/ gtor ma rab tu bzang bar bshams// de nas rang lus bsrung ba ni// dpral bar oM la spyi bor AH/ rgyab tu hU~M la mig gnyis hriH dpung pa gnyis su yi ge ma// snying khar phaT ces bya ba bkod// oM AHhU~M hriHmaM phaT// de nas dang por rang la mchod// lag pa g.yon pas me tog dbul// g.yas pas mar me bdug spos mchod// mchod pa re la sngags res dbul// de 'og mdun gyi lha mo mchod// de la mchod pas mnyes par bsam// de nas ting 'dzin ma bral bar// gsang sngags khri tsho gsum du bzlas// oM tsarni ki aM baM gi ma hA ka li krod+ha ba Tawa thaM da ni bing ka la ni hring hU~M hU~M hU~M/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma ma sha trun ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kA r+yaM hUM hU~M hU~M phaT// thun mtshams dag tu gtor ma ni// sngags 'dis dbul bar bya'o// oM k+Shi k+Shi tra pa la ma hA kA la hU~M hU~M phaT// de nas sbyin sreg mchod par bya// rag ta'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol steng// sreg rdzas skye tshe mar nag sreg/ rdog po re la bsnyen pa'i sngags// khri khri bzlas nas dur khrod shing// tsher ma can gyi me la sreg/ de nas las la sbyar ba ni// tsha dang dug dang skye tshe dang// bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang lug nag khrag/ bsres nas dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// de yi snying khar ming rus gzhug/ lug nag khrag gis lan bdun byug/ de ni gtor ma'i nang du bzhag/ gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gzugs la mchil ma sngags len gdab// dur khrod shing dang tsher can shing// me btang gzugs de ma zad bar// bsreg nas gnod byed gzhan yang bsreg/ de yi bsad sngags 'di gsungs so// na ma sa man ta kA ya bAg ga tsit+tA badzra na na/ oM kha kha kha hi kha hi/ sarba duSh+ta na sa twa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la bar sho ba/ ba sha ha ha tsa rur 'bun dza/ tsa tur ma kha sha tsar na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ che ge mo thams cad kyi dran pa ha ri ni// ma hA pa 'gan 'ag ta re re ge be ha nan/ che ge mo thams cad la b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT+Ta T+Ta ha sa na de ni/ go ro go ro/ sarba karma na tshin da wa tshin da/ sarba man tran ban d+ha ban d+ha pa ra mon tran/ che ge mo thams cad A kar sha ya A kar sha ya/ che ge mo thams cad da ne ra sma tha ner ma tha/ pra bi sha ya pra bi sha ya/ ma la ma dzi/ che ge mo thams cad kyi 'ja' hA nA ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kir+yaM/ che ge mo thams cad kyi 'dza' hA na kA ra/ ku ru ku ru ma ka t+yaM/ che ge mo thams cad ha ha da ha/ che ge mo thams cad pa tsa pa tsa/ mA mi lam pa mA mi laM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M phaT// s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ che ge mo thams cad nA sha ya nA sha

ya// hi hi b+ha ga ban k+Ni na g+hin tsa ra ya/ si ma ma sarba a ri b+ha sa d+ha ya swAhA/ zhes pas bsad blags bzlas nas bsreg/ thal ba rlung la dgra phyogs phyar// de la grub pa'i rtags bshad pa// bsgrub pa po yi rmi lam du// sha ster ba dang chang ster ba// zho dang 'o ma ster ba yod// lus la khrag 'dzag la sogs 'byung// bsrung dang bsad pa grub pa'o// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las/ 'dod chags mo'i bsgrub pa las lha mo gtu mo dmar mo'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom dan 'das kyis mo chags pa'i bdag nyid las bal mo thugs kyi reg chod 'di gsungs so// rang nyid nyal pa'i ma la 'og tu// khru gang gru gsum brus pa'i nang// ro thol ldong ros khyi lud kyis// de yi logs la zhal zhal byug/ de nang rabs chad thod pa gzhug/ lugs sa'i smad gos steng du ni// ling ga nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhag/ g.yam pa dag la bri ba yang// rdo rje rgya gram bris pa yis// gru gsum de yi kha bcad nas// de yi steng du re ba ni// nag po gru gsum bris pa'i steng// bdag nyid kha ni nub ltas bsdad// rang gos mgo mjug bzlog la gon// rang mdun mchod rten nag po ni// bang rim lnga pa legs byas la// 'og tu ming rus ling ga gzhug/ lcags zangs nyungs kar thun gyis brab// byang phyogs brub khung gru gsum nang// logs la mtho gang sor bzhi la/ dpangs su sor brgyad byas pa'i nang// dgra yi rkang rjes dri ma'am// kham sa'i gzugs ni byas pa yi// snying khar logs chad 'khor lo la// ming rus bris la gzhug par bya// mchog gu phur pa sor brgyad pa// gri lcags mde'u bcug pa dgod// 'bab khung kha la rtsang sor brgyad// nyi shu rtsa gcig gzugs par bya// gu gul khyi brug rwa gzhob kyis// ling ga lha dang dbral bar bya// lho phyogs khru gang gru gsum pa'i// logs la sgyed po dmar nag gsum// de yi steng du slang bzhag/ nang du tsher ma can gyi shing// gru gsum dag tu brtsig par bya// sregs rdzas til ni dkar nag la// ra tshil btsan dug ngar mas bya'o// dang por mtshams gcod dus su ni// nub thun bsnyen pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM srog pa rtsa la 'ar 'ar// snying la duM bu rbud/ snying la rbud// thuM sa ma lang te rbud/ snying la thod pa sa ru sbo ta ya rbud/ srog chod 'du ma ya dza/ nub brgyad lon nas mal 'og nas// ling ga bton la lha ma 'bog bya// gos ni mgo mjug log par gon// re bas dul gdab sbyad btus bya// bar du chos skyong mthong ba na// 'jigs par mi bya yi dam bsgom// de nas bsnyen sngags bskor sngags thun// bzlas shing rang nyid gcer bur bya// gtor ma khyer la lan bdun

du// bskor la g.yon du bskor bar bya// bcu gcig nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrub// de yi sngags 'di bshad pa yin// oM pa ri sha thun b+h+yo nan/ ku ku ra mang ku ra dza/ sgra tog shig srog la b+h+yo/ de nas lham nang ling ga bton/ lho phyogs 'brub khung nang bcug la// mchog phur brde cing gsang blags bzlas// ling ga'i snying khar bzhag par bya/ oM na ga tsi bta a a/ de nas phur pa bton byas nas// mchog phur rtse mor ling ga bkal// sbyin sreg rdzas dang bsreg byas nas// sla nga'i nang du bsreg par bya// oM ag ni dz+wa la raM b+h+yo/ me trag dun/ snying khrag shig/ dam nyams kyi srog pa tsa la raM// pa ki ra dza dza/ bsgrub pa'i dus su rang nyid kyang// ser po'i gos spang nag po gon// yug sa mi mthong kha mi bsre// dam tshig 'di ni bal mo yin// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// bal mo thugs kyi reg chod mo 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid las// bal mo e thar ma bsgrub pa ste le'u bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mo 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid las dur khrod srin mo bdun gyi bsgrub pa 'di dag gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// grir shi'i khrag dang sha bsres nas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru gang ste// dbus su 'brub khung gru gsum bya// zur rer ming byang re re bri// de'i steng smyug gshags bdun gyi ni// rtse mor ming byang re re skyon// mi snying nang du dgra bo yi// ming bcug tshon skud sna sngas bsdams// sna ni sngags pa'i srin lag gzung// gru gsum rtsa ba bdun tha ma bskor// dmar gtor sha khrag byas pa dbul// srin mo bdun gyi srog snying ni// zhag bdun bzlas pa rab tu bya'o// ma ma shing do/ ru sa snying ya[¿]/ nri sha ku ru thuM rbad/ khrag hi rbad rbad/ nir ti ni ma ma rbad rbad/ su rag sha rbad rbad/ ba ru na thibs thibs/ gtor mar rag ta sbreng bzlas pas// srin mo bdun po mngon du yong// yang na snying gi gzungs thag de// 'dar na smyug ma'i mda' bdun nam// rtsang bdun yang na phur pa bdun// dril zhing snying gi ling ga sogs// gang 'dar de'am kun la brdeg/ snying du ma bu dum bur rbud rbud/ srog rtse snying phrig phrig/ rbad rbad rbud rbud sod sod/ che ge mo Ni ma ra ya hU~M/ bdun bdun gdab par bya'o// de nas srin mo bdun po bskul// srin mo chen mo mthu mo che// nag mo ral gcig 'brug la zhon// dgra bo'i snying khrag dron mo 'thung// snying khrag hA la rbud rbud// snying mo 'khros ma snying 'byin ma// zhon ni me yi 'od la zhon// gcod ni srog rtsa dmar por gcod// srog dum pa ha rtsa khrum rbud dza// srin mo khrag 'thung u pa sha// zhon ni ser ba'i dkyil 'khor

zhon// 'brug nag rkyal pa lag na thogs// dam nyams dgra la gtong bar byed// nang thaung thibs thibs a hu ga k+Sha thibs thibs thibs u ri ni dza/ srin mo shel 'gro 'tshub nag zhon// nad ni khrag nad mchin gzer gtong// dam nyams dgra la khrag nad thong// si ha nab tub khrag gtong tshal b+h+yo b+h+yo dza/ srin mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// zhon ni nyi ma'i zer la zhon// lag na khrag gi mda' 'thun 'phren// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la rgyob// khrag du 'gan dza su ri stubs nri ra dzA dzA/ srin mo sha za su pa ta// chibs su nam mkha'i glog la bcibs/ thog dang ser ba'i bdag mo mdzad// nang du pho glog slang thabs gtong// subs dgra bo tho raM subs// the re re kha chings// the re tug the re subs shrir dza/ srin mo dmar mo mi zan ma// dmar mo zangs kyi ral gri thogs// chod cig dgra bo'i srog rtsa chod// srog rbud ling tsa tsa phreng phreng rbad rba da/ ni khuM ri tshod dza dza/ de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni// snying de duM bu bdun gtubs nas// tsher ma can na dug shing me// sngags 'dis bsreg par bya ba'o// che ge mo da ha da ha// pa tsa pa tsa// ma ma ku ru ku ru che ge mo raM// bsregs nas thal ba ra thod blug/ gdug pa tsan nam lha khang ngam// mchod rten 'og tu mnan par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// dur khrod kyi srin mo bdun bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mo chags pa'i bdag nyid kyis thog ser dbab pa'i bsgrub pa 'di dag gsungs so// dang po bsnyen pa'i srog dgug pa// dben pa'i gnas ni yid 'ong bar// yo byad ldan par byas nas ni// phyi nang bshags pa rab tu bya// ma nyes dbang yang gzugs bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ dbus su yi ge hri bris nas// rtsibs bzhi ma ra tsa sha bri// rten rdzas srin mo khyi nag dang// glang rog bud med snying la bya// dam rdzas gtor ma rgyan bcas bshams// de nas sgom pa ting 'dzin gsum// dbus su hri las rta mgrin nyid// shar du stag srin zor ba'i gdong// lho yi baM srin dred mo'i gdong// nub kyi kong srin ba glang gdong// byang du 'brog srin chu srin gdong// bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim mchod bya// zil gnon dbang du bsdu bar bya// bsnyen pa chu mig lkug pa'i chu// phul gang gu gul nag po mnye// de yi chu nas nyungs kar 'byung// ban d+ha cig gi nang blugs te// rag mo bzhis bskor sngags 'dis gdab// oM rag mo rag mo snying kha rag snying tsa bu la ma b+h+yo// oM rag mo rag mo ru ru ro ru tsa pa la dgra bo'i snying kha rag mo b+h+yo// oM rag mo rag mo rtsa mo khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo// aM rag mo rag trag

mo trag ma shig shig snying kha rag ma la b+h+yo// srog snying bsnyen pa 'di bzlas pas// 'bum tsho bzhi dang khri tsho bzhis// bud med mang po lug khyu dang// chu bo zor ba thogs pa 'byung// bar du zor thogs thun sgrub pa// ban d+ha gu gul dud pas bdug/ de nas ra rog snying khrag dang// rgya bo khyi dang mtshal bu'i bya// bud med snying khrag skam po rnams// khu 'phangs ser pa 'chus sbyangs te// ban d+ha khrag gis bkang ba'i nang// bsnyen pa'i dus kyi nyungs kar la// bsgrub pa'i sngags ni btags la brab// du khroM/ dkar khro/ bru ti phra/ yu ga ti smin/ shar shar rta hril b+h+yo/ rag tu tsa ra hril b+h+yo trAM traM/ sngags 'di 'bum du bzlas byas na/ rlung 'tshub khu 'phangs kha ba 'byung// ser dbyibs ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs// bag phye las byas thun khrag gzhug/ tha mar skya rings gzer gdab pa// mdze thod legs par byi dor byas// nang du'ang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// rtsibs la bsnyen sngags re re bri// dbus su yum lha ser bsrung bri// rtsibs mchan la ni bsgrub sngags bri// mu khyud dag la dbab sngags bri// nang du bsgrub pa'i nyungs kar khrag/ skam pa de blugs dbab sngags brdeg/ mahA hri la shar tra trag/ ru rtsa ri rtsa shu ti khroM/ tsa mun tur khroM// sa man ta a ka ra sha ya du ru du ru khroM phaT// khri phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis// phyi rtags 'ja' dang 'tshub ma dang// khu 'phangs ser ba gnas khang 'bab// nang rtags zor thogs chu 'khrid dang// btsas ma rnga dang g.yul byed dang// chu 'khyags pa dang dmag 'dren 'byung// gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus shes pas// gnam zer ra rtser yul lha la// bsnyen pa'i ban d+ha sba bar bya// bar ser btsan la ri thang mtshams// bsgrub pa'i ban d+ha sba bar bya// sa gzer klu la 'od dkyil du// dbab pa'i mdze thod sba bar bya// 'jug sdud snang srid lha srin sngags// sde brgyad sngags 'dis dbab par bya// badzra ru dri traM b+h+yo// ba du ru tri traM b+h+yo// ya ma du tri traM b+h+yo// yag sha ru tri traM b+h+yo/ na ga ru tri traM b+h+yo// d+he ba ru tri traM b+h+yo// tsa ba sha ya ma traM b+h+yo/ pra ma ni traM b+h+yo/ de ni rta yis dbab pa'i sngags// sna tshogs khrag dang sngo khud dang// 'o ma la sogs thabs byas na// lha klu khros nas skyin thang 'bebs// blo bur dag tu 'byung ba 'khrug/ oM g+hu si dan ma dgra la b+h+yo/ u tsus sma sha dgra la b+h+yo// khaM khas ma dgra la b+h+yo// rbad shag ma dgra la b+h+yo// de ni thabs kyis dbab pa'i sngags// thal 'jam dgra la zor du 'phang// thun dang gtor ma 'phang bar bya// drag sngags 'di yis zor du 'phang// yul che ge mo thig nig/ gcig med/ gnyis trag/ brgyad bcad/ gnam mthongs phye// lcags sgrog khrol// mi reng sod// skyang rje skyang mo tsu ru tsu ru phaT/ zor gyis 'phang bar

bya ba ste// rang la byung na dgra yul du// yi dam gtor mas 'phang bar bya// phebs nas btang rag bta nga ba dang// rgyun du bzlas shing mcho da par bya// oM rag mo rag mo/ snying rtsa ru ru rtsa ba snying kha rag/ g+hu sa di na ma shag mu sha ma la b+h+yo/ tshes bzhi brgyad dang bco lnga dang/ bcu gcig bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu/ zla ba la de dus su sngags// bzlas la mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi mchod// rdzas la bsnyen pa bskyal byas nas// 'gong yugs mi gtsang ma song ba'i// mthun rnams legs par sbas byas nas// sngags pas dgos pa'i dus nyid du// dngos grub chen po thob gyur pas// khros pa tsam gyis thog ser 'bebs// khyab 'jug chen po'i mthu dang 'dra// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyen par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dab nga chen dregs pa can zil gyi gnon pa'i rgyad las/ 'dod chags mo'i las kyi thog dang ser ba dbabs pa las gdong mo bzhi'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dod chags mo'i bdag nyid las yul khams bsrung ba'i gsang sngags dam pa 'di gsungs so// nang par sbrin pa rtag pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig yungs dkar bzlas// sprin rkang shar te sprin la gtor byas na// sprin ma med par legs par 'gyur// oM byi ra byi ra swA hA// sprinarkang gzugs na gcad pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig nyung dkar bzlas// spyin dkar shar gyi byung ba la// gtor na sprin gyi rkang pa gtubs// tad ya thA a hU~M// huM ta ru bya byi ru la// sarba byi sha ga ta ya ha ya grib lu hu lu hu hU~M phaT swA hA/ sprin pa yang yang 'thib pa na/ gsal phyir sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas// le gas pa gnyis bsnol ral gri yi// phyag rgyas gasprin 'thebs myur du gsal// oM badzra ka ta ri tsin ta tsin ta hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ btag dang bcad dang 'thibs gsal ba// de dag sprin pa'i gsang sngags yin// lug 'ded dag tu bzlog pa ni// sngags ni nyung dkar brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas nas gar 'do da sa ngos su// sdigs mdzub dag gis ded par bya// oM dza dza kan ma pa tsa hU~M AHTa/ chang dbang song nas bzlog 'dod na// nyung dkar sngags 'di bzlas byas nas// rgya gram phyag rgyas dam du bsdams// tshor ba thog tu bzog par byed// oM badzra ga ru Da ya// haM sa he tsa la tsa la swA hA// sngags pa phrag dog byung ba ni// mdzum mo'i rtse la rlu nga lha bsam// 'khor lo steng bzhag gar 'dod 'phang/ thal chen dag la nyi shu gcig/ bzlas te mgrin ser 'bebs pa bzlog/ ser ba mu khrid 'grim par byed// oM pad ka ma ra ba e ne'u the hU~M hU~M phaT phaT// lha la bskor te bzlog pa ni// glang ru'i nang du yungs kar dang// skye 'brum dang ni lan tshwa

dang// bud med bcu gsum lon pa'i khrag/ sngags nas rta ru bcug byas nas// rta la bskor nas rta mtshams thub// oM tha khrid badzra tha khrid badzra do hu ya hu ya ru lu ru lu swAhA/ nang 'gras dgra yi yul bzlog ni// ser bsrungs gnyis kyis dbus 'tshubs na// sngo sna tshogs tshad dag la bsngags// rang yul bzlog la dgra yul dbab// oM hU~M phaT// b+h+yo du ling phob// kar phroM du dril sa ra du ru pho// mar phroMm du 'dri la lo du ma phob// ser duM phob// kyang duM phob// ser ba blau bur byung bzlog pa// sngags 'di nyungs kar thal chen la/ bzlas nas gtor na sprin med par// blo bur ser pa byung ba bzlog/ na mo b+ha ga pa ti/ shag kya mu ne/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te byo/ saM myag saM bud+ha ya/ ta da ya thA/ oM bu dze b+hu dze/ sa ma ya b+hu dze/ ta thA b+hu dze/ bra bar b+hu dze/ nags ra tsan tso ne swAhA/ lugs 'ded chang dbang phrag dog dang// lha bskor nang 'das blo bur rnams// gdong bzlog sngags kyis dbye ba ste// so sor gsal ba sngags kyi mthu// ser ba bcad pa'i// pad+ma he ru kar bsgom la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa'i nang// mthe 'ong bcug la sdigs mdzub bsgreng// ser ba bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o// lcags sam seng ldeng phur pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig/ bzlas te ri rtse 'ong ba'am// sbas na phur bu ma byung bar// ser ba 'bebs par mi 'gyur ro// mar dang yungs dkar seng lding shing// bzlas na hom byas ser ba 'chad// sngags 'di 'bum du bzlas nas ni// gro ga shu gu la bris te// phur bu dag la dkris byas nas// de la tshon skud sna lngas bcings// ser ba 'ong ba'i rgyun srad du// btab na ser ba chod par 'gyur// oM pad+ma krid hri// ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT// na mo b+ha ga ban dza na ya/ tsan d+ha ka ku ta ya// sa ra sa ra// su ru su ru// su re ba ga pa tsa ra'i ma sa/ ha ra ha ra/ pa tsa pa tsa ni swAhA/ shing shun dag la 'khor lo bri// lte bar ser ba gtor ba yi// ling ga ming rus bris nas ni// lce la seng ldeng phur pas gdab// phur bu'i sbal la sngags dkris te// 'khor lo'i phyi rim sngags 'dis bskor// ser mtho'i 'og tu sbas byas na// ser ba ma lus thub par nges// nyungs kar nyungs nag thal chen la/ 'bum tsho gsum du bzlas nas ni// ser ba'i gdong du brgyab na chod// dam tshig chen pos rab tu bshad// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las// mo chags pa'i bdag nyid las mkha' 'gro mas ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gti mug gi bdag nyid klu'i bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// gang gi klu la gtad 'dod na// gru gsum nang du thod chen gzhug/ de nang ling ga sngags bskor

gzhug/ nub mo mo sngags 'di yang bzlas// oM nag shu li ni swA hA// pad mar 'dzo mo rtags yin// nyin mo pha yi sngags 'di bzlas// oM nag su pra ti badzra dun te mi li mi la swAhA/ glang dmar g.yag nag mo pho rtags yin// ba glang 'bri dang sbal ba nya// de rmis dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags/ nga dang cho nges 'debs na ldog/ cho 'phrul shin ru che ba ni// grub yang dbang du ma 'dus rtags// pad+ma dbang gis dbang du sdud// dkar gsum mngar gtor sngags 'dis byin// oM nA ga pa na ya kru ra ha na ha na du sta hU~M// kha kha kha hi kha hi ba ling hU~M phaT// oM nan du na ga ra tsa ya ba ling ta kha kha khA hi ba ling hU~M phaT// de nas rbad par bya ba ni// dgra bo'i srog snying 'di yang bzlas// zhag lngar dmigs nas dgra bkug ste// ling ga dag la bstim par bya// tsi ta tsi baM 'bru thum ril khas mugs thibs/ klad khrag spyos shig/ mig rtsa sgyur cig/ rtsa rgyus chod cig/ dgab rtsa drongs shig lhu gzugs khrol cig/ bkrag dang gzi mdangs khrol cig/ nyams par gyis shig/ dgra bo lha dang dbye ba ste// klu yi smod ngan rbad pa yin// de nas bsad pa skyer 'bru dang// skye tshe shangs tshe thun 'di ni// brgya brgyad dag ni dbab par bya// oM tsakra ma ra ya sod/ tsag kru ma ra ya sod// tsag khra ma ra ya sod// tsa kra ma ra ya sod// tsa kra ma ra ya sod// de nas gtang bar bya ba ni// bco lnga gnam stong dus la ni// glang dmar rwa ni gzhob med par// ling ga bcug la rda ras bcad// klu yis gnas khang sar phyin la// sngags 'dis sa 'di brkol bar bya// oM byis chog cig/ mthong ba'i dug la sgrib shing gdags// reg pa'i dug la byug pas bsrung// kha rlangs dug la rten 'brel sngags// bsam pa'i dug la ting nge 'dzin// sngags 'dis thod par gzhug par bya// sarba big bag sho kho li li dam te ya swAhA/ thod pa'i steng du rdzas sbreng ba// tsan dan spos chus sngags 'dis blugs// oM nag sha sha shu shu med ne dz+nyA na tsa kra shur na hri ya saM// de nas gtad rdzas sam g.yogs nas// de'i steng ru sbal khog pa ni// kha sbub sngags 'dis mnan bar bya'o// na ga ra tsa badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT// na ga kro ta badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT// na ga yag sha kro ta sa ma ya hU~M phaT// na ga rag sha kro ta sa ma ya hU~M phaT// na ga zi dar kro ta badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT// nag sarba dus stan sa ma ya hU~M phaT// na ga sarba pa paM sa ma ya hU~M rbad// de nas phyi laM bcad pa'i sngags// dam tshig sngags bdun re re la// 'di btags khrag rul rjes su 'breng// ha ha hi hi na ga ti sta sa ma hU~M phaT/ pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud las/ klu gti mug dug gi bdag nyid la gtad pa drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu gti mug gi bdag nyid gnyan la gtad pa 'di gsungs so// 'brub khung nang du thod pa bzhag/ de nang 'khor lo shing shun la// dbus su dgra gzugs ming dang rus// phyi rim 'bod rbad bsad pa'i sngags// rim pa gsum du bri bar bya// de na sdig pa gnyan gyi lto// de nas gsang sngags bshad par bya'o// nag 'du na ga 'du na ga shan 'du// hi li hi li 'dus 'dus// sdig pa nya sbrul rmis pa na// dgra bo dgug pa rbad pa'i sngags// na ga ra tsa a ra nan// na ga su ga nag su ga hU~M dza hU~M dza/ btson bzung ba dang/ rtsig skud dang// sol ba 'jug pa rmis na khugs// de nas bsad par bya ba ni/ nag po bam tsi tsa rgyas// trag thur snying la mgul// myags myags rtsa bzhi skums shan shan srog la shan thur sod// na ga ken tso 'dus 'dus dza dur dgra la b+h+yo// de nas chu mig kha byang bltas sam// byang shar dag tu kha lta bar// thod pa gnan sa legs par gtang// rang gis phyi la ma khrag rul bcad// dgra la za lam rtsi sman sbreng// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gnon gyi rgyud las// gnyan la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'dis kyis klu gti mug gi bdag nyid las sa bdag la gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gro ga shing shun dag la ni// dgra yi gzugs ni legs bris nas// lag g.yas hal khyi hang na phan g.yon// rkang g.yas the se tsang kun g.yon// phyi rim sbal pa sngags kyis bskor// sa bdag bzhi yi srog 'di bzlas// kro ta ma khyen snying khrag srog chod dbugs long phaT dza dza/ kha khu ri na dz+nyA tsa sha ra na srog phaT dza dza/ sa ba me byin gan d+he re phaT dza dza/ du ra shi par tsa phaT dza dza/ 'di ni hal khyi hang phan dang// the se tsang kun bod sngags yin// de nas gtad pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM b+hi ra te dur ni pra dza phaT// oM sa to rag shaM du ra tsa phaT// ke'u du rag sha k+Shu ti phaT dza dza/ pra yang ku ru pre ra dza dza/ na ga ku ru nag po tsit+ta rbad// g+hi na ku ru de ba shan de rbad/ ta no be na ku ru ye swAhA/ zhes pas bdag gnas sar gtad// yang na ro dang sbrags nas gtad// ro yi khar bcug gtad par bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// sa dag la gtad cing las bcol ba'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyang// klu gti mug gi bdag nyid las drag po'i las kyis bzlog cing gnad la dbab par bya ba'i bsgrub pa 'di dag bstan pa bsrung phyir gsungs so// mdun du gru gsum nag po'i nang// thod nang klu yi gzugs bzhag nas// bra ma'i phur bu sngags bzlas te// khyung nag kha na sbrul nag za ba bsam// oM ra

ma hA ga ru Ta hU~M hU~M/ oM badzra ba ti ga ru Ta hU~M hU~M// dza dza ra tsa tri dza hU~M phaT// de ni bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags yin// klu rnams gsod ba'i sngags 'di ni// nyungs kar brab cing phur bus gdab// oM lhang lhang tsher tsher shig shig dum dum// oM ra tsa ma hA ga ru Ta khyung rbad/ hur thums b+h+yo// sa na ga tsa tri du me srog la ma ra ya rbad/ las kyi rang gshed 'bebs pa ste// rdo rje rin chen gshog pa yi// pho nya rab tu gtad bzlog byed// klu gnyan sa bdag gdong zla rnams// bzlog dang mthu byed ngag mnan pa// yaM las lcags khang gru bzhi'i dbus// lcags kyi rdo rje rgya gram ni// bsnol mar gnas pa'i bar du yang// nr-i las bsgrub bya bskyed par bsam// de yi lce la bri ba'i sngags// kA ya ba ga tsit+ta staMpa ya ku ru la// de la dgug gzhug byas nas ni// yaM brgyad lcags byung bsregs par bsam// nyal kar sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad// de las mang ba mi bzlas so// a mu ka kA ya bA ga tsit+ta staM pa ya/ dzaM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ma ra ya/ laM ku ru hU~M phaT// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// gti mug klu'i bdag nyid gtad log bsrung ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// gti mug las byung ba'i klu'i bdag nyid las klu gnyan sa bdag gi gdong zla bzlog pa'i 'di gsungs so// ro g.yam thog tu ro ras la// 'khor lo'i dbus su bsgrub bya bri// lce la mnan pa'i sngags bris te// rtsibs ni bcu drug nang du bstan// de la gsang sngags bri bar bya// de steng mchod rten gsum brtsegs pa// zur sum byas pa'i nang du yang// phur bu jags bris ling ga gzer// bum pa bkra shis sa la bya// nang du bdag nyid bzhag par bya// phyag gi phur pa phyir phyung la// rtse mo dgra la bstan par bya// dpal la gsang sngags bri bar bya// gos nag gon la bsgrub bya dgug// ling ga dag la bstim par bya// rang bas che ba med par bsgom// bskor ba phyin ka log tu bya// nya stong tshes brgyad dus gnyen la// sngags 'di rab tu bzlas par bya// oM ma ga ti bzlog/ sa ga ti bzlog/ sa ti dun ti srog la bzlog/ nga srog tig la bab/ ngar ngar la bab// su pa Ni ya bzlog/ rbod stong dur ya bzlog/ de ni bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags de// 'di ni las kyi sham bu yin// brgya brgya dag la re re gdags// gshin rje'i ya thog bzlog/ phur bu'i lha 'byed bzlog/ ma mo'i dal kha da na shing bzlog/ bse mo'i srog shing srog snying bzlog/ pho rgyud bzlog/ mo rgyud bzlog/ btsan bzlog/ bdud bzlog/ rgyal po bzlog/ ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa can zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// gti mug klu'i gdong zla

bzlog pa ste le'u nyer drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces sngags pa'i che ba mang po mgrin gcig tu brjod do// stong gsal rig pa chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yi rtsal 'chang ba// gzung yul stong pa shes rab nyid// 'dzin sems ye shes las byung bas// snying rje thabs kyi bdag nyid can// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// sku gsum snang ba khyod kyi sku// 'khor ba khams gsum sems can la// las kyi dbang gis nyon mongs snang// de bzlog chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bla med theg pa rab ston mdzad// rnal 'byor lam la zhugs pa la// nyams kyi snang ba shar bar byed// thabs kyi cha las skyes pa ni// snang ba dgrar langs rnal 'byor yin// shes rab cha las skyes pa ni// stong pa dgrar langs rnal 'byor yin// snang stong gnyis su med pa yin// sku gsung thugs ni mi zad pa'i// rgyan pa'i 'khor lo yang dag gnas// dkyil 'khor dgu yi bsgrub pa yis// lhun gyi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor che// bdag cag dug gsum gdug pa can// dpal gyi bka' las mi 'da' bar// dam tshig bzhin du bstan pa bsrung// zhes brjod nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur// thams cad chos kyi skur thim mo// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyud las// rjes su yi rang ba ste le'u nyer bdun pa'o//// dbang chen dregs pa zil gnon gyi rgyud rdzogs so// paN+Di ta pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ lo tsar kha che a nan ta sa bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du// shri badzra ma hA krod+ha ha ya gri ba tan tra rA dza ni nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje khro bo chen po rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// 'og min chos kyi dbyings pad+ma dbang gi pho brang na// rgya chad phyogs mtshams med pa rin po che 'od kyi pho brang na// bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gzi brjid 'bar ba zhes bya ba la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig pa 'di lta ste// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje dang// sku rdo rje dang/ thugs rdo rje dang/ yon tan rdo rje dang/ 'phrin las rdo rje dang// gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba dang thabs gcig go/ yang shes rab kyi yum du gyur pa// gsung gi yum dang sku'i yum dang/ thugs kyi yum dang/ yon tan gyi yum dang// 'phrin las kyi yum dang// gnyis su med pa shes rab kyi yum dang thabs gcig go/ yang thun mong gi 'khor lha thar byed dang// lha ma yin thar byed dang// mi thar byed dang// byol song thar byed dang// yi dgas thar byed

dang// dmyal ba thar byed rnams dang thabs gcig go/ yang khyad par gyi 'khor// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po yab yum sras dang bcas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// yang ngo bo nyid kyi 'khor// 'di lta ste/ don gcig pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang// rang byung chen po dang// rang gsal chen po dang// nyid las mi zhan pa dang// ma btsal klong yangs dang// ma bkag rang gsal zhes bya ba dang// ma btus khyab rdal zhes bya ba dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// dregs pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin du ma 'khor rnams kyi rgyud la 'di lta ste// skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// spros pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// dregs pa tshar gcod pa bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgyud la skyes so// de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyis bdud dang log 'dren thams cad 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// thugs zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par// sku khro bo rta mgrin gyi gzugs su yang dag par ston par gyur to// spyi gtsug rta mgo ljang khur rta skad thengs gsum ston pas// khams gsum dbang du sdud// srid gsum zil gyis mnan nas bdud dang dregs pa thams cad tshar bcad de// 'khor thams cad bka' bzhin byed par gyur to// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas gsungs rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gyi gtso bar gyur pa de stan las langs te// bcom ldan 'das pa pad+ma dbang chen la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bcom ldan dbang chen rgyal// thugs rje'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs// rta mchog rgyal por sku khros nas// bdud dang bgegs rnams tshar bcad phyir// nyid kyis lta sgom spyod 'bras dang// bsnyen sgrub las la sbyar ba dang// dbang dang sbyin sreg mnan dang bsrung// dbab gcad 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// bstod bskul 'phrin las rta bro dang// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcad pa'i// las kyi rim pa ma lus pa// dbang chen rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol nas ched du gleng

ngo// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// gleng bslang bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang chen rgyal po la// gsung gi rdo rjes 'di skad zhus// e ma ho dbang gi rgyal po lags// dbang mchog rgyal po lta ba ji ltar lags// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// dbang chen rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// rta mchog rgyal po'i lta ba ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye nas ma bcos chos kyi sku// rta mgrin rgyal por ye nas gnas// skye 'gag gnyis kyi mtha' las grol// ma spangs mtha' bral gzung 'dzin med// ye nas rang byung ye shes la// mtshan med spros bral ye sangs rgyas// rang la gnas pas gzhan na med// bltas pas mthong ba ma yin te// rang rig rta mgrin lhun gyis grub// ma btsal bzhag pas rta mchog mthong// mthong ba tsam gyis yang sangs rgyas// gzhan nas lta med rang las mthong// rta mchog rgyal po'i lta bar yin// zhes gsungs so// lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas rta mchog sgom pa gsungs// dbang chen rta mchog sgom 'dod na// lus ni ma bcos bde ba che// rta mgrin sku ru gsal stong// gsal stong gnyis med sgom pa'i mchog/ ngag ni rang byung sngags kyi sgra/ sgra ru grags pas ngo bos stong// grag stong gnyis med sgom pa'i mchog/ sems ni ma bcos bde ba che// gsal la ma 'gags ngo bo stong// bde stong gnyis med sgom pa'i mchog/ rnam rtog chos nyid ngang du ni// dug lnga rang sar rjes med grol// ma spangs mtha' bral gzung 'dzin med// rig pa rang byung rta mgrin yin// ye nas ma bsgrubs rang la gnas// bsgoms dang ma bsgoms gnyis med na// thob med don la rtsol sgrub med// ri dgas smig rgyu snyeg pa 'dra// bsgrub pas grub par mi 'gyur ro// rang la bzhag nas gzhan la btsal// bskal par bsgrubs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas rta mchog spyod pa gsungs// rta mgrin rgyal po'i spyod pa ni// chos sku skye med ngang nyid nas// log lta zhi bas mi 'dul ba// longs sku thugs rje chen po yis// khro bo rta mchog rgyal por sprul// mkha' ltar khyab pa'i thugs rje yis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs rnams// thams cad ma lus 'joms pa mdzad// rnam rtog zung du 'jil bar mdzad// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la// 'dzin chags med par rang bzhin gsal// snang tsam nyid na ngo bo stong// snang stong gnyis med rang grol spyod// rnam rtog dug lnga gang skyes pa// 'dzin med zhen med rang grol la// gzung dang 'dzin pa med

pa'i ngang// chos nyid rang sangs ngang du spyod// 'khor ba mi spong rang grol la// mya ngan 'das pa mi sgrub pa// 'khor ba rang bzhin med ces na// mya 'das sangs rgyas de ltar ro// khyad par rta mgrin spyod pa ni// khams gsum thams cad dbang bsdus nas// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du spyod// srid gsum thams cad zil gyis mnan// dregs pa tshar gcod las khol spyod/ rgyud drug 'khor ba rtsad bcad nas// thams cad byang chub lam la spyod// ces gsungs so// spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'bras bu bsgrub pa gsungs// chos dbyings skye med spros dang bral// skye med don de brjod nus min// brjod med mtha' dang bral ba ni// chos sku rte mgrin zhes su brjod// thugs rje'i rang bzhin ma 'gags pas// 'gro 'dul ba'i don ched du// thugs rje chen po thugs khros nas// rta mgrin khro bo'i skur bstan pa// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rta mgrin yin// dregs pa bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir// sku mdog phyag mtshan cha lugs rnams// mi mthun so so grangs las 'das// gang la gang gis 'dul ba dang// ci la cis 'dul gnyen por sprul// sprul pa sku yi rta mgrin yin// khyad par rta mgrin sgrub tu med// sems nyid ye nas rta mgrin la// skye med brjod med spros dang bral// gzugs dang kha dog mtshan ma med// chos sku rta mgrin ye nas grub// sems nyid ma 'gags rang byung la// dug lnga ye shes lnga ru shar// rnam rtog chos nyid ngang du grol// chod nyid longs spyod rgyun chad med// longs sku rta mgrin ye nas grub// phyi dang dngos por cir yang snang// rang snang ngo bo rang sar grol// rgyud drug skye 'gro thams cad kyang// rta mgrin sku de snang stong yin// sgra ru grags pa thams cad kyang// rta mgrin gsung grag stong yin// sems kyi dran rtogs thams cad kyang// rta mgrin thugs de bde stong yin// thams cad sprul sku'i rta mgrin yin// zhes gsungs so// 'bras bu'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas dbang mchog rgyal po la// gsung gi rdo rje 'di skad zhus// e ma ho dbang mchog rgyal po che// rta mgrin bsnyen pa ji ltar bya// dpa' bos rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// dbang chen rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// bsnyen pa la ni rnam pa gnyis// zhi ba dang ni khro bo'o// dang po zhi ba'i bsnyen pa ni// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas su ni// maN+Dal mchod pa bshams nas su// rten dang sku gzugs bkram byas la// gdong dang kha lag bkrus byas la// bde ba'i stan

la 'dug nas ni// dang po byang chub sems bskyed la// bla med dkon mchog skyabs song la// bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs te// thugs rje chen po'i lha tshogs rnams// sbyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod// sdig bshags rjes su yi rangs 'bul// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab// dge ba byang chub don du bsngo// bdag gzhan byang chub thob par smon// de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags nas// ye shes tshogs bsags sems bskyed bya// de nas ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong nyid spros bral de bzhin nyid// tshad med bzhi ldan kun tu snang// ye shes sems dpa' tshogs nang rgyu// hU~M las ye she sa gzhal yas khang// steng 'og 'khor lo pad+mar ldan// dbus gnas pad+ma 'dab bzhis bteg/ phyi rol pad+ma 'dab drug mdzes// bar khyams sgo bzhi rgyan gyis mdzes// khor yug rdo rje ra ba la// ye shes me ri rab 'bar cing// phyi rim byang chub shing gis mdzes// de dbus nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// de dbus rgyu yis sems dpa' las// spro bsdu'i sbyor ba byas pa las// thugs rje chen po'i sku ru gyur// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar// 'dzum byas spyan dmar mdzes pa'i zhal// phyag gnyis thugs khar thal mo sbyar// g.yas kyi 'og ma shel 'phreng la// g.yon gyi 'og ma pad+ma bsnams// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu la brgyan// snang la rang bzhin med pa bsgom// de nas yi ge drug ma yum// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gtso dang thun// g.yas su nor bu 'dzin pa dkar// zhal gcig phyag gnyis nor bu 'dzin// g.yon du rig sngags 'dzin ma dkar// zhal gcig phyag gnyis shel 'phreng bsnams// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// yum sras yab la 'dud tshul bskyed// de nas 'khor gyi lha bskyed pa// phyi rol pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// yab kyi thugs kha'i hrI 'phros pas// 'khor du rgyal ba rigs drug bskyed// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma dkar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje dkar// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo dkar// rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen ser// snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma dmar// don grub ljang khu rgya gram ljang// pha rol phyin drug yum gyi tshul// shes rab bsam gtan brtson 'grus dang// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa rnams// gtso bo'i sku mdog phyag mtshan 'dzin/ dbyings dang ye shes yab dang sbyor// sgo bzhi sprul sku thub pa drug/ shar sgor brgya byin pi wang dkar// lha min thub pa thags

bzang sngo// lho sgor shag thub gseg shang bar// shakya seng ge po ti bsnams// nub sgo nam mkha' mdzod dmar rin chen sgrom// byang sgor chos rgyal me chu gnag/ snang la rang bzhin med par sgom// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// rigs lnga ye shes dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya// de nas ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgrub// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs pa// bzhugs su gsol zhing phyag 'tshal mchod// bstod cing 'phrin las bcol ba bya// tshogs la sogs pas 'byor tshogs mchod// de nas bsnyen bsgrub dbul ba ni// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kha ru// zla dkyil hrIH la sngags kyis bskor// oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M// 'khor gyi lha rnams thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gnas pa la// 'od zer dkar po 'phros pa yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// zhing khams dag par 'od 'phros pas// sku gsung thugasakyis mchod pa 'bul// khams gsum sems can sgrib pa sbyang// thugs rje'i chen po'i sku ru gyur// slar 'dus rang gi sgrib pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// de ltar spro bsdu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// ye shes lha la bsnyen pa 'bul// thun mtshams lha la mchod pa 'bul// chos skyong rnams la gtor ma 'bul/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba 'debs// ye shes semasas dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' gtso la bsdu// de yang thugs ka'i hri la bsda// hrI yang rims kyis thig ler bsdu// thig le mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings// spros pa med pa'i ngang la bzhag/ thun bzhi thun drug nyams su blangs// thun gyi dang po bskyed rim bya// thun gyi tham bsdu gshegs bya// de la dus kyi bsnyen pa ni// zhag grangs zla grangs lo la sogs// rab 'bring tha mar sbyar te sgrub// grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum dang ni// bye ba sa ya gang 'grub sgrub// rtags ni bsnyen pa zhal mthong dang// 'od dang sgra dang lung ston dang// nad gdon sel dang bar chad sol// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung// de ltar zhe ba'i bsnyen pa yis// zhi ba thugs rje chen po grub par sgrub// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub the tshom med// ces gsungs so// zhi ba'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// zhi ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro bo'i bsnyen pa bstan pa ni// dang po dben pa'i gnas su ni// maN+Da la phyi nang mchod pa bshams// nub tu kha gahad gos dmar bgo// pad+ma ra ga'i phreng ba'i bgrang// bde ba'i rtan la 'dug nas su// skad cig stong pa'i ngang las ni// bdag nyid rta

mgrin skur bsgoms la// rta skad 'don cing mtshams bcad la// bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// sngon 'gro yan lag bcu pa bya// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi rnams// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab par bya// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs nas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// ma bcos spros med byang chub dang// kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin// ma rtogs sems can snying rje bskyed// bskyed pa rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems ye shes sems dpar gsal// rang lus nang gi 'byung ba dang// snod bcud 'byung ba phyi spyad phyir// nam mkha' rlung dang chu dang sa// ri rab dang ni ma la sogs// sems dang dbugs dang sha dang khrag/ drod dang rus pa sbyar ba'i phyir// 'byung ba rim brtsegs bskyed par bya// de nas b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang// dregs pa gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// gzhal yas khang gi rtsigs pa dang// ka gdung gral bkram skar khung bstod// phyogs skyong bcu yi rtsig rmang la// lha chen brgyad kyi rtsig pa la// klu chen brgyad kyi gdung ma bri// rgyal chen zhi yi ka ba la// lha chen brgyad po bad du bor// rgyu skar rnams kyis gral krab bya// nyi zla gnyis kyi skar khung stod// pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug mdzes// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// rdo rje ra ba me ri 'bar// de dbus nyi zla pad+ma gdan// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dregs pa'i gdan// sgo bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug gdan// de ltar gzhal yas khang bskyed nas// dbus kyi gdan stengs rgyu yi lha// ye shes sems dpa' spro bsdu las// rta mgrin dbang gi sku ru gyur// dmar nag zhal gsum phyag bzhi pa// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo ba// dbus dmar sku dang thun pa'i zhal// g.yas pa dbang sdud phyag rgya dang// g.yon pa pad+ma yum la 'khyud// g.yas kyi 'og ma rdo rje yis// g.yon gyi 'og ma thod khrag dkrug/ dur khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan// dbu gtsug rta mchog rta skad 'tsher// zhabs bzhi rta bros bdud bzhi gzir// bdag dang gnyis med rang sems lha// rta mgrin logs nas sgom du med// shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin ni// gsang ba'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// dmar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// g.yas g.yon dang po yab la 'khyud// g.yas kyi 'og ma gri gug la// g.yon gyi 'og ma thod khrag stob// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum yab la 'khyud// gnas lnga rus pa'i chas kyis brgyan// gnyis med rdo rje pad+mar sbyor// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas rtsa ba'i 'khor bskyed la// yab yum rdo rje pad+mar sbyor// byang chub sems kyi 'phro bsdu las// yab kyi cha 'dzin gar dbang ni// zhal

gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje thod khrag 'khrug/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dregs gnon/ thabs dang shes rab yab yum tshul// rgyan dang cha lugs yab yum ltar// snang la rang bzhin med par sgom// de nas 'khor gyi lha bskyed pa// yab kyi thugs nas hrIHbrgyad las// 'khor lo rtsibs drug gdan stengs 'phros// steng 'og 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// sangs rgyas khro bo sku mdog dkar// g.yas g.yon 'khor lo thod khrag bsnams// sangs rgyas drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis bskyang bskum lha gdon gzir// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// rdo rje khro bo sku mdog mthing// g.yas g.yon rdo rje thod khrag bsnams// rdo rje drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bdud bgegs gzir// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ rin chen khro bo sku mdog ser// g.yas g.yon rin chen thod khrag bsnams// rin chen drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis rkyang bskum gshin rje gzir// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// pad+ma khro bo sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon pad+ma thod khrag bsnams// pad+ma drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum klu gdon gzir// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// las kyi khro bo sku mdog ljang// g.yas g.yon rgya gram thod khrag bsnams// dkar mo drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gnod sbyin gzir// 'og phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// dbang sdud kro bo sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon pad+ma thod khrag bsnams// dbang sdud drag mo yum dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum log 'dren gzir// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la gsol// thabs dang shes rab yum dang sbyor// sprul pa yang sprul tshogs bcas sgom// sgo bzhi thar byed sgo skyong drug/ shar sgo lha 'dul thar byed khro bo ni// sku mdog dkar po bi wang bsnams// lha yi gdan la brjid par bzhugs// lha min 'dul byed thar byed ni// sku mdog sngon po go cha can// lha min gdan la brjid par bzhugs// lho sgor mi 'dul thar byed ni// sku mdog ser po 'dod yon bsnams/ mi yi gdan la brjid par bzhugs// byol song 'dul byed thar byed ni// sku mdog nag po glegs bam bsnams// byol song gdan la brjid par bzhugs// nub sgor yi dgas thar byed ni// sku mdog dmar po rin chen bsnams// yi dwags gdan la brjid par bzhugs// byang sgor dmyal ba thar byed ni// sku mdog nag po me chu bsnams// dmyal ba'i gdan la brjid bar bzhugs// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa// chos sku skye med ngang las

ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs nas// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs pa// dam tshig sems dpa'i lha tshogs la// gnyis su med par bstim byas la// sprul pa'i lha mo phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang// glu bro gar gyis mnyes byas la// sku bskyed gsol gdab mchod bstod bya// de nas bzlas brjod bsnyen pa dbu la// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la/ thugs kha'i nyi dkyil hri yig la// sngags kyi 'phreng bas bskor nas ni// 'od zer 'phro bsdu'i sbyor ba las// oM pad+ma ta kri da hU~M// sku yi snying po 'bru drug pa'o// oM ha ya gri ba hU~M// gsung gi snying po 'bru drug pa'o// oM ma hA krod+ha hU~M// thugs kyi snying po 'bru drug pa'o// sku yi snying po dbu gtsug nas// 'od zer dkar po spro bar bya// gsung gi 'od zer mgrin pa nas// 'od zer dmar po spro ba dang// thugs kyi 'od zer thugs kha nas// 'od zer mthing nag spros pa yis// bde gshegs sku gsum thugs mnyes nas// khams gsum sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// tshur 'dus bde gshegs dngos grub bsdus// 'od zer spro bsdu rgyun mi gcad// dus kyi bsnyen pa zhag grangs lo// grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum bye bas ya// rtags kyi bsnyen pa 'od dang sgra// zhal mthong lung ston dngos grub ster// bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dzab bzlas bya// stong rdzogs mchod pa byas nas ni// thun mtshams gtor ma gtang bar bya// thun bzhi'i mjug la ltung bshags bya// de rnams bsnyen pa'i rim pa yin// zhes gsungs so// bsnyen pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas bsgrub pa bstan pa ni// dbang drag las la shis pa'i gnas// sa gzhi dmar la brag ri dmar// nub tu kha bltas dben pa'i gnas// shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod dam// yang na yid 'ong dben gnas su// dkon mchog mchod gtor cha gsum// sa bangag spyi dang gnas de'i bdag/ gang yin de la gtor ma sbyin// mnga' gsol mtshams bcad bka' bsgau bya// bar mtshams rta mgrin sgo byang gdags// them pa'i phyi rol dam sri mnan// nang mtshams bka' bsgo bskrad par bya// bsrung 'khor rdo rje'i gur dang rwa/ me yi 'khor lo rab tu sgom// gsang ba'i mtshams bcad chos dbyings su// bgegs dang rnam rtog rang sar bzhag/ ye nas chos sku mtshams kyi mchog/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor gdom gang gru bzhi las// bdud brtsi rnam lnga'i cha ga chag 'dab// thig gdab mtshon lnga byin rlabs las// dbus su gru bzhi gnam sgo can// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/

bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i chag chag gdab// thig gdab tshon lnga byin brlabs la/ dbus su gru bzhi gnam sgro can// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// mu khyud 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// mu khyud thod 'phreng gru chad dang// khyams dang sgo bzhi rgyan dang bcas// pany+tsar ka'i rtsig pa la// 'dod yon pha gu dra ba dang// da ru ka dang mgo gling bzhi// rdo rje rgya grams bzhi la// phyi rim kho ra yug rdo rje dang// me ri 'phreng bas bskor ba'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// de la sgrub rdzas dgod pa ni// ral gri bzhi dang phur pa bzhi/ mda' bzhi me long brgyan pa bzhi// phyogs bzhi grwa bzhir btsugs byas la/ tshon skud rnam lnga'i dra ba bri// bsnyen bsgrub gang byed dmigs dang sbyar// 'phrin las drag po'i phur sgrub ni// dbang drag gnyis kyi las yin pas// phur bsgrub byed par 'dod pa yin// sgrub phur lha yi grangs dang sbyar// nyi shu rtsa gnyis lha gnas dgod// 'phrin las rnam bzhi phur pa dang// sngags phur ni shu rtsa brgyad dang// dkyil 'khor so so'i gnas su dgod// dkyil 'khor byang shar 'brub khung bca'// gdab phur brgya dang rtsa brgyad la// byin gyis brlabs la phur bsgor bya// phurapa dgod cing mnga' gsol bya// gu gul dud pa gzi byin bskyed// rak+tas byugs la dbang bskur bya// yungs kar brab la 'phrin las bcol// dbang rdzas thod pa bum pa dang// gtor ma rak+ta dza gad chang// tshogs dang mchod rdzas rgya chen dgram// mched lcam slob dpon mnga' gsol bya// de nas ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor sgom// mtshams bcad yan lag bcu pa bya// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab par bya// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom par bya// 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang// bsnyen sgrub rkyang pa'i dus su ni// lha rnams khro bo khro mo la// zhal phyag zhabs kyis bgegs gzir ba// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan par bskyed// dbang sgrag phur sgrub dus su ni// sku stod khro bo dmar nag la// smad phur pa zur gsum pa// phyag na phur pa 'dril ba'o// lha tshogs thams cad de ltar sgom// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs la// bstim bzhugs phyag dang mchod bstod bya// mchod dang gtor mas dus bzhir bskang// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni// mched lcam gsar pa dkyil 'khor bzhugs// rnying pa rnams la dam tshig mnan// dur khrod chas gsol rtags gdab bo// slob dpon yon dbul gtang rag gtang// sgrub pa chen po'i sngon 'gro yin// de nas phur pa'i sgrub pa ni// dbang drag las la rab tu 'jug/ dang po phur pa mang gsol la// phyi yi 'dzab 'di bzlas pa bya// oM pad+mo kI lI kI li yi sarba bag+hIn baM hUM phaT// stong rdzogs mchod pa byas

nas ni/ lha tshogs rnams ni gsal bar ba la// zhal nas sngags kyi sgra bzlas pas// snang sri da khro bo khro mo gang// dbang drag gnyis kyi las mdzad sgom// de nas 'phrin las rnams bzhi'iphur pa blang// phur pa mnga' gsol bstod pa bya// oM badzra kI lI kI li ya shan ting puSh+taM pa shang mA ra ya phaT// so so'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa dbul// de nas sgrub phur lha tshogs la// mchod bstod bsnyen pa so sor dbul// mngag phur nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// bstod cing bsnyen pa so sor dbul// de nas gdab phur byin brlab la// khro bo 'dus pa'i bsnyen 'dzab bgrang// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nan baM hU~M phaT// 'dzab bzlos stong rdzogs mchod bstod bya// bar der dgra bgegs/ dgug gzhug bya// mngag phur sngags la dgra bgegs dgug/ phur bskor byas la gdab phur dril// gang la dmigs pa de la gdab// oM badzra kI li nya kI la ya sha tri dza nri tri khug/ sems dang bag chags mA ra ya phaT// ces pa'i sngags kyis gdab// gang btab lha yang brlag par 'gyur// dgra bgegs gdug pa smos ci dgos// de ltar bsgrub pa bya ba ni// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma dang// bsnyen bsgrub dus kyi skabs dang sbyar// rtags byung dongs grub blang bar bya// phur pa rdzas kyi dbang bskur bya// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcod 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// sgrub pa chen po phur sgrub kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bsgrub pa'i skabs te bzhi pa'o// de nas pad+ma dbang chen la// gsung gi rdo rjes 'di skad gsol// e ma ho pad+ma dbang chen lags// 'phrin las las sbyor ji ltar lags// dbang chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor lo thun gyi las sbyor ni// dregs pa tshar gcod dkyil 'khor dbyings// mchod rdzas gzhung bzhin rgyas par bshams// de nas 'khor lo bca' ba ni// ro ras la ni 'khor lo bril// snag tsha dug khrag sbyar ba yi// smyug gu mi rkang gling bu yis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sngags re bri// oM pad+ma ma hA kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// rtsibs mtshan la ni 'khor lo'i sngags// che ge mo hri tsa kra mA ra ya hU~M phaT// ces pa bris nas ni// 'khor lo thod pa'i kha brgyad la// dkyil 'khor dbus su gru gsum du// nang du thod pa gzhug par bya// 'khor lo'i mtha' ma phur bas bskor// thun snod thod pa mtshan ngan du// dug khra ga bsres la nag por byug/ ling ka
