ming rus bcas pas// btsan du ga ra dug bong dug dang// dug sna rnam pa sna tshogs dang// ra khrag mi khrag khri khrag rta// khrag sna rnam pa sna tshogs dang// thod pa'i nang du sbyar la gzhag/ yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye

dang// drag po'i rdzas rnams 'tshogs par bsog/ thun sngags khri sngags 'khor lo sngags sbrel la// che ge mo sha truM u kha mA ra ya thun ya rbad/ thun snod nang du mang cing brab// thun gyis grub pa'i rtags su ni// rab ni thun tsheg me 'bar dang// du brlangs pa 'byung ba dang// 'od dang sgra dang dri 'byung ba'o// 'bring ni rmi rtags bzang po 'byung// tha ma zhag grangs bdun gsum sogs/ gang grub las kyi ming dang sbyar// de nas thun gyi 'phang thabs ni// sngon la 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan la// dgra bgegs ling kha bris pa de// mi bsad mtshon gyis btab nas ni// ling kha la ni phur pas gdab// rtsa sngags phur pa'i sngags 'dis brdeg/ che ge mo badzra kI li kI li mA ra ya mA ya ya hU~M phaT// ces pa phur pa gdab// ling ga gzhan yang phur pa gdab// dgra bgegs dngos su sgrol bar bsam// de nas thun gyis brdeg pa ni// nad kyi char pas myos brlag bsam// de nas thun de 'phang ba ni// drag po'i chas su zhugs nas kyang// che ge mo ma ra ya thun b+h+yo// zhes rtsa sngags gdags la// dgra la byed na yul phyogs sam// yul phyogs khyim la 'phang bar bya// bgegs la byed na gnod phyogs sam// bgegs de gnod pa'i sa ru 'phang// dgra bgegs myos shing brlag par bsam// gang la bya ba brtsad nas chod// ces gsungs so// 'khor lo thun gyi las sbyor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bsreg pa'i las sbyor bshad// drag po hom gyis bsreg pa ni// gang du drag po hom byed sar// sa glud gtor ma rgyas par gtang// yul gyi sa bdag lha klu la// gser skyems gtor ma btang nas ni// bar chad ma byed bka' bsgo bya// de nas hom khung bya thabs ni// dbang drag las la shis pa yis// mi bsad pa'am phung shul sa// de la dmar nag gru gsum bca'// tshad ni khru gang do'am ji rtsam rim bzhin bya// dug dang khrag dngas dmar gyi// nang du dmar nag byug par bya// nang du kha skyer me ris bskor// dur khrod thod pa mtshan nang du// nang du khrag gis ram bris la// thod pa'i nang du me ri bri// nang du dgra bgegs ling kha gzhug/ dug shing tsher ma can gyi shing// grir shi ba yi khrag la sogs// khrag sna dug sna sbyar la byug/ hom du dril la hom khung gzugs// me tshang bcas la me yang gzhug/ hom la dgra bgegs ling kha gdags// yam shing gdug pa'i shing rnams la// rtse mo'i ngos la 'bru mar byug/ rtsa ba ngos la khrag sna byug/ bsreg rdzas ling ro rnying pa dang// ling ka ming rus bris pa dang// drag po'i rdzas ni dug khrag dang// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang// shangs tshe dug tshe me tog dang// nas nag bra bo

sran ma dang// mar nag bsreg la g.yon du bzhag/ mchod rdzas gtor ma rag ta dang// bdud rtsi la sogs g.yas su bzhag/ de nas me yi sbar thabs ni// mi sdod dang ni yugs sa dang// mgar ba mig dmar khyim nas blang/ yang na gtsub shing lcags yag med// tha mal thab nas mi blang ngo// de nas sbyin sreg rim pa ni// lha dang me lha rnam pa gnyis// lha ni dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang// ye shes dgug cing mchod bstod bya// de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' bzhugs// dam tshig me lha bskyed pa dang// ye shes me lha spyan drang ba'o// dam tshig me lha bskyed pa ni// raM las me lha drang song mchog/ dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas g.yon me thab bgrang 'phreng bsnams// lto ba zlum po hom khung zhal// ra skyes kham pa chibs su chibs// dam tshig me lha bskyed nas ni// ye shes me lha spyan drangs bzhugs// me lha'i lto bar gzhal yas khang// mdun gyi lha tshogs lto bar dgug/ sngon la me la mchod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas phul nas ni// mjug la me lha mchod nas kyang// ye shes me lha lha tshogs gshegs// dam tshig me lha dkyil 'khor bsdu// hom khung mi dmigs stong par bsam// thal ba bsdus la rlung la phyar// cha gcig mnan pa byas nas ni// dpal gyi rta bro rab tu brdung// dgra bgegs ma lus tshar chod 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dbang gi drag po hom gyis bsregs la tshar bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mnan gzir bro yis tshar gcad pa// dgra yi mnan sa rnam pa drug/ rkang gcig shing dang rgya gram lam// lung gsum mdo dang dur khrod dang// brag dang chu 'thab chu gling ngo// bgegs kyis mnan pa rnam pa bzhi// stong za ma 'og dang them pa'i 'og/ mchod rten 'og dang gnod pa'i sa// gza' dang skar ma ngan pa dang// dus tshod tshes grangs ngan pa dang// zla ba mar gyi ngo la mnan// mnan pa'i snod ni rnam pa gnyis// dgra bo rabs chad thod pa'am// kho rang pha mes thod par mnan// bgegs kyi mnan pa'i snod la ni// rgyal po rta yi thod par mnan// klu ni sram dang byi ba'i mgo// bsen mo be ru'i nang du mnan// phung sri phag thod khyi thod do// phyung sri pha gu khyi gu'i mgo/ khyim sri blug ma'i nang du mnan// mnan pa'i 'khor lo bri ba ni// dgra la ro ras gro ga'am// bgegs la dug shing shog shog bya// snag tsha dang ni dug khrag sbyar// smyug gu mi rkang mi bsad mtshon// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la// rtsibs la sngags 'di bri bar bya// oM pad+ma mahA kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// rtsibs mchan mnan pa'i

sngags 'di bri// che ge mo u da na g+h+ri ha nanag dza bi bo ta ya// ma ra ya mA ra ya nan nan/ ces bri/ 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir rdo rje rgya gram bri// 'khor lo mnan pa bzhi yi snod du gzhug/ 'khor lo gnan pa'i thod par gzhug/ mi mthun rdzas ni dug khrag dang// gu gul nag po dug chu dang// thun brab rdzas dang ling ro dang// ling ka gsar pa bcas la gzhug/ thod pa re bas gril nas ni// kha nag phying kha log gis bcings// rta mchog lha tshogs bskyed nas ni// mchod pa bstod pa gzhung bzhin bya// pho nya gtang zhing dgug gzhug bya// gong gi sngags bzlas thun gyi brab// rta mgrin byin brlabs phur pas gdab// de nas gnan sa gang yin par// gru gsum dong brus dug khrag byug/ nang du mnan pa'i snod bcug la// sri khung chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang// chu srin kha ru bcug nas ni// bskal ba'i mthar yang thar mi bsam// ro g.yam rdo rje rgya gram bri// mnan khung kha ni gcad par bya// oM laM a laM hU~M laM gis// lan dgu bzlas la sa re byab// ri rib dgu brtsegs mnan pa bya// dpal gyi rta bro drag tu brdung// dgra bgegs gang la dmigs pa des// bskal pa'i mthar yang ldang mi nus// zhes gsungs so// rta mgrin dregs pa tshe gcod kyi rgyud las// gnan pa las sbyor gyis dgra bgegs tshar gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// drag sngags gsang bas tshar gcad pa// oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gri ba/ e a ra li/ hu lu hu lu/ heMhriM/ oM ta ki ni ta ki ni hU~M/ ta keM ta keM phaT// b+han d+ha b+han d+ha chom// tig snang tig snang chom/ rag sha rag sha hU~M// gar rdza gar rdza hU~M// tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M/ ha la ha la pha[ ]Ta/ rag sha rag sha hU~M// b+han d+ha b+han d+ha phaT// a mu kha dza/ badzra ka rug sha nan/ ma tang ka rug sha nan/ ma ra yu te kha ba ni ya ka hU~M/ sham pa ri sho ka ra tri ro ro tsat+ti kha/ ma ra yaM mu ra ti baM// a ka ru Ni sha/ pra tang ta mal/ ra tri sha pa kha/ zhung sni ni na ta kha ti/ a tri mu ra dza ya/ kre kreM shog ti ku du na ya du na ya/ smu ra laM smur laM// tang sha tang sha/ yag po dur/ yag mo dur// ra mar lcam// na ga ting ru ya// tsa ma ra ya/ tsi ma ra ya/ kro ta ni/ na ni pra la sha/ gi la ga li/ sla kraM me yug me yug me// hU~M hU~M phaT phaT[ ]// rbad rbad// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcad sdegs// rta mgrin skur bsgom gzir bar bya// gang la bya ba brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dgra bgegs drag sngags kyis tshar gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// 'phrin las las sbyor gyi skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas dbang chen rgyal po la// gsung gi rdo rjes 'di skad zhus// grub ba'i rtags dang mtshan ma

rnams// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// dbang chen rgyal po bka' stsal pa// bsnyen pa grub pa'i rtags bstan pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku mthong dang// mchod dang skor ba byed pa dang// nyi ma mgo la shar ba dang// mchod rten rtse la 'dug pa dang// gro khyer nyams dga' mthong ba dang// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma rgya gram dril bu dang// rnyed nas bcangs dang lus la thim// khung bas bcud 'thung me tog zos// ming dang 'dus pas phyag 'tshal dang// rmis ltas byung na tha ma yin// dngos su sku mthong 'od dang sgra// sku dang phur pa brdeg pa rab// bsgrub rdzas gtor ma khol pa 'bring// sgrub pa grub pa'i rtags bstan pa// nyams sam rmi lam dngos su ni// dung chen 'bud dang rnga chen brdung// gdugs 'bubs rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba dang// gangs dkar rtse la 'dug pa dang// ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang// bud med 'dul bas bskor ba dang// sgrub rdzas mchod rdzas rten rdzas dang// 'od dang sgra dang du ba 'thon// khol dang rlabs pa 'byung ba ni// sgrub pa tshar du grub pa yin// las sbyor grub pa'i rtags bstan pa// gang la dmigs pa zhugs nas kyang// gsod gcod las rnams byed pa dang// glang stag sems can ma rungs brdung// 'khrul 'khor bskor dang mtshon char 'bebs// sgyogs 'phen mda' mdung 'debs pa ni// 'khrul 'khor thun gyi las grub rtags// me chen gtong dang hom nag sbor// dung 'bud rnga brdung rol mo dkrol// drag po hom gyi las grub rtags// dgra bgegs brdungs nas btson dong bcug/ mchod rten rtsig dang mkhar spai brtsigs// mnan pa grub pa'i rtags su bshad// ma grub rang la ngan pa ni// dmag 'dren phar lam tshud na// mtshon cha so ni med pa dang// 'thabs kyang rang la grogs med dang// khu lhogs rang la 'ong ba'i rtags// khral 'dod rang yang ltog pa dang// slong du 'ong ngang sgo brdung dang// gtor ma dus las yol ba'i rtags// yugs sa mdze can gnyer 'khros dang// yul ngan kha ba bu yug dang// 'dam rdzab du ba mun nag dang// sa blangs rnam khrag mun pa dang// nyams grib mi gtsang phog pa'i rtags// bshags pa bya zhing bskang so bya// zhes gsungs so// mtshan ma rtags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dam tshig bshad bya ba// dregs pa tshar gcod dkyil 'khor du// slob ma dbang bskur byed 'dod na// dben zhing dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// mtshams bcad sa yi cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bzhengs nas ni// bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs dgram// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams bya// rnam

gsum ting 'dzin gzhal yas khang// dam tshig lha tshogs bskyed nas ni// spyan drangs bstim dang phyag 'tshal dang// snyan pa 'phrin la sa rdzogs par bya// de nas dbang bskur dkyil 'khor la// chag chag skyang nul byas nas ni// sta gon dri yi thig le bya// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod rdzogs nas// slob ma khrus byas gsol gdab bzung// so shing byin la bsrung sku dag dgas// sku sha gdags la rmi lam brtag/ chos bshad skyabs 'gro sems bskyed 'bog/ de nas thig gdab tshon bri ste// dkyil 'khor rgyan dgod mchod rdzas bsog/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor las gzhung bsrang// gnas su dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bskyed// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag mchod bya// 'dzab bskor bstod sogs byas nas ni// slob ma 'jug pa'i las rdzogs nas// bum pa dbang bskur sgrib pa bkru// dur khrod chas brgyad dbang bskur la// khro bo'i rtags gdab lha dbang bskur// de nas sgrub rdzas phur ba'i dbang// mchod rdzas gtor ma bdud rtsi dang// rak+ta tshogs dang dngos grub rdzas// tshe la sogs pas dbang bskur la// bkra shis brjod cing dngos grub blang// dngos grub rdzas la rol bar bya// ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsrung// smon lam btab la slob ma dgye// ma smin pa rnams smin par byed// phyin chad 'khor bar logs mi 'gyur// sku gsung thugs la rab gnas ni// spyan drangs mchod bstod dbang dang mtshungs// sku rten gsung rten thugs rten la// zhu bstim bya zhing shis pa brjod// spyan dbye sku bsil rten 'brel brjod// dbang bskur bya zhing rdzas la rol// ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsrung// smon lam gdab cing bsngo ba bya// zhes gsungs so// dbang bskur rab gnas kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas dam tshig bsrung thabs bshad// sku yi dam tshig bsrung thabs ni// rdo rje slob dpon mi smad cing// ngan sems mi skye bka' mi bcag/ gsung gi dam tshig yi dam lha// sngags dang snying po rgyun mi bcad// rgyud kyi don la log sems spangs// chos nyid don la tshad ma yin// rig pas dpag par bya ba min// thugs kyi dam tshig skye med don// rtogs pas nyams su blangs nas ni// gsang chos dbang bskur ma thob la// mi bsgrag mi bstan sba bar bya// rdo rje dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// 'chad dbang ma bskur rgyud mi bshad// gsang spyod phyi ru mi bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig 'di// nyams na bskal pa gcig gnyis gsum// rdo rje dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// thun mong spyi yi dam tshig tu// bla ma bskur dang lus ngag yid// dad gus mos pa rgyun mi bcad// lha dang sngags la sogs pa la// thun bzhi'i rnal

'byor nyams mi bya// sems can rnams la byams pa dang// snying rje sems bskyed rgyud la bskyed// mchedalcam rnam la rtse gdungs bskyed// lha dang sngags la the tshom spong// nga rgyal rlom sems phrag dog dang// dug gsum nyon mongs khar mi btang// le lo long yod snyoms las dor// brtson 'grus rim gyis nyams su blangs// gsang sngags lta spyod zung du 'brel// bsnyen bsgrub gzhung bsrang mtha' ru dbyung// khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig ni// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// thog ma med nas rang gi sems// ye nas rang byung chos sku la// dam tshig bsrung med nyams pa med// mi bsrung byas nas bzhag pa med// dam tshig bsrung dang mi bsrung dang// nyams pa'i skyon med 'bras bu med// ma spangs mtha' brel gzung 'dzin med// bde chen zung du med pas dam// rnam rtog chos nyid ngang du tshig/ dam tshig gzhan las khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// rtags dang dbang dam tshig gi skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas pad+ma dbang chen la// gsung gi rdo rjes 'di skad zhus// e ma pad+ma dbang chen yab// bdun tshigs ro bsregs mnab bsrung dbab dang bcang ba dang// 'khrul 'khor la sogs ji ltar lags// dpa' bo dpal chen bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// dbang chen pad+mas bka' stsal pa// bdun tshigs bya ba'i las rim ni// stod kyi khog dbug bar gyi gzhung bsrang dang// smad kyi las mthun bsdu ba'o// ro bsreg bya ba'i las rim ni// ro chas bzhugs dang thab shing brtsig/ dkyil 'khor bris rdzas dgod gzhung bsrang dang// mchod 'bul lam bstan smon lam mo// sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rim ni// zhi rgyas dbang drag thab khung ni// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang// gru gsum la sogs gang byed bca'// dkar ser dmar nag kha dog byug/ las dang rjes 'thun shing brtsig ste// las dang mthun pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams// 'phrin las gnas skabs gang byed sbyar// 'phrin las gzhung bsrang thab khung nang// me lha bskyed pa mchod bstod bya// lto bar lha bskyed bsreg rdzas 'bul// lha bskyed cho ga gzhung bsrang la// mchod sbyin rdzogs par byas nas ni// shan ting puSh+tiM pa shang dang// mA ra ya phaT rtsa sngags sbrel// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang yin grub// ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu// sbyin sreg shul la rta bro brdung// thal brgya gram lam du mnan// yang na rlung la 'phyar bar bya// de nas mnan pa bya ba ni// dgra bgegs rnam pa gnyis yin te// dgra bo klu la gtad de mnan// grog shog shog dag la ni// dgra bo'i

ling kha bris nas ni// glang dmar rwar bcug la chas bsdam// sa bdag klu gnyan gnas sar mnan// nA gA ra dza khug snying la phril phril dza// zhes pas klu la gtad// zha dang 'khums dang mdze yis khyer// bgegs kyi mnan pa bya ba ni// grog shog shog gang rnyed la// gang gnod bgegs kyi ling kha bri// ming dang nan bcas lto bar bri// thod pa mtshan ngan nang du gzhug/ gang la bya ba dgug gzhug bya// thod pa la chas kha bcad la// re bas dril la khar nag bsdam// rgya gram lam mam stong zam sngas// mchod rten ring po'i 'og tu mnan// oM laM tra dzi// gnod byed kyi lus rnams bar chings shig/ nan NaN/ a lam tri dza gnod byed lus rnam par chings shig/ hU~M laM tri dza gnod byed yid rnam par chings shig/ nan NaN/ ces pas mnan cing gzir par bya// dpal gyi rta bro drag tu brdung// bskal ba'i mtha' yang mi btang mnan// zhes gsungs so// bsreg mnan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas dbab bcad las bshad pa// dbab pa ser ba chad pa gnyis// ser ba da bab pa'i las byas na// bse khab dmar po kha sbyor du// sbal pa sdig pa rmig pa rmig bu'i mgo/ sram dang nya yi sha khrag dang// ba dmar dkar 'o ma blugs// yungs kar yungs nag gu gul la// thun bcas de la sngags kyis sgrub// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa// sngags 'di bzlas la gzir bar bya// na mo bud d+ha yo// oM badzra kA li ki li ya na ga du/ tsan d+ha tsan d+he/ mi li mi li// nA ga du hU~M phaT// 'bum phrag bzlas la lha klu gzir// sa ma ya ra dza du sha ga ra// tsa du ling shag traM phroM hril shar phob// nA ga lha mo klu mo ya ma dam sri me// traM phroM ma hril shar phob// ces bzlas la/ thun la btab la bsgrub ba bya// grub rtags dngos su rangal 'bab// bse gab rdzas ni klu yod pa'i// chu mig nang du blug par bya// seng ldem phur pas chu mig gdab/ thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// chu 'khyags ser pas yul mkhar 'joms// de nas char ba dbab pa bshad// klu yod gnas su song nas ni// ba yi rnam lnga'i maN+Dal bya// klu sman bdud rtsi'i mchod pa bshams// bag phye klu sman bsres pa yis// ril bu zangs gzhong 'khar gzhong bkang// ri lu re la stong tsho re// sngags 'di bzlas shing chu mig blug/ oM na ga pu tra ti badzra du na ti/ mi li mi li swAhA/ char phob/ oM nag shu li ni swAhA// zhes pas/ sngags 'bum bzlas shing chu mig blug/ ril bu chu mig gar yod blug/ char pa phebs par gdon mi za// gal te des kyang ma phebs na// gong gi seng ldeng phur bas sngags// phur pa la ni drag tu mngag/ nA ga rA dza char phob// ces bzlas shing chu mig nang du gdab// da lta nyid du char pa

'bab// ces gsungs so// ser ba dang char dbab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcad pa bstan pa ni// ser ba srung ba'i yul khams su// mchod dang sbyin gtor rgya chen bya// phur pa bcu la sngags bris gdags// rab gnas byin brlabs mchod pa bya// oM badzra dun de// mi li mi li/ phye shag phye shag swAhA/ zhes bzlas par// phur bu bcu dang mtho yis bskor// ser sprin 'dus na lha bsgoms la// sngags bzlas nam mkha' phu yis gdab// sdigs mdzub bsgreng la ri mo bya// ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// char dang chu ni bzlog 'dod na// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sngags 'di bzlas pa 'bum du bya// na mo bud d+ha ya// oM badzra kI yi ki la ya// na ga du tsan d+he tsan d+he// mi li mi li/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ na ga ni swAhA/ nA ga ma la shi pra du/ na ga ma la shig swAhA/ bar chad tshar gcod chu bzlog ces bzlas shwa dang 'od kha bzlog 'dod na// zangs sam lcags la 'brug gzugs bya// sngags bzlas chu snar sbas pas bzlog/ ces gsungs so// char chu ser ba bcad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// bsre mnan dbab bcad gnyis kyi skabs te bdun pa'o//// de nas 'khrul 'khor las bshad pa// dang po bsrung ba'i khrul 'khor ni// shog shog gtsang ma dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris byas la// tha ma mu khyud rdo rje dang// meri gnyis kyis bskor bar bya// rtsibs la rtsa sngags bri bar bya// oM pad+ma ma hwa kro d+ha ha yagr-i pa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// rtsibs mchan sngags 'di bri bar bya// krod+ha pra be sha phaT// tshal pa tshal pa/ dum bu dum bu hU~M phaT// dbus kyi lte ba gang bsrung la rak+Sha rak+Sha hri zhes pa bri/ maN+Dal steng gzhag byin gyis brlabs// mchod bstod byas la lus la gdags// yang na tshon skud rnam lnga la// mdud pa byas la sngags bzlas la// rdo rje 'phreng bar bsam la gdags// 'gro ba pho mo si 'u la// btags pa tsam gyis gnod pa bsrungs// klu la sogs pa'i gdon zin na// zangs gzhong 'khar gzhong nang du ni// klu gzugs sna tshogs bcug nas ni// klu gtor klu sman mchod par 'bul// nA ga ra dza sarba a mr-i ta ba ling ta swAhA/ zhes pas mchod cing 'bul// nad pa'i lus la sma byas byab// klu gdon sa ru yas thag bskyal// klu yi gdon las thar bar byed// bskrad pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// rtsa sngags bkod la ming bcug la// che ge mo u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT// ces bri// phyi rim rlung gi ri mo bri// gang gnod sa ru sbas pa na// phyi nas gnon pa byed mi nus// de nas tshe yi sgrub pa ni// tshe chang sman dang rdzas blug ste// maN+Dal steng bzhag byin gyis

brlab// 'jig rten khams kyi tshe bkug nas// rtsa sngags sham bur tshe sgrub pa// A yu badzra she yu bruM a// gnas skabs sgrub pa grangs dang sbyar// bstod cing tshe ni bum par bstim// gang la bya ba de la ni// tshe bstim tshe dbang bskur bar bya// bcu las mi thub brgya thub 'gyur// tshe nyams tshe zad stong thub 'gyur// de nas sman gyi sgrub pa bshad// sa chog bya zhing sta gon bya// dkyil 'khor 'phrin las gzhung bsrang la// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i 'phrin las bya// rjes kyi cho ga rdzogs par bya// sman bla drang srong rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// ces gsungs so// bsrung gos sman gyi tshe sgrub sman sgrub kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs patshar gcod kyi rgyud las// skabs brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// pad+ma dbang chen sku la bstod// nub phyogs snang ba mtha' yas zhing khams nas// bcom ldan dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ dbang gi rgyal po dbang la mnga' mdzad pa// 'khor ba dbang sdud thugs rje spyan ras gzigs// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pa dang// pad+ma dbang chen dpal rta mgrin gnyis su med par gyur te/ dpal rta mgrin gyis rta skad thengs gsum bton// rta bro 'khor gsum brdungs te khams gsum dbang du bsdus// srid gsum zil gyis mnan nas// dregs pa can thams cad tshar gcad de// hri hU~M/ nga ni dbang chen he ru ka// nga ni rta mgrin khros pa'i sku// rta skad thengs gcig gnam la tsher// steng gi lha rnams dbang du sdud// rta skad thengs gcig bar snang khams su tsher// lha srin sde brgyad dbang du sdud// rta skad theng gcig 'og tu tsher// 'og gi klu rnams 'bub cing brgyal// rta skad theng gcig phyogs bcur sgrogs// phyogs skyong dregs pa zhabs 'og gzir// dpa la gyi rta skad tshe re re// khro ba'i hU~M sgra 'brug stong ldir// phaT kyi thogs dang gnam lcags 'bebs// sbubs kyi lcags pas khams gsum g.yo// shangs kyi rlung gi srid gsum g.yo// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs stong gsum ldir// ljags las glog byung bar snang 'khyug/ spyan nas chu 'byung srid pa 'khru// zhal nas mche gtsigs skye shi sgrol// sma ra me 'bar gdug pa bsreg/ phyag ni mtshon chas dgra bgegs sgrol// zhabs kyi rta grol dregs pa 'dul// rta bro 'khor gsum chems se chems// rta bro thabs gcig dang po yis// gzugs med srid pa rtse nas gnon// rta bro 'khor gnyis bar ma yis// gzugs khams bcu bdun zil gyis gnon// rta bro 'khor gsum tha ma yis// 'dod khams nyi shu zhabs 'og gnon// rol ba'i rta bro brdungs ba yis// lha srin sde brgyad dbang bsdus nas// dregs pa gdug pa'i

tshogs rnams brgyan// dpal gyi rta bro rgo ro ro// khro bo'i gar thabs logs se logs// bro ni dregs pa 'dul ba'i bro// glu ni dbang du sdud pa'i glu// tshig ni don dam chos kyi tshig/ zhabs g.yas thabs kyis bro brdungs pa// khro bo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// zhabs g.yon shes rab bro brdungs pas// khro mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// rol ba'i rta bro brdungs pa yis// dregs pa bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms// hri hri hri/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT// ces dpal rta mgrin gyi brtul zhugs drag po'i bro brdungs pas// dregs pa can rnams thams cad la lal bsgyel// la la brgyal// la la rengs// la la lus sems tshar bcad nas// dpal gyi zhabs 'og tu 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen rta mgrin gyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rgyud chen dregs pa tshar gcod rgyud// spyan ras gzigs dbang khros pa na// rta mchog rgyal po'i sku ru sprul// dregs pa gdug pa 'dul ba dang// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub ster// nor bu lta bur dgos 'dod 'byung// yon tan byin brlabs zad mi shes// rgyud 'di 'dus pa'i 'khor la gtad// bstan pa'i snying po thub par srungs// zhes gsungs so// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// dregs pa dbang du sdu ba dang gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// mjug bstod pa rta bro dang gtad pa'i skabs te dgu pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i skabs dgu pa rdzogs// rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du// shrI ha ya gr-i ba tan tra ya de nA ma// bod skad du/ dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par dag pa// pad+ma rigs kyi pho brang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa na// 'khor spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang khro bo dang// khro mo dang// sbrul pa dang/ yang sprul gyi lha tshogs dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe pad+ma gsung gi dbang phyug gis// pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag btsal bskor ba byas nas ni// e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// pad+ma dbang gi rgyud chen po// bsnyen sgrub la sogs bcas pa rnams// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa

dang// dpal rta mgrin yum gsang ba'i ye shes dang// sras pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang// sras mo pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang// yab yum sras dang bcas pa bzhengs nas// dbang gi rta skad thengs gsum gyis khams gsum dbang du bsdus// srid gsum zil gyis mnan nas dregs pa can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur to// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas le// gsung gi dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces zhus so// dbang chen lha bzhi'i bsgrub pa la// dang po bsnyen pa ji lta bya// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas bka' stsal pa// dad dang snying rje brtson 'grus can// pad+ma dbang chen sgrub 'dod pas// dben zhing yid 'ong nyams dga' bar// sa bdag klu gnyan zhi bya'i phyir// mchod sbyin gtor ma rgyas par btang// bkra shis legs pa'i sa blangs la// maN+Dal zla gam gru bzhi bya// dri sna'i skyang nul legs byas la// me tog dmar po'i tshom bu dgram// rta mgrin sku gsung thugs kyi rten// mchod rdzas phyi nang bshams nas ni// bde ba'i sten la 'dug byas nas// thog mar byang chub sems bskyed la// rten la tshogs sogs mchod par bya// tshad med rnam bzhi sngon btang la// skad cig stong ba'i ngang las kyang// rta mgrin sku ru gsal byas la// thugs kha nyi dal hriHbsam la// hri yi 'od zer hU~M 'phros pas// rdo rje phra mo'i 'phro 'du las// phyogs mtshams rdo rje'i rtsig pa la// steng 'og rdo rje'i gur dang sa// srid pa'i rlung gis mi thar sgom// phyi rim bskal ba'i me ri sgom// de ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o// de nas thugs ka'i hri las ni// yi ge smug nag brum 'phros pas// rin chen sna lnga gzhal yas khang// sgo bzhi rgyan dang bcas par sgom// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// hri yi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// bde gshegs mchod cing 'gro don bya// tshur 'dus gser gyi rdo rjer gyur// de yi 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba las// bdag nyid rta mgrin skur bsgoms te// sku mdog dmar po bye ru 'dra// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang zhu 'tsher// g.yas g.yon dang po yum la 'khyud// dbang sdud phyag rgya gdengs pa'o// g.yas g.yon rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// dbu rgyan rin chen rigs lngas brgyan// sbrul dang thod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// zhabs bzhi nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gsang ba ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// dmar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// g.yas g.yon dang po yab la 'khyud// g.yas kyi 'og ma gri gug la// g.yon gyi 'og ma thod khrag stob// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum yab la 'khril// rus

pa'i rgyan drug sku la brgyan// yab yum gnyis kyi zhabs 'og na// mkha' 'gro rigs bzhis 'degs par sgom// yab yum gnyis med dbu gtsug na// sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas ni// sprul sku mnyam gzhag sku mdog dmar// rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab sgom// thugs khar 'jig rten dbang phyug ni// sku mdog dmar po pad+ma 'dzin// ye shes sems dpa'i tshul du sgom// de nas yab kyi thugs ka nas// hU~M dmar g.yas phyogs 'phros pa la// pad+ma gar dbang sku mdog dmar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje pad+ma bsnams// zhabs gnyis nyi zla pad+ma la'o// yum gyi thugs kha'i hU~M las g.yon// pad+ma gar gyi dbang mo yum// g.yas pa gri khug g.yon thod pa// zhabs gnyis nyi zla pad+ma'o// yab yum bzhi yi skur sgom la// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// srid gsum las la 'khor ba bsgom// de nas ye shes lha bzhi pa'o// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la// gnyis su med par gzhug cing bstim// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod pa bya// de nas bsnyen pa 'bul ba ni// oM pad+ma d+ha ra hU~M// dbu gtsug snang ba mtha' yas kyi// thugs las 'od zer dkar po 'phros// oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M// thugs ka'i spyan ras gzigs dbang gi// thugs kha'i 'od zer dmar po 'phro// oM pad+ma ta kri da hU~M// sku yi snying po 'bru drug pa// oM ha ya gr-i ba hU~M// gsung gi snying po 'bru drug pa'o// oM ma hA kro d+ha hU~M/ thugs kyi snying po 'bru drug pa'o// oM ha ri ni sa hU~M// yum mkha' 'gro'i snying po 'bru drug pa'o/ yab yum bzhi yi thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer dmar nag 'phros// phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa la// sngags kyi 'od zer phog pa yis// sku gsung thugs la mnyes mchod 'bul// khams gsum 'gro drug sems can la// 'od zer phog pas sgrib pa sbyangs// pad+ma dbang gi lhar gyur nas// kun kyang rang sngags sgrogs par sgom// dus kyi bsnyen pa zhag zla lo// ji tsam 'grub par bsgrub par bya// grangs kyi bsnyen pa brgya stong khri// ji tsam 'grub dang dam bcar bzung// mtshan ma 'grub pa lta yi rtags// sku rtags 'od dkar nyams dga' dang// gsung rtags sgra snyan sgrog pa dang// thugs rtags dri zhim 'byung ba dang// sku rtags lha yi zhal ston dang// gsung rtags lung ston chos 'chad dang// thugs rtags chos nyid rtogs par 'char// sku rtags lus kyi nad sos dang// gsung rtags ngag la nus pa 'byung// thugs rtags dug lnga khong du song// de ltar rtags rnams thon par sgrub// ces gsungs so// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// bsnyen pa'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgrub pa'i

rim pa bstan pa ni// dkyil 'khor mtha' dgang gru bzhi la// chag chag skyang nul legs byas la// gzhung bzhin legs par thig btab ste// dkyil 'khor dbus su zla gam la// mu khyud zla kham dmar po 'od zer 'phro// gru chad sgro bzhi phyogs dang bcas// sgo rgyan mu khyud rdo rje me ris bskor// dbus su mtshan ldan dum bu bzhi pa ru// pad+ma mtshan dang khrag bsres la// mtha' ma zhi khro'i sngags kyis bskor// nang du sman dang rin chen dang// 'bru sna lnga la sogs pa blug/ dngos grub ci 'dod gsol byang gzhug/ le rgan dar du dril nas ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su stegs la bzhag/ gtor ma rak+Sha bdud rtsi dang// mchod rdzas rgyas par bshams nas ni// tshogs dang dngos grub ci 'dod gsol// 'byor pa'i yo byad ci phyir dgram// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi lha sgom dang// ye shes dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang// bstod pa la sogs byas nas ni/ bzlas pas ting 'dzin sngags bstan pa// oM pad+ma ri ni hU~M// oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M// oM pad+maM ta krid hU~M// oM ha ya gri ba hU~M// oM ma hA krod+ha hU~M// oM ha ri ni sa hU~M// oM du ma ga ye na ma swAhA/ zhais bzlas pas bdag nyid rta mgrin thugs ka nas// nyi ma'i steng hri 'phros pas// spyan tsug snang ba mtha' yas la// 'od kyi thugs dam rgyud kyang bskul// snang ba mtha' yas thugs ka nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs khar spros// thugs dam rgyud bskul mnyes byas nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kha nas// dpa' bo rta mgrin thugs khar phog/ rta mgrin thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// gsang ba ye shes thugs khar phog/ yum gyi thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// zhabs 'og mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskul// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi'i thugs ka nas// 'od zer 'phros pas 'jig rten khyab// mi dang lha dang mkha' 'gro dang// zas dang sman dang nor dang 'bru// stong gsum thams cad bcud bsdus nas// thod pa'i nang du gang bar sgom// 'od dang du ba'i re rnyed dang// ro zhim mang du 'phel ba dang// rmi lam nor dang zas rnyed dag/ mi mang zas nor 'bul ba dang// mi mang phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur byed// kun gyi gtso bor dbang bskur dang// glu bro gar gyi sna 'dren dang// chos gter rnyed dang nor rnyed dang// rtags thon dngos grub blang bar bya// rtsa sngags rnams kyi mjug la ni// sid d+hi sid d+hi hU~M/ bsdus bsdus hU~M hU~M/ zhes bzlas pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha rnams kyis ni gsol bar sgom// dngos grub rdzas la phud spros la// ye shes lha rnams mchod par bya// de nas rang dang sgrub grogs bza'// thod par dngos grub rdzas lhag bcad// rang dang mi 'brel rtag tu bcang//

phyis kyis sgrub pa'i rten rdzas bya// mi la mi bstan spa bar bya// rgyun du mkha' 'gro'i snying po bzlas// bdag nyid rta mgrin yab yum gyi// zhabs nas mkha' 'gro rnam bzhis 'degs// 'gro ba dbang du sdud pas sgom// lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// sgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas bzlas sbyor bshad par bya// drag sngags dregs pa 'dul ba ni// oM pad+maM ta kri ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod sngags// ya ma staM pa ya// gshin rje tshar bcad yig 'bru lnga// ma tsa staM pa ya// rgyal po tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// tre'u shu staM pa ya// the'u 'gong tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// shu la staM ba ya// btsan gyi tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// d+ha ba staM pa ya// lha yi tshar gcod yi ge 'bru lnga// a se la staM pa ya/ sman gyi tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// dug khrag staM pa ya/ bdud kyi char gcod yig 'bru lnga// rag sha staM pa ya/ srin po tshar gcod yi ge 'bru lnga// yak+sha staM pa ya/ gnod sbyin tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// ka la staM pa ya/ 'gong po tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// mun mun staM pa ya/ dmu yi tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// tir ti staM pa ya// mu stegs tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// yaM ti staM pa ya// dam sri tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// na ga staM pa yaklu gdon tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga/ ke ta staM pa ya// gza' rnams tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// b+hu ta staM ba ya/ 'byung po tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// mu ka staM pa ya/ pho 'dre tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// lang skuM staM pa ya/ mo 'dre gnod byed tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// pre ta staM pa ya// yi dgas shin 'dre tshar gcod yig 'bru lnga// sarba staM pa ya/ gnod bgegs thams cad yi ge lnga// pa tsa ya/ da ha ya/ ha na ya/ hri hri/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ dregs pa thams cad tshar gcod sngags// bskrun dang// bcings dang// brdung ba dang// bcad pa dang/ gdul ba dang/ brlag pa dang/ dbang du sdu dang/ tshar bcad dang// dgos kyi 'dul na rtsa sngags la// so so'i srog snying sham bu sngags// bsres la bzlas shing tshar gcad bya// spyiru thams cad tshar gcod dril// srid pa'i lha 'dre thams cad kun// dbang du 'dus nas bka' nyan dang// tshar gcod brlag par the tshom med// ces gsungs so// gnod byed gdon bgeg tshar gcod pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas las sbyor bshad pa ni// bsad pa 'brupa khung las sbyor ni// 'brub khung nang du ling ka gzhug/ seng ldeng phur pa khro bor bsam// sha truM a mu kha ma ra ya hU~M phaTasod// phur pa gdab cing thun kyang bra ba// gang la bya ba brlag par 'gyur// sbyin sreg me yi las sbyor ni// thab khung dmar nag gru gsum du// gdug pa can gyi shing brtsigs la// bkra mi shis pa'i

me sbar te// me nang rta mgrin bskyed byas la// sbar dkar gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa 'bul// dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM// ma ra ya/ ma ra ya hU~M phaT// rtsa sngags sbrel la sbyin sreg bya// thal ba bskul la mnan gtor bya// gtor srang rlung gi las sbyor ni// sbyin sreg thal ba nya bo bya// snying khar ming rus bcu pa la// rlung tshubs ma yis thun du brab// brag sgra rlung sgra can du mnan// yang na btags la rlung la phyar// che ge mo ka ma rag sha ya ra na// u tsa ta ya phaT phaT/ tsa sngags sbrel la bzlas pa bya// dgra bgegs gang byas bskrad par 'gyur// mnan pa sa yi las sbyor ni/ kho yi zag pa'i rdzas btsal la// sa nag bsres la nya bo bya// ming rus bris la ling khar gzhug/ snying khar phur bu btab nas ni// thod pa mtshan ngan nang du gzhug/ re bas dril la mkhar nag dkri// lha khang them 'og rgya gram lam// mchod rten snying po'i nang du mnan// che ge mo a mu kaM/ oM ku a dza/ mA ra ya nan/ ro g.yas rdo rje rgya gram dang// tsha tsha sa tshon rnam lnga mnan// lcags kyi khar sgrom 'bar ba nas// bskal pa'i mthar yang mi thar bsam// dgra bgegs gang yang gnon par 'gyur// sbyong byed chu yi 'khor lo ni/ kham pa rdol byas pa yis// gru gsum ga'u kha sbyor du// chu 'gram sa la gzugs byas la// snying khar gru gsum ming rus gzhug/ gang tsher bcug la la chas bsngam// baM ni mA ra ya sod sod/ baM ni mA ra ya thum ril/ li li dzi dza/ mtsho 'am chu mig chu gzhung bskyur// dgra bgegs gang yin rtsa ba 'chad// zlog pa zor gyi las sbyor ni// thod pa mtshan ngan nang du ni// khrag sna dug sna zangs lcags rdo// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang// de la sngags la thun du brab// sbod gtong gtong ba'i rkang rjes sa// mchil snabs dang ni dri chen chu// snying khar mchog phur btab byas na// ban d+he sha ya ban d+he sha ya/ che ge mo ha ha staM ba ya bzlog bzlog/ sha traM a mu kha mA ra ya bzlos sod// thod pa mtshan ngan nya bo bcas// rang gi mal 'og mnan par bya// thun rdzas dgra yi phyogs su 'phang// phur kha sbod gtong kho la bzlog/ bsrung ba'i 'khoralo'i las sbyor ni// gro ga'am ni shog bu la// gur kum g+hi hang mtshal gyis bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// rim gsum pad+ma 'dab drug bri// dbus su rta mgrin sku yi sngags// rtsibs drug la ni gsung gi sngags// rtsibs mchan drug la thugs kyi sngags// phyi rol pad+ma yum gyi sngags// phyi rol thugs rje chen po'i sngags// phyi rol snang ba mtha' yas sngags// phyi rol rta mgrin yab yum sngags// 'khor lo rab gnas byin brlabs bya// la char dpung pa g.yon par gdags// bsrung skud dmar

po sngags bzlas gdags// nad dang gnod dang bar chad thul// dgra bgegs brdung ba'i las sbyor ni// rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa// rta mgrin sngags kyis byin brlabs la// sa la dgra bgegs gzugs bris la// yang na lcags kyi tho bas brdungs// yang na rdo rje tho bas brdungs// lo ka log tri sa la tri phung// e ka thum ril// rmi sha thun ril// gam gu ru/ ro rtsa thum ril/ gam gu ru A be sha ya a be sha ya/ dgra bgegs gnod byed thum ri li li/ mA ra ya dza dza/ gnod byed rdul du brlag par 'gyur/ gdab pa phur pa'i las sbyor ni// zangs sam 'khar ba'i phur pa la// seng ldeng phur pa khru gang pa// rta mgrin skur bskyed dbang bskur la// rang dang mi 'bral sngas su gzhug/ sri'u nad pa la sogs pa// lngas su bsrung ba byas pa ni// oM pad+ma kro d+ha ha ya grib hu lu hu lu pad+ma kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT// ces pa bzlas pa byas la byin gyis brlab par bya// bgegs la gdengs pa tsam gyis chog/ las kyi sbyor ba de rnams la// rtsa sngags grub par rab tu gces// bdag nyid rta mgrin skur bsgoms la// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang du bsdus// gang la bya ba gzir byas la// gnod bgegs thams cad bsrungs nas 'byin// ces gsungs so// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// 'phrin las las sbyor gyi skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas la// pad+ma gsung gi dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces bstod do// chos sku skye med ngang las ma g.yos par// gzugs sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan nas// sbrul sku dregs pa 'joms mdzad rgyud bshad pa// ngo mtshar sangs rgyas khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pa byas so// de nas pad+ma sangs rgyas kyis// 'khor rnams kun la rgyud bshad pas// rta mchog rgyal po'i rgyud 'di ni// bstan pa nyams pa'i dus 'di ru// bdud dang dregs pa dgra bgegs rnams// tshar gcod don du ngas bshad do// gtad do 'dus pa'i 'khor la gtad// ces gsungs so// gtso bo chos nyid la gnas nas// 'khor rnams rang sar 'khod de// rgyud gtad pa'i le'u skabs lnga pa'o//// rta mgrin dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// thugs rje chen po bsgrub pa la// bar chad bgegs rnams tshar bcad phyir// rta mgrin khro bo'i rgyud bsgyur nas// sbasbyaskrespail ba'i gnas med gter du sbas// las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/ bar chad dam sri thul bar shog/ bkra shis dngos grub 'byung bar shog/ bstan pa yun du rgyas par shog/ rgya rgya rgya////

rgya gar skad du/ ha ya gri wa i thi ta na tra nA ma/ bod skad du// rta mgrin gsang rgyud ces bya ba// dpal pad+ma dbang chen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ri'i rgyal po ta la'i gnas na// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te// 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag stong dang bcas nas// bsam pa dang ldan pas snyoms par mdzad do// dus de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces glengs so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khamasa'adi na bdud ma krang ka ru tra zhes bya ba/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gi gsang sngags las gol te/ mthu ni che sems can can thams cad la gnod pas 'di ji ltar mdzad ces pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pas 'di gdul snyam ste// thugs la dgongs nas de'i dus na// bdud de ni sngon dge slong thar pa nag po// sku mahA de ba/ gsung tshangs pa/ thugs khyab 'jug/ yon tan gyi sprul pa gnod sbyin rta mgo/ 'khor klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong dang ldan no// de 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyis sbrul ba bkye ste// thar pa nag po 'dul ba dpal he ru kar bzhengs// ma hA de ba 'dul ba pad+ma he ru kar bskos// tshangs pa 'dul ba la yag sha me dpal du bzhengs// thugs khyab 'jug 'dul ba la phyag na rdo rjes bskos// yon tan rta mgos 'dul ba la rta'i dbu bstan// 'khor sa gdon 'dul ba la gnyen po bya khyung bzhengs so// 'phrin las sa ru ta 'dul ba la ming srid brgyad bzhengs so// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul par mdzad pas// bdud de rnams yid mi bde ste mya ngan skye nas// sbrul pa 'gran pas ma thub ste// g.yas kyi rta skad kyis ma mo dang mkha' 'gro bsdus// g.yon gyi rta skad thang gcig gis yal kham can la dngos grub ster// dbus kyi rta skad kyis dngos grub rnams bsdus te// sku'i sbrul pas yang thugs rje chen po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dang/ zhal bcu gcig pa dang/ phyag stong spyan stong pa dang// gsung gi sbrul pa rta skad rnams sprul lo// thugs kyi sprul pas khro bo rta mgrin nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dang// zhal gsum phyag drug pa dang// zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa dang// dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa dang// dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa dang// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang// phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag tu sprul lo// yon tan dang 'phrin las las sprul pa rgya mtsho lta bur sprul lo// bdud de rnams kyis mtshugs te bstan pa bsrungs so// dgos ched kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// yang byang chub

sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba// e ma ho// sprul pa'i sku 'di rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i don du// 'di la ji ltar bsgrub bar bya zhes zhus pas// gnas ni 'di ltar du sgrub// ri ni rnam par dmar pa dang// lung bzla gam dmar po'o// shing rtsi me tog sbu gu dang// lung pa chu dang chu bran dang// de yi gnas su bsgrub pa'o// 'di la dgos pa'i rdzas rnams gang// bdud nag thog pa rta yin te// g.yag rog thod pa ma nyams pa// dri rgod lcags dang gsod byed dang// me dmar dag dang zangs phur phaT// rta yi mchog phur snying rtse bsog/ dza yig 'ur e e e// sku gzugs 'khor lo'i mchod rten dang// rus sbal khog pa rma bya'i mdongs// rus sbal phag rgod lus la bca'// 'chi bdag nyid kyang brlag par 'gyur// 'di med klu la las 'chol ba// spu gri ral gri shugs med gnyis// rang gi lus la yod pa 'dra// rdzas kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// 'di la dkyil 'khor ji ltar bya// sa gzhi kun tu dmar ba la// zla gam nub tu bstan pa brtsigs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi sgo bzhi ldan// mu khyud gru chad rdo rje'i gur// dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de la dkyil 'khor cho ga gang// dus gsum dbang sgyur ye shes lha yi lha// thams cad dbang sgyur bcom ldan rta mchog dpal// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang gi mdog ni dur khrod me ri 'dra// mu stegs 'dul ba'i dpa' rtags dbyig pa can// dregs pa 'dul mdzad dregs pa kun 'joms pa// rta mgrin rgyal po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung// chos sku 'od dpag med dang rdo rje chos// spyan ras gzugs sprul hri las rngam chen ston// rta mgrin rta skad bzhad la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho pra ti ti pu'o// e yaM baM su ke raM bruM// e/ stong nyid brdal ba'i klong dkyil du// yaM/ 'thor byed rlung nag tshub ma rgya gram gtams// baM/ rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrug/ su zhing chen nang brdal ba'i tshogs ni mtha' dbus med par brdal/ keM/ keng rgyus 'bar ba'i ri rab brtsigs pa la// raM/ bskal pa'i me ri me dpung klong dkyil// sa/ hri/ snang med dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni// de ltar snang ba byang chub sems// de bzhin nyid do de ltar te// snying rje'i yon tan kun la khyab// khyab pas byang chub snying po'i sku// kun tu snang ba rdo rje chen po'o// rig pa 'od gsal yi ge hri// rgyu yi rig pa'i ye ge'o// bruM las ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dmar nag gru gsum 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru khyams sgo bzhi rta babs sgo khyud ldan// klu gnyan klu dbang lha chen dang// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du gnas// dkyil 'khor cho ga'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de la skyed par

byed pa gang// zhes pas 'di skyed bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ yi ge hri las dbang chen sku// sku dmog dmar po byi ru bcag pa 'dra// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// zhal gyi nang nas rak+ta'i rba glong 'khrug/ ral pa dmar po rtse mo srid gsum 'bar// rta skad gsum gyis lha srid bang du sdud// sma ra'i ag tshom bskal ba'i me ru 'bar// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// pad+ma ral gri dgra sta g.yas/ ban d+ha mdung dang mda' gzhu g.yon// me ri me dpung klong na gzhugs// gong gi hri'i 'od las yi ge 'di ltar chad do// hU~M khroM hri hU~M khroM khroM khroM khroM chad do// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// yi ge hU~M las sku bskyed pa// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// sku mdog sngon po nam mkha' 'dra// sbrul chen rigs lngas sku la brgyan// g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dril bu can// dri za'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// yi ge khroM las sku bskyed pa// bya khyung rgyal po ga ru Ta/ mthing nag g.yug gshog gshog rgod zangs la grub// rdo rje'i rwa bgad spyi gtsug rin chen 'bar// mchu dang sder mo lcags kyi rdo rje can// gshin rje'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// yi ge hri las sku bskyed pa// rdo rje 'jigs byed pad+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog dmar po nub ka'i dmar thag 'dra// rdo rje kha T+wAM ban dmar g.yas// mda' gzhu mdung dang rgyu zhags g.yon// klu yi gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang phyogs 'khor lo rtsibs stengs su// yi ge hU~M las sku bskyed pa/ bcom ldan yag sha he ru ka// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing// dang po zil gnon khyung gshog can// bar ma klu bdud sbrul zhags can// tha ma phur pa srin bya can// gnod sbyin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// gong ras bzhi la rigs bzhi khyung// smug ser dmar ljang rab tu bzhugs// nag po ming sring sgo bar bcas// sku bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de la mchod pa yan lag gang// zhes pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po byang chub rigs kyi gtso// thugs rje thabasamakhas 'phrin las 'dul mkhas pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// thams cad dbang sdud bcom ldan rta mgo can// 'gro don mthar phyin rta mgo ljang khu ste// rta yi rgyal po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ha ya gri ba sa ma ya hU~M dza/ oM badzra d+hu pe hU~M/ oM badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ oM badzra A lo ke hU~M// oM badzra gan d+he hU~M// oM badzra ni be te hU~M/ i dam ba ling gri h+na kha kha khA hi khA hi// bde chen gsung gi sprul pa rta mchog dpal// gdug pa 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa

la// rnam dag bdud rtsi dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs dbang dang dngos grub gsol// ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta kha raM khA hi/ ko ta pa ko la sha ko la ko la/ pasta sha ri ta tha/ zhes gnod sbyin rta mgos bstod do// a mri ta dang chang sbyar te// bde che na dbang chen khro la mchod par 'bul// thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i sid+d+hi gsol// ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha khA hi/ mchod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// sngags rnams dbye ba ji ltar dbye// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dris pa zung la dag par bsgrogs// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi// ma lus dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// oM hri wang d+ha ri// pad+mA ta? ta krid badzra krod+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu/ te tsa wang khroM ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT// thams cad 'dus pa'i sngags bsgrub de'o// i hri wang pad+mUM ta krid badzra krod+ha ha ya griM ba hri/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i man ngag go/ oM badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT// oM khroM ga ru Ta hU~M phaT// oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M phaT// oM rag sha ru ru he ru ka hU~M phaT// oM bud+d+ha ga ru Ta oM// oM rat+na ga ru Ta traM// oM pad+ma ga ru Ta hri/ oM karma ga ru Ta a// sngon du bsnyen pa sku bskyed pa'i man ngag go/ ha ya gri ba hri/ gab mo rta ri gab/ pad+ma b+han d+ha hri gab/ tshin d+ha shag shag hri gab/ shan ti ku ru ye swAhA/ puSh+ti ku ru ye swAhA/ shang ku ru ye swAhA/ mA ra ya ku ru ya swAhA/ oM aHhU~M traM hri A a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ ka la sha a b+hi She ka pad+ma ta kring kri ka hU~M/ badzra pus pa pra ti dza/ aM ku sha sre yad hU~M/ raM dzA la la ye raM/ staM b+ha ya nan/ u pa ta/ sarba shu truM mA ra ya dza/ dza dza dza/ dza dza dza/ dzadza dza/ dza dza dza/ a sha ya hU~M/ dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza b+h+yo b+h+yo/ drag po sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// drag tu bskul na ji ltar bskul// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje khrag 'thung bcom ldan rta mgrin sku// dmar nag 'bar ba 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dbu gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar// rta mgo dmar bas lha 'dre dbang du sdud// rngog ma sngon po nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs// phum phum ser po rgya mtsho'i gting nas 'khrug/ dpral ba zhur bo 'od dkar 'khyil li li// zhal nas dpal gyi spyugs pa kyu ru ru// shangs nas dpal gyi sna gra sha rar// nga rgyal 'bangs su che bas 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul// dpal gyi rta skad lhang lhang tse re re// lhang lhang tser cir phyogs bcur sgrogs// g.yas kyi rta skad lhang lhang thang gcig gis// zhal nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kyang ston// g.yon gyi rta skad thang gnyis kyis// rnal 'byor yal gam can la dngos grub gsol// dbus kyi rta skad lhang lhang thang gsum gyis// srid pa'i ma mo bos shing dam la sdud// srid pa'i ma mo dam bzhin ma nyan na// rta mgrin rgyal

po khros pa yis// dpal gyi rta bro brdungs pa re// ma tshogs rdul du brlag pa re// rdul phran ngag gi tshom bu la// rol ba'i rta bro chems se chems// yas bdud spyi bgegs rnams la chems se chems// mas kyi sri langs rnams la chems se chems// sdang dgra gnod bgegs rnams la chems chems// 'dus la ma tshogs rnams kyis las mdzod cing// ma tshogs rnams kyang 'du ma tshogs dam la 'du// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi ngang// nga ni mkha' 'gro kun gyi rje// mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi rje dpon mdzad// nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// srid pa'i m-i mo kun gyi 'khor gyis bskor// nga ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi nying khu can// dus gsum sangs rgyas zos pas ngam 'grangs// da rung za 'dod skom 'dod bkres ltogs shi la khad/ khams gsum sems can zos pas lto bde tsam// hri lag pa rdo rje bdud por nas// rkang pa bro brdungs khrigags se khrigs/ kha nas tshangs pa'i glu sdug len// rtag tu gsang ba'i rnge chung brdung// las su dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol// rta bro kho ra gcig dang po la// srin po sha za longs spyod bro// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// zhing chen tshogs la da rdungs shig/ rta bro khor gnyis bar pa la// khams gsum khrag 'thung gnad kyi bro// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// bro brdung rigs ni drug la brdung// a ni su tri pre du mA ra ya// rta bro khor gsum tha ma la// bdud dpung thod rus 'joms pa'i bro// gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// 'byung po sgal tshigs khrol mar 'joms// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bgegs ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen dbal bas dang// phyogs bcu rlung nag tshub mar 'khrigs// hri/ nga rgyal thabs kyis dregs pa kun 'dul ba// dpag bsam shing khyer rgya mtsho dkrugs pa yis// rgya mtsho'i ting gi klu drug thang la 'don// srid pa'i rus sbal nag po cho nges brdung// phyag gnyis mi bskyod 'dre srin snying yang 'gems// zhabs gnyis mi 'dor klu bzhi rak+ta sbyor// rdo rje me lce ljags chen brkyang pa yis/ gnam sa gnyis po zangs gog bcom pa bzhin// ri rab lhun po thal ba rdul du lhogs// srid pa'i ma mo las la mi 'gro na// ma ma hU~M zhes drag tu brjod pa yis// yang gsang ma mo drug ka tshang bar gnon// srid pa'i ma mo bka' bzhin ma nyan na// ka ma la yi snying po brjod pa yis// brang yang 'dra la la snying yang khu ru 'byin// bcos glags med par mgo lus tshal bar 'gyes// yid sems dbang du sdud la yid sems rdul du rlog/ ma mo sa ma ya e hriM hriM// bskul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bcom ldan thugs rje gtso bo mchog/ dregs pa srog gi snying po

ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sran traM ya ma tri tri ya krod+ha ni// ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT// haM shaM/ tro tri tro la sha b+h+yo/ tri sha me g+ha ya// a pra pra ya badzra sa du/ tri tsa ba la a shug me// ra tsa tsa ba ka/ ma tri ya/ tri ma ra lam ya/ a sham ya/ ya ma hri badzra sham// ku ru ya/ yu ta na tri dza ya// ma ra na ti dza ya/ shag rag sha rag mo/ bong la/ raka ya/ nA ga rA dza/ be sa sa ba/ ga gra u ti/ ni ro/ ru tra ma hA ka la/ tsa tri tsa ro/ ma ma yam/ b+hi ni dz+nya ni/ rni rni tri dag la ma 'dus pa med// oM nag po tsa pa la hri hU~M// bdag la srungs shig/ 'dus pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rang nyid bsrung na ji ltar bsrungs// rta yi dbu yi yon tan gang// zhes ngas// bdag gi spyi gtsug rta mgo ste// hri hri zhal gyi g.yas g.yon gnyis// wang ni thabs kyi steng du'o// d+ha na shes rab 'og tu'o// ri ni gnyis med sa bar la// badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+h+ri ba/ hri ni srid gsum gsal bar byed pa ste// spyan ni g.yas g.yon gnyis la'o// snyan ni stong gsum 'brug sgra hri// mgrin pa pad+ma'i ye shes te// yi ge hri las dmar po ste// hri d+har mo ta ya/ hri hri kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi/ hri hri hri pa shar ku ru hU~M/ myang 'das sgrub la dngos grub ster// 'khor 'das dbang du sdud par sgrogs// bsgom na thams cad 'jig par byed// ha ya dpu'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// yang ni 'khor tshogs bshad par bya'o// gnas sman brgyud dang ul sman brgyad// sgom dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// 'gugs byed dbang sdud ro langs shan// pa shang ku rus thams cad sdud// ru lu sngags kyi 'phreng bas rbad// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M// sarba mA ra ya ku ru ye ha he phaT b+h+yo/ ro shan ro tsa ro rbad dza/ kang kang kang keng dro ho gro he ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo// 'khor tshogs bkol ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// yang ni zlog dang rang gshed ni/ yag sha me dbal bsam par bya// oM a kro ra tsa dur nas du hU~M/ a mu ka'i snying la phril phril// tsit+ta ni phyung sha la rbad rbad// ya ya rnam stem rnal ste ma nri dza dza/ dgra bo'i snying la ma ra ya nri rbad rbad/ oM a kro ra tsa dur snying la phril phril/ a ro ra tsit+ta ni sha la rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma kri dza tsit+ta kha thun mA ra ya rbad/ oM yo gi sho ri trag hri many+dzu mu tsa kha ri b+h+yo/ tsa tsa tsit+ta phrig sha b+h+yo// a a mu ka te te phre te b+h+yo// sang di ri b+h+yo// ma ma rag sha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo bzlog bzlog/ oM b+ha si b+ha kaM/ dze me phe ta/ i tu ba b+ha se/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// 'od zhu de la thim par bya// rang re la ni de bzhin spyad// chag chag rang gi dri chus bshad// 'bad dbral nag po'i rang gshed do// rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// bya khyud rgyal po drag rtsal

can// de yi sgrub pa ji ltar bya// pad+ma 'dab ma lnga pa la// bya khra khu bas chag chag btab// mthing smug ser dmar ljang khu ste// khroM chen lnga las rigs lnga bskyed// sku bskyed sngags ni gong na gsal// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni rgyun du bzlas// oM ga ru Ta bya khyung ka ra krod+ha hU~M phaT// oM nA ga le nA ga le// nA ga duM pa len nA' ga dum pa le// nA ga khrol khrol// na ga shig shig/ ad khaM ad khaM// od khaM od khaM// bya tsa bya tsa// bya khyung bya khyung// de ni sgrub pa'i sngags yin no// lhang lha tse ra tser kye ta shag shag/ de ni gsad pa'i sngags yin no// slang med bye tshan gzugs phur dkrug/ ka ru Ta sngon byung gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM badzra ba ni hU~M phaT// de ni bsnyen pa'i sngags so// oM tsan+Da ma hA ro Sha na badzra pa ni phaT// oM badzra tsan+Da sarba duSh+ta na da ga ha na ga pa tsa hU~M// nA ga phaT nA ga phaT// nA ga raM nA ga yid// raM ji la rbad// rdo rje 'bar pa gos sngon can// kha 'bar sngon po sku la gsol// rdo rje sdigs mdzub dril bu can// rdo rje phur pa skyed de// gdab dang bsad pa'i las byas nas// ser ba srun dang sri'u gso// smyo pog 'dul ba'i las rnams byed// rdo rje gos sngon can gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// yang ni rdo rje 'jigs byed des// sa ni rnam par dmar ba la// dkyil 'khor zla gaM khra gang la// shin tu dkar ba'i zla tshes bri// bum pa ra ri med pa la// 'bru bcud snying po nang zhu gsal// mgul pa dmar ba'i mtshan nyid dkri// me lce sbrang rtsi dag sbyar la// tshe ni rdo rje rtse lnga'i dbyibs su bya// dmar ba'i mdog sku pad+ma'i bri// phye dang rtsi mar blug la bzhag/ de stengs bzhag la bag zan brgyas// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// gnas yul pho nyas drag tu bskul// oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M phaT// A yu dz+nyA na yu tshe ni bruM// gzungs thag btags la 'bad pas drang// pra rtags brtags la dngos grub blang// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// 'di yi dbang ni ji lta bu// zhes pas// 'di yi dbang ni 'di lta ste/ bum pa dag ni bcas nas su// sku bskyed spyi bor gzhag par bya// me tog khar yang 'phang bar bya// mi de pa la yang drang// dbang gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// nA ga rA dza'i gtad zlog na// rus sbal nang du mu khyud gnyis// rtsibs bzhi dag gis bskor bar bya// dpus su rgyal po bdag la bsrungs ni// rta lpags dril ma mgul dug dgas// dur khrod ras la 'di bris te// rtsibasas bzhi mu khyud gnyis ldan na// rtsibs bzhi'i lte bar rigs lnga khyud// rtsibs mtshan khro bzhi bris pa ni// bya rgod phod kyis dril la gdags// tsi rtsi dza la gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas ma hA de

ba yis// bdag la rdzas kyi rim pa ni// 'bad 'bral nag po gsod 'dod na// phung shul gru gsum sum brtseg tu// bdud nag thod pa ma nyams par// dpral bar e bris ming rus gzhug/ gri rgod lcags la gsod byed ma dung// mtshul pa 'bad 'bral phyogs su bstan// mtshams log lag cha phying ka log/ bdun gcig bsnyen la bdun gnyis gsad// zlog la phyag cha mi dor ro// bdag gi srog snying 'di yin no// ma hA de bas sa ma la ye sod// ma ru rtse snying rtse yis sod// lang ma sbu ru ye sod/ lce dar ma dur ma byi rtse ye sod// tsa mun na la da ye sod// yag sha khru mu na de ye sa ma ye sod// phung srog ma la ye sod// srogs so yo// shri ma hA de ba mahA sha re nir ma ku ku ru sarba sha trUM mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo// pho mtshan dbyug pas ling ka brdung// ma hA de ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang lha mo nag mos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di phul lo// b+h+yo las bskyed pa'i ma mo ni// khram shi shod rde dkar nag 'grems// bong bu ga dmar chibs su chibs// rlung nag tshubs ma'i gseb na bzhugs// ta d+ya thA ru ru b+ha ti ti b+ha to swAhA/ oM ru ru a shug me swAhA/ nal bu'i rkyal pa rab tu 'bud// trag rag sha ru tra snying khrag ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo// mA ra dza'i snyingatig snying thun/ khu gcig khu gcig rni dza dza/ rgyu ma mi bzhi g+han d+he srog tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nri dza dza bA bA se se ra ra ku ma tu re tu re/ b+ha khal reg sha/ che ge mo'i snying la rgyob// zhing lpags 'phyar zhing brab pa'o// ling ka'i rgyu ni 'di yin te// grog ma khar chu tshe phum ma dang// gangs dang klu yi 'o ma la// ling ka 'dom gang tshad du bya// shing shun dag la bris la glan// snying la rni tri nu g.yas la// g.yon pa yag la lhed snang sha/ lte nge kha la mgrin par ri// gsang bar dza la parla g.yas bskum// lag g.yas tu re g.yon du ba// gzhogs g.yas mi la g.yon du snying// blo g.yas sel 'doms su rgyog/ spyi bor ming byang bri bar bya// nal bu'i rkyal pa rab tu bud// gtso mo nag mo'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// bcom ldan thugs rje'i gtso bo mchog/ blo dman gcig tu ji ltar sgrub// dang po stong pa'i ngang nyid las// rtsa sngags brjod de tshu bur rdol// yig 'bru bskyed rim mi dgos te// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog dmar po byi ru bcag pa 'dra// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po dbang phyug chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thal ka'i mdog/ gcer bu langs nas bzhugs pa ste// g.yas pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bskor// sbod gtong mgo skye yan lag 'breg/ g.yon par rang rtags tri shul bsnams// ral pas sa gzhi bar snang

khebs// gzas pa po yi rang gshed bya// srung byed dregs pa gshed du byed// bar pa ral gri skye brgyud gcod// tha ma dgra stas rbod gtong mgo lus gshog/ dang po thod khrag 'bar bas rims dal 'bebs// bar pa mdung thung rnon pos sa bon snying la 'debs// ye shes mda' gzhus sde brgyad las la mdzud// rta skad gsum gyis lha srid bran du 'khol// rdo rje 'dzin pa sa nA ga bran du 'khol// rigs lnga'i khyung gis mdzes 'dze rdul du rlog/ dur khrod rgyan rnams dpal chen sku la rdzogs// klu 'bum gnyan khris bdag stong gi gdan// pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs// oM hri wang d+ha ri/ pad+ma ta krid/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA ya de ba/ ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu te tsa wang// krong ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT// thugs kyis dgongs pa klu bsrungs sngags// oM nag po rtsa ya la shri rak+Sha rak+Sha bdag la srungs shi swAhA// dpa' bo tshig sgrub kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// bzhi rdzogs dkyil 'khor bzhengs la bskul// hU~M dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen pad+ma rig sngags rgyal// klu 'bum gnyan khris bdag stong gi gdan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// sku mdog dmar po byi ru bcag pa 'dra// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// zhal gyi nang nas rak+ta'i rba klong 'khrug/ tshems gtsigs bar nas me stag kham kham 'phro// smin ma ser po bskal pa'i glog stong khyug/ spyan mig zur gsum log 'dren kun la zlog/ tshems gtsigs ljags 'dril rdo rje tshems par nas// ha ha hi his log 'dren gan bu 'gyel// ral pa dmar po srid pa'i rtse nas 'bar// thod skam 'bum gyis dbu brgyan thod du bcings// thod rlon 'bum gyi do shal se ral kha// rigs lnga sbrul gyis sku yi rgyan du mdzad// glang chen ko rlon zhing gi g.yang gzhi dang// stag gi sham thabs brjid pa sku la gsol// dbu yi gtsug nas rta skad bsgrags pa yis// log 'dren rbod gtong brgyal zhing rlag par byed// rta mgo'i steng 'dab chags ga ru Ta/ shing nag g.yu gshog shog rgodatsa zangs las grub// rdo rje rwa bgred spyi gtsug rin chen 'bar// mchu sder lcags las grub pas mdze 'dre rdul du rlog/ smug nag khyung gis dri zi bdud rnams 'dul// ser nag khyung gis gshin rje grul bum 'dul// dmar nag kyung gis klu dang ma mo 'dul// ljag nag khyung gis gnod sbyin btsan rnams 'dul// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// dbang phyug chen po mahA de ba ni/ thal kha mi bzad gcer bu langs pa ste// spyan dgu'i nang nas khrag gi mchim 'dzag/ lcags kyi ral bas sa gzhi bar snang

khebs// g.yas pa 'khor lo sa bon bon rang gshed rang la 'bebs// g.yon par rtags tri shul rtse gsum gyis// sa bon sbod gtong rang gshed rang la bskor// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po ni// dbang phyug chen po mahA de ba ni// thal kha mi bzad gces bu langs pa ste// spyan dgu'i nang nas khrag gi mchim 'dzag/ lcags kyi ral bas sa gzhi bar snang khebs// g.yas pa 'khor lo sa bon rang gshed rang la 'bebs// g.yon pa rang rtogs tri shul rtse gsum gyis// sa bon sbod gtong rang gshed rang la bskor// phyag drug g.yas kyi bar ba na// ral gri rnon pos sbod gtong srog rtsa gcod// phyag drug g.yas kyi tha man// dgra sta 'bar bas sbod gtong mgo lus gshog/ phyag drug g.yon gyi dang po na// thod khrag dmar pos phas kyi sbod gtong sgrol// phyag drug g.yon gyi bar pa na// mdung thung rnon pos sbod gtong snying la 'debs// phyag drug g.yon gyi tha ma na// ye shes mda' gzhus lha srin las la 'dzud// thugs kyi sras mchog khro rgyal rdo rje 'dzin// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje sdigs mdzub 'phyar// spyan rtsa rig rig mdzad cing nyes legs zhal che gcod// rkan sgra tog tog mdzad cing khams gsum dbang du sdud// las byed sprul pa chen mo ni// khams gsum sgrol mang mdzad pa'i// nag po nag mo ming sring ni// tri shul mi snying tshar brgyad pa// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// 'di ni rtags rnams ji ltar 'byung// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi nag mon pa dang ni me 'bar dang// ngan sngags bdag po lha sbyin 'bod pa dang// khyi nag dom dang g.yag rog po// mun sros chu chen 'brug pa dang// mtsho chen dang// bdag la go cha bzang po gyon pa dang// mkhar bzang// gang yang thub pa dang// gang bsad 'dabs dang nya sbrul sdig pa shi ba dang// chu mig ne gsing bskams pa'o// rmi lam dang r+t+rags kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// yang ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig la gnas 'di dgos te// sku yi dam tshig slob dpon dang// mgo ra dmar zhur bzhon mi bya// brdeg dang bsad pa gang yang bya min te// rta bsad kha 'phro bsre mi bya// rtag tu lha sgom la brtson bya// gal te gsung gi dam tshig ni// rta skrad bcag na nyams par 'gyur// hri dang hU~M gnyis mi 'bral te// rtag tu snying po gsung bsgrag go/ gal te thugs kyi dam tshig ni// rta sha grib ma mi 'gom mo// gu ya lag gi rdo rje bcang// nus chu kha 'phro bsre hri dang hU~M gnyis mi 'bral te// rtag tu snying po gsung bsgrag go/ gal te thugs kyi dam tshig ni// rta sha grib ma mi 'gom mo// gu ya lag

gi rdo rje bcang// nus chu kha 'phro bsre ba min// mtshams log kha zas phyir ka log/ dam tshig le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// rgyud 'id bcang na ji ltar bcang// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// dang po gzhung ltar don rtogs dang// tha ma mnyams gzhung du srun ba dang// rdo rje slob dpon dbang can la// 'di yi dbang dang sgrub nod nas// spyad na grub cing bkol na nyan// ji ltar yid bzhin bsams ba 'grub// rab tu dben pa'i dgon gnas su// 'du 'dzin rab tu sbang bar bya'o// ma yengs rgyun du sgom byed na// des ni dgongs pa rab tu 'grub// snying dang 'dra ba'i yon phul nas// des bsgrub des ni thob par 'gyur// dam tshig med pa'i sngags pa nag po ni// gdags ngag gting nas ma longs par// dpe rkun 'ge rus tshig khar 'dri// des chog snyam pa'i bsam pas 'grub// man ngag gting nas ma thob par// gzhan la ngom zhing rang che 'don// de 'dra'i phan 'dras sgom mi 'grub// oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M// ma yengs rgyun bzlas bsnyen par 'gyur// rgyud bcad ba'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// rta mgrin gsang rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra krid+hi pad+ma nri t+ye shwa rA ya/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje khro mo gzi ldan ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen po// rnal 'byor gsang ba zhes bya ba'i// rgyud ni rab tu bshad par bya// gang 'di thos pa tsam gyis ni// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// dri za lha min gsang ba pa// srin po lto 'phye la sogs pa// gang 'di nyams su blangs gyur na// zhi dang rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub// bsad dang bcings dang 'phang dang rgyal// dngos grub sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub// tshe rings yon tan phun sum tshogs// dam pa rgyal ba 'byung ba dang// mnan cing spar dang gzhan du 'gro// ma lus 'di yis 'grub par byed// gang gis ring por mi thogs par// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni bde ba che// yon tan rgya mtsho mchog mnga' ba// 'grub pa 'di las gzhan du min// gsang ba la ni dad pa dang// mos dang shes rab snying rje che// zhi dang mchog la brtag dka' ba// 'di ni dngos grub stsol byed 'gyur// sdom gnas yi rangs dbang bskur te// rang 'dod phyag rgya chen po bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun// thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i rigs can yang// gang gis sdom pa ma byin pa dang// dbang ma

bskur bar ni nam yang dngos grub mi 'gyur// bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs pa yis// slob ma la ni snying rje zung// sdom pa gsum ni sbyin par bya// de nas gnang ba chen por 'gyur// dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// yum bcas dkyil 'khor chen por ni// mkhas pa cho ga rdzogs byas te// dbang bskur dngos grub snod du 'gyur// sa gzhi bzang po legs rnyed nas// gang gis rin gyis sbyor ba bya// bdag po la ni gtor ma sbyin// de la yongs su dag par 'gyur// dang po'i snod du ji bzhin 'gyur// de nas rang gi phyag rgya yis// kha dog sna tshogs rab ldan pa'i// rin chen 'bar ba rab tu 'phro// rab tu 'phro ba'i khang pa'i nang// yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje bskul ba dang bcas pa// bzang po'i steng na yang dag gnas// de tshe drag po'i 'khor gyis dbul// rab tu drag po'i phyag rgyar langs// phyogs kun tu ni lta bya ste// khro bo'i khang pa rtsom par 'gyur// ba su ta yi 'phreng ba ni// byin brlabs bdud rtsi lnga yis mtshan// rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya che// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa po// badzra d+harma tsakra hU~M/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// thal ba mchog las byung ba'o// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yis tshon gyis bri bar bya// gang gis dkyil 'khor chen po ru// yid 'ong cho ga rdzogs byas te// legs par brtag pa'i slob ma gzhug/ dngos grub dam pa sbyor bar byed// gar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der// dmar po yis ni bdug byas te// bum pa nag pos ma gos pas// spyi bor dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// dbu rgyan rdo rje dril bu dang// ming dang brtul zhugs la sogs pa// gang la dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang// rab mchog dngos grub bsgrub par byed// mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzin mar ldan pa'i// sbyor ba dam pa 'di dag kyang// bdag gzhan nyes pa bskyab pa'i phyir// rtag tu sbyin par bya ba yin// dbang chen rig pa 'dzin bcas pa// khro bo de bzhin nyid sbyor ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba'i dam// dngos grub dam pa kun gyi rgyu// phyag rgya gcig la 'khril ba'i tshul// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bde bar sbyor// gang gis zil gyis gnon pa yi// rab tu 'bar bas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// kun tu yon tan ldan nas su// bum pa skyon dang bral bar ni// bdud rtsi tshe yi sgrub pa brtsam// sman dang 'bru dang rin po che// dkar gsum mngar ba gsum po dang// de bzhin du ni snum por sbyar// legs par rgyas btab dbus su gnas// bdag nyid 'khor lo chen po yis// snying po las ni snying por bsam// de nyis gsang ba'i tshul 'chang bas// bdud rtsi bcud ni 'gugs par byed// oM pad+ma

ma hA shri he ru ka hri pad+ma krod+hi shwa ri dza dza/ oM hu lu hu lu hri hU~M phaT// e a ra li hri dzi/ A yu she hU~M// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyis// kun tu sgrub pa'i cho ga bya// gang gis rab tu sbyar byas nas// 'dod pa rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// 'od dang du ba me 'bar ba// ji srid 'gul dang g.yo ba dang// gang gis mtshan ma gzhan byung tshe// bdag nyid cho ga bzhin du bza'// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bcu drug ste// a las byung ba bcu drug bzhag/ nang du thung ngu'i sde ba ste// phyir ni ring po nyid yin no// snod chen po legs mdzad pa// gang gis legs pa'i rtags ldan pa// rnyed pa cho ga bzhin du bstod// bdud rtsi lngas ni gang par bya// gang gis yongs su dag pa las// thod pa'i rten du bsam par bya// bdag nyid 'khor lo chen po la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sa bon gzhug/ 'di yis rnal 'byor gang 'dod pa'i// dpag med 'phel bar byed par 'gyur// zhes pa gsang ba chen po yongs su 'phel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen pa'o// mtshan dang ldan pa'i legs mdzes pa'i// bu mo lnga'am nyi shu dang// rtsa lnga 'das par bcas pa gnas// rnal 'byor ldan pas btsal bar bya// 'dab bzhi pas ni legs mtshan pa'i// gdan ni re re'i gnas na gnas// dbus su dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dbang chen sku ni yang dag bzhugs// gang gis dus lngar legs par sbyar// gdan ni re re'i gnas na gnas// dbus su dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dbang chen sku ni yang dag bzhugs// gang gis dus lngar legs par sbyar// byang chub sems ni gnyis kar gdab// gang gis dus su de yi gnas// blug pa'i cho ga 'di dag bya// d+han da dkar po shu dag dang// tsan dug lha tsher bdud rtsi lnga// bud med b+ha gar legs rten te// bsgrub nas rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// gang gis dus su sdom pa kun la gnas// rigs pa'i cho gas rjes 'brengs nas// brtul zhugs la ni rab gnas te// rtag tu sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa// bdag med pa la byung ba yi// bum pa bzang po rin chen snod// de nang kun 'dus byang chub sems// bkug ste bdag nyid bza' bar bya// zhes pa 'di gang gis rab tu gsang ba'i bcud 'dod pa rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// gdug cing gtum par gyur pa ste// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul zhing// thabs gzhan sbyor ba don med pa// oM pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ja hri pad+ma krod+ha shwa ri dza dza/ oM hu lu hu lu hri hU~M phaT// e a ra li hri dza/ A yu she hU~M/ rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyis// kun tu sgrub pa'i cho ga

bya// gang gis rab tu sbyar byas na// 'dod pa rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// 'od dang du ba med 'bar ba// ji srid 'gul dang g.yo ba dang// gang gis mtshan ma gzhan byung tshe// bdag nyid cha ga bzhin du bza'// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bcu drug ste// a las byung ba bcu drug bzhag/ nang du thung ngu'i sde ba ste// phyir ni ring po nyid yin no// snod chen po legs mdzad pa// gang gis legs pa'i rtags ldan pa// rnyed pa cho ga bzhin du bstod// bdud rtsi lngas ni dgang bar bya// gang gis yongs su dag pa las// thod pa'i rten du bsam par bya// bdag nyid 'khor lo chen po la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sa bon gzhug/ 'di yis rnal 'byor gang 'dod pa'i// dpag med 'phel bar byed par 'gyur// zhes pa gsang ba chen po yongs su 'phel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// mtshan dang ldan pa'i legs mdzes pa'i// bu mo lnga'am nyi shu dang// rtsa lnga 'das par bcad pa gnas// rnal 'byor nan tan gyis ni gsad par bya// gang tshe gsad par gyur pa na// bdag nyid la sogs phun sum tshogs// hom khung gru gsum gdengs pa la// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te// khrag dang dug gis byug nas ni// drag po'i mtshon cha dgram par bya// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang// rmongs pa'i bsad pa'i rdzas rnams la// gang gis rab tu 'bar ba yi// ral gri la sogs bzhug par bya// rkang rjes khrag dang dri chu dang// sa la rab tu 'bad pa yis// zhags pa yis ni bsdam byas te// gan rkyal dag tu gzhag par bya// zhes pa 'di ni rdzas rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// de nas dgug par gyur pa ste// tsha ba'i shing la me sbar te// tsha ba'i rdzas kyi byug bya zhing// me 'bar ba la bskam par bya// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la mA ra ya hri dza/ pa tsa pa tsa mA ra ya hri dza/ da ra da ra mA ra ya hri dza/ de nas drag po'i khang par gzhug/ rab tu 'bar ba'i tho bas mnan// des kyang nus pa gzhan pa rnams// rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ba yin// ces pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba chen po'i dam tshig go/ 'khor ba chen po'i bdag nyid can// ting 'dzin gsang ba'i sbyor ba yis// rab tu gsang ba'i las rnams kun// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// las rnams rab tu sangs nas ni// 'jug 'gyur 'khor lo bdag nyid che// bdag nyid cho ga bzhin rgyas pas// 'dod pa rdo rje bzhin du 'grub// dbang chen sku ni gsang bar bya// gsung dang de bzhin thugs gsang na// bsad pa 'di'ang thogs pa med// ces pa 'di ni gsad pa'i

sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po rab tu gsang ba'o// tsan dan ga bur shu dag dang// tsan dug lha 'tsher bdud rtsi lnga// bud med b+ha gar legs rten te// bsgrub nas rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// gang gis sdom pa kun la gnas// reg pa'i cho ga rjes 'brangs nas// brtul zhugs la ni rab gnas te// rtag tu dpa' bo'i spyod pa bya// nyi ma zla ba gnas kyis bar// bdag nyid 'tsho bar the tshom med// rigs 'dzin rigs 'dzin ma rnams kyis// rtag tu srung bar byed par 'gyur// dmus long long ba rgyab sbrel yang// bstan pa'i don la gnas par byed// lhun rdzogs tshe yi dkyil 'khor la// gang gis gnas par gyur nas ni// rtag tu dngos grub chen po sgrub// dngos grub 'di la su gnas pa// dngos grub gzhan yang thogs pa med// yon tan dngos grub thams cad kun// thogs pa med par 'gyur ba med// gang gis rtag tu sbyor ba'i mchog/ pad+ma 'di la rten gyur na// 'jig rten mi bder gyur pa'am// bde bar gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur// rig pa'i brtul zhugs chen po yis// sdom pa gang dang gang la gnas// rigs 'dzin mchog gi sa bon can// ci phyir rol mo rgya cher gnas// dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// dngos grub gsang ba ji snyed pa// ma lu 'di yin thob par 'gyur// gzhan 'gyur yon tan smos ci dgos// zhes pa 'di ni gsang ba'i tshe'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// lan bdun legs par btsal ba yi// sa yi zhag ni yongs rdzogs pa// gang gis legs par rnyed pa dang// mkhas pas grub pa chen po byas// zos nas 'dod pa de nyid grub// a ru ra ni bzang po pa// gang 'dir yongs su btsal gyur pa// he ru ka ni sbyor byas nas// bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan rmad du gzhan yang 'byung// zhes pa 'di ni sbyor ba tshe'i dam tshig chen mo yin pa'o// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yis// 'byung po bsgral ba'i cho ga ni// ri nag rtse mo gnam du mchong// yid mi dga' zhing 'jigs pa dang// ngam grog dang ni g.yangs sa dang// lam gyi mdo 'am shing gcig drung// rtsub pa'i sa ni tsha sgo can// srog chags thams cad 'chi ba dang// ral gri lta bu rab tu 'bar// bsad pa'i gnas kyi dam pa ste// der ni nye bar 'dug nas ni// bar chad bzlog cing mnyes par bya// bar chad gang gis bzlog 'gyur pa// de ni nan tan chen po byas// gang zhig bdag dang gzhan rnams la// yon tan 'byung ba ci 'dod pa// des ni thogs pa med 'gyur ba// 'grub phyir rab tu bsngags pa yin// oM hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT// e A ra li hri dza// che ge mo san ti mA ta ya dza// zhes pas 'di ni gang gis 'byung po rab tu bsad

pa'i dam tshig chen po'o// gang gis tho rangs dus dag tu// rab tu 'bar ba'i me btang ste// nag po sprin gyi sbyor bas ni// gang zhig byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'ug pa'i tsit+ta dang// gong ma'i sbyor dang ldan pa yis// rtag tu sgrub pa'i cho ga bya// de ni bltas chen thob pa yin// gang gis rtag tu gcer bur 'dug/ bdud rtsi lnga yi thod par gnas// gang 'di bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni// myur du 'grub par gdon mi za// bdag nyid cho ga kun rgyas pas// rig pa'i brtul zhugs chen po yis// gang la gnas nas rab 'grub pa// 'di ni gsang ba chen po yin// bdag nyid cho ga kun rgyas pas// 'dod pa kun gyi sbyor ba 'grub// gang la yid la byas pa yis// de nyid rab tu gsad pa yis// de nyid rab tu gsad pa yin// 'dod pa kun ni gang yin pa// de tshe mkhas pas 'dod pa 'grub// 'di ni brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig chen po rab tu grags pa'o// bdud rtsi lnga las byung ba'i las// dri zhim ril bu rab byas te// lcags gsum gyis rab tu dkris te// bsgrub pas rang gi rtags dang ldan// oM tsun d+ha tsun d+ha hri dza/ ban d+ha ban d+hi hri dza/ pa ta pa ta hri dza/ ha na ha na hri dza/ da ha da ha hri dza/ gardza gardza hri dza/ ku ru ku ru hri dza// sngags 'di dag ni rab tu gsang ba'i ril bu sbyor ba'i dam tshig go/ gang zhig rtag pa'i bdag nyid can// 'khor lo chen po rab sbyor bas// rab tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di// rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin// ces pa 'di ni 'dod pa kun 'byung bzhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'o// gang zhig mngon sum gsal gyur nas// gsang ba sbyor ba'i theg chen gyis// ro langs gsod pa'i sbyor ba las// bsad gcad las rnams rab tu bya// tsa kra oM bruM// tsakra hU~M bruM// tsakra swa bruM/ tsakra ha bruM// ha na ha na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ na sha ya na sha ya hri dza dza/ zhes pa 'di ni 'byung po gsad pa'i drag shul chen po'i sbyor ba'o// phur bu dmar po dbang dang ldan// 'od chen rtags dang ldan 'gyur nas// gang gis dkar na mtshams su gdab// me dpung chen pos bsreg par byed// hri pad+ma shri he ru ka kI li kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT// ces pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba'i phur ba'i dam tshig go/ rab tu gnam lcags 'bar ba yi// ral gri yang ni bsam par bya// rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar// de ni gtum po'i sbyor ba yin// gang zhig rab tu 'jigs pa yi// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yis// gtum par gyur pa thams cad ni// lung gsum mdo ru sbas par bya// gang tshe gzhan pa'i gsang sngags kyis// sngags ni rab tu grub pa yin// ces pa 'di ni gnas pa'i las kyi dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// ra dug pa dang re'u lcag dang// gang gis tsan ti pa ya dang/

si ma du ni mnyam sbyar te// snga dro'i dus su brdeg par bya// ces pa 'di ni drag shul chen po'i rdzas kyis gdug pa can gsod par byed pa'i dam tshig chen po'o/ gang gi thod pa nag po'i nang// tsit+ta gsum dang mnyam sbyar te// gang gi gnas su bcug gyur na// myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin// ma me thod pa bzang po'i nang// rims kyi khrag dang bcas te blugs// gang gis phyogs su gtor ba yis// smyos 'gros dag ni byed pa yin// mu khaM ku ru b+han d+ha ya hri dza dza/ zhes pa 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig chen pa'o// gang gi rengs par bya ba ni/ dri bo 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// gzugs ni gdug pa'i khrag gis byu ga/ lho nub mtshams su bstan par bya// gang zhig thog pa med gyur ba'i// bdag nyid 'khor lo chen po ni// kun tu sbyor bar byed pa yin// lcags bzang rab tu 'bar ba'i snod// mkhas pa'i spyi nas rkang pa ra bzhag/ phye ma gsum ni rab tu phreng// de yi nang du blugs cing sgrub/ ces pa 'di ni rab tu sgrub pa'i las kyi dam tshig chen po'o// gang gis ci 'dras ming nas bya// rab tu 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyis// stong gsum phyag rgya dgug par bya// phyag rgya yis ni rengs par gyur// zhes pa 'di ni rengs pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen pa'o// 'dod par gyur pa'i yi dgas la// 'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba yis// rab tu gsang ba'i sbyor byas nas// rengs par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rengs pa'i 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba ni/ mkhas pa gang gis spyad gyur na// de ni rengs pa de yi las// thog pa med par 'gyur ba yin// gang gis zla ba dman pa la// phye ma gsum dang tsha ba gsum// ji ltar sbyor ba legs byas nas// de ni ma lus myur du 'grub// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag rgya che// gsang chen dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya gsang ba chen po yi// gzi ldan mngon 'gyur phyag rgya yis// gang la bsad pa brtsams byas nas// des ni bsod nams dman 'gyur zhing// sdig pa chen po byed pa yin// mngon par 'grub pa chen po 'di// gang la byas pa tsam gyis ni// rtag tu de yi las rnams 'grub// ces pa 'di ni myur du sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba'i gsang ba'o// gsal ba'i bdag gi
